instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
“Fragrance has always been a great love of mine, and I am fascinated with the power that scent can have and the way it can immediately transport you to a specific time and place in your life. Being allowed to become an ambassador for the new Burberry fragrance feels particularly special and personal.
To me, lionesses represent female unity and strength. They are confident and move together. Much like them, we stand on the shoulders of the women who came before us and those who bolster us throughout our own lives. To me, this image is a real source of empowerment.” - Emma Mackey, Burberry Beauty Ambassador
Burberry unveils the new Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum, a unique aromatic fragrance for women. The launch is supported by a campaign featuring British-French actress and new ambassador for Burberry Beauty, Emma Mackey.
The campaign presents a story of self-discovery inspired by the collective strength and power of the pride of lionesses. Created with live footage of lionesses in their natural environment and the latest CGI technology, Burberry creates an imaginary world where Emma Mackey and the pride come together as one.
Embodying the spirit of the Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum, Emma channels the strength of the pride, igniting the power within to discover her inner confidence and ascend the peak ahead of her. Echoing Shygirl in the overlaid vocals, ‘one of me, but I’m not the only one, we are many burning like the sun’, the lionesses represent the collective power of female strength and support and the fact that together, we can all discover our inner goddess and achieve the extraordinary.
A unique gourmand aromatic fragrance led by a powerful trio of distinct vanillas. Collected by hand, the beans dry in the sun for five to seven weeks. They are then stored in wooden boxes to mature and develop their sweet signature aroma.
“My initial goal for Burberry Goddess was to expand upon the common use of vanilla to deliver a new kind of rich olfactive experience. For this purpose, I used three distinct types of vanilla extraction. The first is a vanilla infusion, which provides the brightest, woody vanilla possible. Then I used Firgood™ , also known as vanilla caviar, for the first time in a fragrance. This innovative new ingredient adds a sweet, rich, and animalic vanilla. Lastly, vanilla absolute is darker and richer, enhancing the fragrance with a mysterious, milky aspect."  - Amandine Clerc-Marie, Master Perfumer.
During the process of creating the perfect vanilla accord, the precious vanilla was wrapped with notes of bright Lavender Diva essence from Provence and earthy notes of cocoa and ginger roots, creating an aromatic balance to each vanilla.
Olfactive Pyramid
Top: Vanilla Infusion and Lavender
Heart: Vanilla Caviar
Base: Vanilla Absolute
Family: Gourmand Aromatic
Marking Burberry’s first-ever refillable fragrance, the bottle boasts an elegant design. The gabardine-inspired gold label on the outer casing references Burberry’s long-standing heritage, whilst the archive-inspired bottle is modernized with a gold medallion.
Burberry Goddess is available
in 10 ml, 30 ml, 50 ml, and 100 ml bottles.
Burberry Goddess Shower Gel,
Body Lotion and Refill (150ml) complete the collection.
output: Goddess by Burberry is a Aromatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Goddess was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Amandine Clerc-Marie. Top notes are Vanilla, Lavender, Cacao and Ginger; middle note is Vanilla Caviar; base note is Vanilla Absolute.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
THE DELICATE STRENGTH OF FEMININITY
An ivory tower wreathed in shreds of clouds, dewy mists of fragile Pear, inviting Almond Milk and beads of Frankincense draw the outlines of a dreamful haven.
 
A princess whispers you in and leads the way to a lush garden where Osmanthus blossoms diffuse their heady apricot scent. A fountain gleams in the centre, its marble edge covered in scarlet roses whose voluptuous scent meets that of leathery Saffron threads laid on the floor.
 
Through Jasmine screens, sultry and spent, the woman walks and there comes with her a scent of dark Vanilla and skinlike Sandalwood, of ambery Labdanum and purring hints of regal Orientalgris: who are you, she asks, and you feel seen.
 
A spellbinding and novel interpretation of the Amouage triad of Rose, Frankincense and Orientalgris, Guidance reads like a poem, smells like an embrace, and feels like a word of wisdom.
output: Guidance by Amouage is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Guidance was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Pear, Hazelnut and Olibanum; middle notes are Osmanthus, Rose, Saffron and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Akigalawood, Ambergris and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A luminous aura and at the same time an intangible softness. Like the scent of fresh cotton, Valaya unfolds a sensual fragrance nuance dedicated to the power of femininity.
Beyond the artificial and beyond time, it awakens an intimate feeling, a universal emotion, a deep breath of mindfulness. Its formula evokes the delicate and pure skin of a woman in all its beauty.
“One of the biggest challenges was to create a fragrance that is fresh and delicate, but at the same time very powerful and expressive. Valaya is reminiscent of the feel of cotton against the skin. A cocoon-like perfume that is sensual and elegant at the same time. A white perfume full of contrasts that is delicate yet incredibly alluring.” – Julien Sprecher (brand creator)
output: Valaya by Parfums de Marly is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Valaya was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Aldehydes, White Peach, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Petalia, Lily-of-the-Valley, Nympheal™, Vetiver and Mahonia; base notes are Musk, Ambroxan, Akigalawood and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Black Opium OVER RED invites you to experiment with "the OVER RED rush". "A quest for experimental pleasure, highly disruptive, profoundly artistic, and excessively fragrant. A climax in true euphoria." The fragrance unites Black Opium's classic signature with a new contrast for additional excitement.
Top notes: cherry, green mandarin
Heart: Moroccan Ourika® jasmine, orange blossom absolute, black tea
Base: coffee, Indonesian patchouli, Madagascar vanilla
Black Opium Eau de Parfum Over Red is available in bottle of 30ml, 50ml, and 90ml.
output: Black Opium Over Red by Yves Saint Laurent is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Black Opium Over Red was launched in 2024. Black Opium Over Red was created by Honorine Blanc, Nathalie Lorson, Marie Salamagne and Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Cherry and Green Mandarin; middle notes are Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Black Tea; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Coffee and Indonesian Patchouli Leaf.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In the summer of 2023, Givenchy introduced the latest limited edition fragrance L'Interdit Rouge Ultime. This is a flanker to the 2021 version of L'Interdit Rouge, which itself was a flanker to the original 2018 L'Interdit.
L'Interdit Rouge Ultime encompasses a warm, woody floral essence, enriched with recycled cocoa shells and dark smoky notes, complementing the floral bouquet of the original composition. The fragrance features notes of neroli, orange blossom, tuberose, jasmine, amboxan, patchouli, and vetiver.
Givenchy L'Interdit Rouge Ultime is available as 35ml, 50ml, and 80ml Eau de Parfum.
output: L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime by Givenchy is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime was launched in 2023. L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime was created by Dominique Ropion, Anne Flipo and Fanny Bal. Top notes are Tunisian Orange Blossom, Jasmine Sambac and Tunisian Neroli; middle notes are Indian Tuberose and Cacao Pod; base notes are Indonesian Patchouli Leaf, Tobacco, Ambroxan and Haitian Vetiver.

input:
Guidance 46 by Amouage is an Exceptional Extrait created by perfumer Quentin Bisch under the direction of Chief Creative Officer Renaud Salmon. This fragrance reinterprets the Amouage triad of Rose, Frankincense, and Orientalgris, while introducing new elements such as Pear, Hazelnut, and Sandalwood. The scent is designed to heighten contrasts and reveal more of the mysteries at the heart of the Guidance story.
Guidance 46 Exceptional Extrait
Perfumer: Quentin Bisch
Olfactive family: Floral Woody
Ageing: 4 weeks (2 weeks maturation + 2 weeks maceration)
Concentration: Extrait de Parfum containing 46% pure perfume oils
Top notes: Pear, Frankincense, Hazelnut, Rose Water, Pink Pepper, Bitter Almond
Heart: Saffron, Rose, Sambac Jasmine, Osmanthus
Base: Cistus, Sandalwood, Akigalawood, Orientalgris, Vanilla, Ambrette, Georgywood, Cypriol
Available as a 100ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Guidance 46 by Amouage is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Guidance 46 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Rose Water, Pear, Hazelnut, Bitter Almond, Frankincense and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Rose, Osmanthus, Saffron and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sandalwood, Akigalawood, Vanilla, Ambrette, Georgywood, Ambergris, Labdanum and Cypriol.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Prada launches Paradoxe Intense, a new flanker of the 2022 pillar, Paradoxe. The new edition is described as an extraordinary floral bouquet with the freshness of the neroli bud and jasmine superinfusion with ambrofix and serenolide. Prada Paradoxe Intense embodies an exuberant celebration of the unexpected, harmoniously balancing of strength with graceful delicacy.
Just like its predecessor, Paradoxe Intense was created by perfumers Nadège Le Garlantezec, Shyamala Maisondieu, and Antoine Maisondieu.
Top notes: bergamot essence, neroli bud, pear
Heart: neroli esesence, jasmin superinfusion, moss   
Base: Serenolide, Moxalone, Ambrofix, vanilla Bourbon, natural vanillin
Prada Paradoxe Intense is available as 30, 50 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum and as a 100 ml refill.
output: Prada Paradoxe Intense by Prada is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Prada Paradoxe Intense was launched in 2023. Prada Paradoxe Intense was created by Nadège Le Garlantezec, Shyamala Maisondieu and Antoine Maisondieu. Top notes are Pear, Neroli and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Moss and Neroli Essence; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Vanilla, Amber, Ambrofix™ and Serenolide.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 reveals vanilla in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most delicious signature. Taken to its climax, the overdose of vanilla is tinged with that Guerlain je ne sais quoi which makes it a great perfume, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers increase the intoxication of vanilla by punctuating it with spicy notes. In the background, it is enveloped in musky notes and the famous opopanine, Guerlain's legendary amber accord.

Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.
output: Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 by Guerlain is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 was launched in 2023. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE charmed the world with its joyous, lively, and sparkling scent. Now, CHANEL presents a new, dazzling and elegant interpretation of it. A new chance is within reach.
2002: CHANEL unveils CHANCE, a gleeful and optimistic floral fragrance creation. A name redolent of success and achievement. “Chance is a way of being”, said Gabrielle Chanel. It is no coincidence; it must be created, honed, sought out. It is the product of effort and passion. Four interpretations of this now-iconic scent emerged, including CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE Eau de Toilette, a floral-sparkling fragrance with a modern, sophisticated, and decidedly light trail that features notes of jasmine and zesty citron paired with a teak wood accord. An invigorating composition with charming optimism.
2023: CHANEL reinterprets CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE Eau de Toilette, creating a version that combines the density of an Eau de Parfum with the brightness of the Eau de Toilette. For this unique composition, CHANEL Perfumer-Creator Olivier Polge amplified the intensity without overpowering its freshness—a challenge he met with great success. CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE Eau de Parfum has the same spontaneous, lively nature as the Eau de Toilette, but leaves behind a more intense trail. Rather than merely adjust the concentration, the perfumer composed something completely new, a fragrance in its own right. The citron accord has become exhilarating without losing its original juiciness; the jasmine is richer and more intense; and the teak wood accord reveals a more ambery facet, giving it a certain elegance.
OLIVIER POLGE CHANEL IN-HOUSE PERFUMER-CREATOR
What was the creative process behind CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE Eau de Parfum?
It involved making subtle changes in order to amplify the sensations provided by the Eau de Toilette. The idea was to go to extremes, to push the fresh notes even further, through citrus, and to add density with the base notes, ambery notes, for more vibration. The challenge with this was to increase its intensity, bring out the base notes, and add depth, all while maintaining its fresh quality.
Is this Eau de Parfum a radical departure from the spirit of the Eau de Toilette?
They have the same fresh, colorful scent profile, with jasmine being the common thread that connects them. This new version is more textured and ambery than the Eau de Toilette. To achieve that, intensity has been brought to every layer of the composition (top, heart, base).

How would you describe the difference between CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE Eau de Toilette and Eau de Parfum?
The Eau de Parfum is a fresh, woody scent that opens with a burst of zest that is even more invigorating and exhilarating than before, accentuated by a hint of aldehydes. In this variation, the floral heart of jasmine is richer and adds a luminous, full-bodied quality. The teak wood accord and its intensified ambery notes add richness and depth for a more present trail.
CHANCE EAU FRAÎCHE Eau de Parfum is available in sizes of 50ml and 100m starting August 2023.
output: Chance Eau Fraiche Eau de Parfum by Chanel is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Chance Eau Fraiche Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Citron and Aldehydes; middle note is Jasmine; base notes are Teak Wood and Amber.

Good Girl is unthinkable without the unmistakable stiletto, which is a symbol of female empowerment.The bottle has a beautiful finish in soft powder pink, making it an absolute eye-catcher!
Good Girl Blush was created by perfumers Quentin Bisch, Shyamala Maisondieu, and Christophe Raynaud.

Extraordinary just as she is. Divinely real. Radiating her natural power. Liberated and golden right down to the corset. Simply dazzling beneath her white box. What about the magnetism of this delicious marine floral fragrance? Signaling a true woman of character."

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Simple. Solar. Smiling. It is the scent of everlasting summer. Of holidays that never end. Of long lazy lunches with friends, out in the countryside, around a big wooden table. Of flowers that just keep on blooming.

Tender verdancy, pollen, honey from the linden tree with its lovely heart-shaped leaves, an emblem of softness and flexibility for the Celts. The honeyed, apricot inflexions of broom. The tender powder of heliotrope. A bucolic bouquet made still richer with a sprig of velvety jasmine Sambac. Underlined, like a stroke of shade intensifying the radiance of an afternoon in the sun, by the smoky earthiness of vetiver...

The first of a constellation of floral fragrances, Tilia is also, for its creator Marc-Antoine Barrois and his long-time accomplice, the perfumer Quentin Bisch, the name of an imaginary star. The one that shines on happy days. An ode to simplicity and optimism.
output: Tilia by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tilia was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Lime (Linden) Blossom, Jasmine Sambac and Broom; middle notes are Heliotrope, Orange Blossom and Vetiver; base notes are Ambrofix™ and Georgywood.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Fève Gourmande is the new name for Gourmand Coquin.
"A symbol of gourmet delight, the cocoa accord reveals chocolate notes that are equally sweet and bitter. Fève Gourmande plays on this contrast, moving from gourmandise to the point of excess. This loss of olfactory reference points creates a delectably surrealist cocoa. 

Floral and majestic rose shakes up the cocoa accord, heady with rum and spice notes. At the base, the woody elegance of patchouli warmed by the heat of smoky tea adds mystery to the chocolatey notes, revealing a new sensuality.
Cocoa is olfactively expressed in the form of an accord, composed by the perfumer. This accord with chocolatey, and delicately bitter notes gives the perfume a sensory, gourmand feel.
Between the gourmet pleasure of chocolate, the vertigo of rum notes and the refinement of rose, the cocoa note tips into an alternative reality.

“If it were a painting, it would be a surrealist work by Salvador Dalí.”

Fève Gourmande distorts the vision of gourmandise and transforms the cocoa accord into an incredibly addictive delight, like a surrealist painting by Salvador Dalí in which reality and dream combine, defying all logic."
Taking inspiration from the Guerlain heritage Square Bottle (1870), the L’Art & La Matière bottle is an exceptional object. Made by Pochet du Courval – the House’s historic glassmaker – it is endlessly refillable at selected Guerlain Boutiques.
"Normally associated with childhood, cocoa reveals a new maturity. In Fève Gourmande, it is singularly blended with the depth of a smoky tea accord and the luminous elegance of rose." - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer.
Available in 100 and 200ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Fève Gourmande by Guerlain is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Fève Gourmande was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk.

Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Olivier Polge asserts: "At the beginning of each creation, an element of inspiration is necessary and, in COMÈTE, the starting point was the idea of stardust. The comet is a strong symbol for CHANEL, and I am thinking in particular of the Comète pendant from the 1932 high jewelry collection. "When worn open and placed directly on the skin, it evokes the enveloping effect of a perfume on the skin".
With intensely floral and luminous notes, COMÈTE explores a new olfactory identity in the LES EXCLUSIFS DE CHANEL collection. Rich, elegant, and complex in nature, the Eau de Parfum is infused with the refreshing aroma of cherry blossoms, and this touch of brightness and purity transforms into a halo with notes of heliotrope blending with iris extract and musk harmony. This captivating fragrance, which envelops the skin in a mysterious charm, pays homage to its unique personality.
COMÈTE is a trail of stardust and a celestial jewel that chooses its own path and never deviates from it, reflecting Gabrielle Chanel. It is a halo of light, spreading a force of optimism for those who are convinced that the planets will align with their lucky star.
More unique and valuable than any other collection, the LES EXCLUSIFS DE CHANEL collection is embodied in a bottle with excellent and simple design, focusing all attention on the fragrance. COMÈTE is packaged in a sleek and timeless glass bottle with a black cap signed with the brand's monogram. Its box brings simplicity to the level of luxury and sophistication, taking the form of an elegant white jewelry box with a black trim.
Resembling a heritage seal, this delicate two-tone aesthetic accompanies the launch of COMÈTE, a special limited edition: an embossed representation of the legendary Comète necklace, created in 1932, seductively embracing all four sides of the box. In a final tribute to the brilliance of diamonds and stardust, the Double C logo on top of the box is highlighted with silver ink.
output: Comète by Chanel is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Comète was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Cherry Blossom and Aldehydes; middle notes are Iris and Heliotrope; base note is Musk.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
All the gold of J'adore in an essential, pure concentrate. For L'Or de J'adore, the new J'adore perfume, Perfume Creative Director for Parfums Dior Francis Kurkdjian, showcases the beauty of the J'adore flowers by heightening their nuances and accentuating their colors.

J'adore l'Or is a full and voluptuous perfume essence by Francis Kurkdjian for Dior that masterfully balances notes of orange blossom, jasmine grandiflorum and centifolia rose absolutes. Blossoming in their full glory, powerful and sensual, these flowers are the true gold of J'adore.

The iconic J’adore necklace has been redesigned to reflect the warmth of the scent, transformed into an organic and flowing precious metal, enveloping the J'adore l'Or bottle in an elegant embrace.
"I wanted to move from the aura of J'adore to the gold of J'adore. To its olfactory quintessence. I wanted to give this floral signature accents of purity by exaggerating the contours of the flowers, to bring out all their nuances and define a new texture, like enveloping liquid gold. A new, instantly attractive sensuality."—Francis Kurkdjian, Director of Dior Fragrance Creation
Available in 50ml bottles.
output: J'adore L'Or (2023) by Dior is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. J'adore L'Or (2023) was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian.

input:
Sentence A: All the gold of J'adore in an essential, pure concentrate. For L'Or de J'adore, the new J'adore perfume, Perfume Creative Director for Parfums Dior Francis Kurkdjian, showcases the beauty of the J'adore flowers by heightening their nuances and accentuating their colors.

J'adore l'Or is a full and voluptuous perfume essence by Francis Kurkdjian for Dior that masterfully balances notes of orange blossom, jasmine grandiflorum and centifolia rose absolutes. Blossoming in their full glory, powerful and sensual, these flowers are the true gold of J'adore.

The iconic J’adore necklace has been redesigned to reflect the warmth of the scent, transformed into an organic and flowing precious metal, enveloping the J'adore l'Or bottle in an elegant embrace.
"I wanted to move from the aura of J'adore to the gold of J'adore. To its olfactory quintessence. I wanted to give this floral signature accents of purity by exaggerating the contours of the flowers, to bring out all their nuances and define a new texture, like enveloping liquid gold. A new, instantly attractive sensuality."—Francis Kurkdjian, Director of Dior Fragrance Creation
Available in 50ml bottles.. Sentence B: J'adore L'Or (2023) by Dior is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. J'adore L'Or (2023) was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian..

Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 Eau de Parfum Intense is a delicious explosion of irresistible and edible notes including pistachio, voluptuous whipped cream, roasted hazelnut, sweet rum, fluffy marshmallow, and fizzy cotton candy. A truly yummy fragrance that charms with an unforgettably intense, gourmand scent trail that will have you smelling good enough to eat.
The Vibe: Yummy. Happy. Irresistible!
This scent opens with mouth-watering facets of hazelnut and pistachio blended with rum for a tantalizing first impression. In the heart, beautiful white peony creates a rosy, honey-like effect while the muguet helps maintain the luxurious balance of sweetness, freshness, and sophistication. As the dry down continues, enjoy a delicious overdose of whipped cream, fluffy marshmallows, and creamy sandalwood for an insanely delectable gourmand fragrance!

Middle Notes: Geranium, White Peony, Muguet, Jasmine, Raspberry, White Peach & Pear
Base Notes: Whipped Cream, Marshmallows, Cotton Candy, Turkish Delight Accord, Cocoa, Cedarwood, Sandalwood & Tonka

La Vie est Belle L'Elixir by Lancôme is a floral, fruity, gourmand fragrance designed to evoke a deep sense of liberation and self-confidence. This Eau de Parfum opens with sparkling notes of raspberry accord and Calabrian bergamot, leading to a heart of violet leaf absolute and rose heart absolute. The base features the rich scents of cocoa butter absolute, leather accord, and Virginia cedarwood.
Reimagined by Suzanne Dalton - a renowned glass designer - the iconic La Vie Est Belle smile is taken to the pinnacle of craftsmanship, where the iconic La Vie Est Belle smile is etched into the glass.
Available in 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

input:
Born in Roma Donna Green Stravaganza is an opulent fragrance that captures the essence of Rome's lush gardens and vibrant spirit. This floral-ambery scent, featuring a luxurious blend of Lapsang Souchong tea and Jasmine absolute, encapsulates the grandeur of the eternal city.
The fragrance belongs to the Floral-Orientaly family. It starts with the smoky and intriguing aroma of Lapsang Souchong Tea at the top. The heart of the fragrance is a radiant display of Jasmine Absolute, symbolizing modern femininity under the Roman sun. The scent culminates with a base of rich Vanilla Extract, sustainably sourced, adding a captivating and luxurious finish to this extraordinary olfactory journey.
Fragrance family: Floral-Orientaly
Top notes: Lapsang Souchong Tea Accord
Heart Notes: Jasmine Absolute
Base notes: Vanilla Extract
Born in Roma Donna Green Stravaganza is more than just a fragrance; it's an experience that invites you to embrace your unique identity and the freedom to express yourself. This scent is an ode to the iconic Valentino Rockstud, reflecting the daring and luxurious ethos of Maison Valentino.
The bottle's design pays homage to this iconic symbol, with an edgy pyramidal structure inspired by Roman architecture. Adorned with the distinctive Rockstud details and draped in vibrant green and black leather, the bottle is a bold statement of extravagance and style, embodying the essence of Valentino's fearless spirit.
output: Valentino Donna Born in Roma Green Stravaganza by Valentino is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Valentino Donna Born in Roma Green Stravaganza was launched in 2024. Top note is Lapsang Souchong Tea; middle note is Jasmine; base note is Vanilla.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Mona Kattan collaborates once again with dsm-firmenich’s perfumer Gabriela Chelariu to unveil Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81, a fragrance that takes marshmallows to a new level of indulgence.
In the spirit of the Yum Collection, Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81 Eau De Parfum Intense is an invitation to indulge in life’s most delicious pleasures! This fragrance features a delightful menu of mouthwatering notes including fluffy pink marshmallow, succulent strawberry, flaky coconut, delicate freesia, whipped vanilla, and pink musk. Boujee, fluffy, and delicious, this luxurious scent will linger with sweet temptation with every spritz.
"Our aim was to capture the essence of marshmallow with an intensity that feels almost tangible,” explains Chelariu. "This fragrance embodies marshmallow’s airy, melt-in-your-mouth texture while delivering an irresistible layer of sweetness. It’s a blend of succulent strawberries, bright florals, and a luscious sugary warmth that’s both sumptuous and alluring."
Pink is the heartbeat of this fragrance, infusing each layer with its radiant charm. From the sparkling opening notes of pink apple and juicy strawberries to the delicate pink musk and sugary raspberry base, Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81 envelops you in an intoxicating, candy-like haze. Every moment with this fragrance is a journey into a world where vibrant florals and the softness of marshmallow unite for a deeply sensual, utterly delicious experience.
“As a gourmand lover, I have always been addicted to sweet and delicious fragrances - especially ones that make me smell like my fav desserts! This is how Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 was inspired. Our Yum story continues with the addition of Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81, an incredibly boujee, fluffy, and indulgent juice - a sweet treat for your senses! The inspo behind the hero note, pink marshmallow, came shortly after my husband and I got married - he calls me his “marshmallow” because I always smell so sweet and comforting! To make the juice even more tempting, we added fresh strawberries, whipped vanilla cream and light, flaky coconut - making this fragrance one of our most irresistible scents to date!” - Mona Kattan
Top Notes: Pink Lady Apple, Italian Lemon, Freesia, Nectarine Blossom
Middle Notes: Orange Blossom Water, Pink Marshmallow, Strawberry, Coconut Flakes
Dry Notes: Whipped Vanilla, Raspberry Sugar, Pink Musk, Ambrox, KAYALI Signature Accord
output: Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81 by Kayali Fragrances is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Freesia, Italian Lemon, Nectarine blossom and Apple; middle notes are Marshmallow, Strawberry, Coconut and Orange Blossom; base notes are Whipped Cream, Sugar, Vanilla, Musk, Raspberry and Ambroxan.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Gaultier's garden, inspired by his Autumn/Winter show in 2010-2011, is a vibrant, flamboyant oasis, teeming with unique creatures and blossoms. This garden, reminiscent of a splendid Eden, is rich with forbidden delights.
In this lush haven, two fragrances, La Belle Paradise Garden and Le Beau Paradise Garden, intertwine in a passionate embrace.
The bottle of La Belle Paradise Garden is a masterpiece, resembling a blue lagoon, with only an intricately embroidered floral necklace as its decoration. This bottle, evoking the image of Eve with her alluring curves, symbolizes elegance and temptation. La Belle Paradise Garden represents freedom and sensuality.
The fragrance itself is an Eau de Parfum crafted by Quentin Bisch, a blend of floral, amber, and aquatic scents. This exotic La Belle Paradise Garden perfume captivates with its aphrodisiac qualities. It features the mysterious scent of blue lotus, the delicate elegance of iris, and the enchanting sweetness of vanilla, creating an irresistibly sensual olfactory experience.
Available as 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum as limited edition.
output: La Belle Paradise Garden by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Belle Paradise Garden was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top note is Blue Lotus; middle note is Iris; base note is Vanilla.

input:
Experience the new Acqua di Gioia EDP Intense, a lively fusion of citrus zest and succulent red fruits that encapsulates the eternal essence of an Italian summer. This captivating fragrance invites you to bask in the endless sunshine and azure waters of the Mediterranean, embodying the vibrant spirit of this captivating region.
At the forefront, a triumphant trio of radiant Italian citrus fruits mingles with a luscious red fruit blend, evoking the essence of sun-kissed days. Within the heart of the fragrance, delicate Damascena rose petals and aquatic jasmine grandiflorum unfurl, adding an air of enchantment.
In the depths, a clean woody musk base evokes the comforting warmth of a Mediterranean afternoon, completing the olfactory journey with a sense of tranquility.
Presented in a new, captivating bottle design, reminiscent of the iconic rounded silhouette of Acqua di Gioia, the vessel transitions from a transparent pale mint at its peak to a vivid turquoise hue at its base, mirroring the spectrum of hues found in the Mediterranean's waters.
output: Acqua di Gioia Intense by Giorgio Armani is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Acqua di Gioia Intense was launched in 2024. Top notes are Citruses and Red Fruits; middle notes are Jasmine and Damask Rose; base notes are Musk and Woodsy Notes.

input:
Embodying the rich legacy of the House of Creed, Carmina draws inspiration from the pages of fashion sketchbooks handed down through the Creed family for generations. It is a fragrance that pays homage to the audacious and spirited women depicted in these sketches, who are always poised for their next escapade. Carmina exudes warmth and sensuality, transporting us on a scented journey to exhilarating destinations. It strikes a contemporary note with the inclusion of black cherry and pink pepper, balanced by the classic scents of violet and subdued rose. A radiant glow emanates from the union of saffron with the softness of musk and amber. This floral-woody creation is enriched with the welcoming embrace of cashmere wood and refined woody notes, giving Carmina its irresistible allure.
CARMINA is available as a 30ml and 75ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Carmina by Creed is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Carmina was launched in 2023. Top notes are Black Cherry, Saffron and Pink Pepper; middle notes are May Rose, Peony, Violet and Cashmere Wood; base notes are Musk, Ambroxan, Myrhh and Frankincense.

input: Gold, flowers, great desire. Scandal Absolu, the absolute scandal to the point of addiction. To create a “Scandal”, this fragrance costs a lot: overwhelming materials and daring encounters as well as delicious sensations. Dare to indulge in the most eccentric and irresistible pleasures: floral indecency or syrupy black fig. Let your bare legs play on the slopes of the senses, uninhibited and full of sensuality. Turn night into day and never let it end. It's just midnight: Let the “Scandal” begin!

"Infused with the sweet and sensual scent of tobacco, this is a poetic ode to those who burn life at both ends.
To those for whom excess is a way of life, who love celebrating the pleasures of living in the most opulent luxury. To those who know that time flies so fast that life must be lived intensely and celebrated to the hilt.
Living dangerously has its limits, and disenchantment is inevitable. When the party ends and the smokescreen falls, lost illusions resurface. A tragic and fascinating reality check."
"Quick, quick, the world is ending! Our very existence needs urgent tending.
Amid the roar of the cannons, the champagne flows. Corks in the air, could they be aflame?
Beneath the smokescreen, life is a decadent game." - Serge Lutens
Available in 50 and 100 ml.
output: Écrin de Fumée by Serge Lutens is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Écrin de Fumée was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: In 1992, Mugler redefined the world of fragrances by launching the pioneering gourmand scent encapsulated in an iconic blue star-shaped bottle: Angel. Now, Mugler is excited to unveil an audacious addition to the Angel collection — a bold new black star bottle, introducing Angel Fantasm Eau de Parfum Sensuelle. This fragrance transforms the legendary into the ultimate fantasy, offering a supremely sensual rendition of Angel. Angel Fantasm is a daringly feminine concoction, blending ambery, gourmand, and fruity notes. It features a captivating mix of juicy fruits, rich creamy coconut, and delicate patchouli, enhancing Angel Eau de Parfum’s inherently sensuous characteristics to new heights. Encased in a mesmerizing black star bottle — a first in the Angel series — Angel Fantasm is a tribute to irresistible allure. Embrace your most intense fantasies with Angel Fantasm Eau de Parfum Sensuelle.
output: Angel Fantasm by Mugler is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Angel Fantasm was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pineapple and Bergamot; middle notes are Coconut and Tiare Flower; base notes are Patchouli, Bourbon Vanilla and Amber.

"The unique signature of La Nuit Trésor reaches a new level of sensuality and passion with La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum—the most intense fragrance in the collection. This new scent is an elixir of Rose Absolute wrapped in notes of bitter cocoa extract and blackcurrants.
La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum is a subtle blend of surprise and the tenderness of long-awaited love. Le Parfum becomes every woman's most precious ally, offering her moments of utmost value and the secrets of the night—embraced within the elixir of Rose Absolute and bitter cocoa notes. instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Rediscover the trail of Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet through a fragrant declaration of love narrated by Natalie Portman, where the freshness of rose and peony notes mingle with the caress of a white musk veil.
Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette has been composed like a floral embrace, both lively and tender. It is a faceted and spontaneous bouquet of newly blossomed flowers. Its contrasting trail opens with the intensity of the feeling of love at sight, conveyed in the lively notes of sweet pea and bergamot. 

A duo of Damascus rose and peony notes then unfurls with nobleness, like a passionate and radiant emotion. A soft, light accord of white musks rounds off the bouquet of this fragrance that tells the story of love.

The Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet fragrance is housed in a bottle with an elevated identity: the Miss Dior bow, woven with multicolored Lurex threads for a "Millefiori" effect, gives the fragrance an added couture detail. This ingenious jacquard bow, inspired by a bouquet of a thousand colored flowers, was crafted in the guarded workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers: Maison Faure, founded in 1864."
Available as 30, 50, 100, and 150ml EDT.
output: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023) by Dior is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023) was launched in 2023. Top notes are Sweet Pea and Bergamot; middle notes are Peony and Damask Rose; base note is White Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In 2023, Gucci introduces Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia, a new flanker in the line of Flora by Gucci. The fragrance invites you to step into a world of confidence and inner strength as the latest addition to the  Floral Fantasy collection.

Presented in a purple lacquered bottle. The scent adds a new dimension to the #Florafontasy universe. Designed to celebrate inner strength, its powerful spirit is once again embodied by multi-platinum-selling recording artist, songwriter, and trailblazer Miley Cyrus in the transportive campaign, directed and shot by artist Petra Collins.
In 2021 Miley Cyrus debuted as the face of Flora Fantasy, a world brimming with flowers, flutty animals, and kawaii cuteness. Constantly shitting between dreams and reality, this virtual space is inspired by the Gucci flora collection of fragrances, each built around a noble flower. Within various scenarios, all forms of happiness are represented here. A garden inhabited by kittens and puppies is home to the pink bottle of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia.
While the turquoise bottle of Gucci Flors Gorgeous Jasmine blends effortlessly with the comforting bedroom space, now, the latest chapter of the story sees Miley stepping out of the house and into the outdoors, radiating confidence and an intuitive mindset through Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia.

Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Eau de Parfum

Perfumers Daphné Bugey and Marie Salamagne's creation is filled with unexpected yet complementary notes. Taking inspiration from free-spirited women, the scent is built around Magnolia Alba, an ancient and rare plant that requires a specific harvest and careful distillation process. A clary sage-like edge balances its fruity, floral sweetness to reflect an intuitive nature. The resulting Magnolia Essence exudes cheerfulness and a luminous noble spirit.

To enhance the sweetness of the Magnolia Essence, a Dewberries Accord is added for a fruity, juicy dimension, striking a balance between freshness and sensuality. Parchoul Essence is then used to around the scent. The perfumers capture the plant's intense woodiness from Indonesia's best-quality Patchoull, creating a subtly earthy and leathery aroma.

Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia also features Blond Woods which provides a gentle, sensual touch, while Coconut Accord delivers an irresistible vanilla freshness that is both smooth and addictive. Finally, the Jasmine Sambac Absolute lends a green intensity and warmth that comes together with a mellowing trail of Musk.
The House's iconic Flora pattern, featuring vibrant blooms and rich hues, adorns both the bottle and outer packaging of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia. Wrapped in a captivating purple shade, the scent acts as a lucky charm and a reminder to trust in oneself.

Artist Petra Collins captures the Campaign. The Flora Fantasy campaign transports viewers to a captivating inner world where Miley Cyrus is the protagonist. In the new visual, Miley holds the Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia bottle in the sun in a vast outdoor space win pastel-tinted skies. The hues conure to the film's surreal spirit, a fantasy that moves from a heightened reality to an anime adventure. Throughout the journey, Miley moves from cuddling animals in the garden of a house to playing an electric guitar on the beach. The film ends with new scenes displaying the three Gucci Flora scents on the sands of limitless outdoor space. Here the golden pink skies reflect the infinite possibilities of one's own dreamland.
Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia is available as a 10, 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau De Parfum.
output: Flora Gorgeous Magnolia by Gucci is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flora Gorgeous Magnolia was launched in 2023. Flora Gorgeous Magnolia was created by Daphné Bugey and Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Dewberry, Coconut and Orange; middle notes are Magnolia, Jasmine Sambac, Ylang-Ylang and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Blonde Woods.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
HUNDRED SILENT WAYS has always been one of the top 5 bestsellers of NISHANE in global markets. HUNDRED SILENT WAYS X is designed to maintain the overall mood that the original fragrance (launched in 2016) offers. The leathery notes were resorted to be able to add an even more elegant touch to the original formula. HUNDRED SILENT WAYS X is a deliciously captivating fragrance that combines the elegance of floral notes with the richness of gourmand accords.
The fragrance opens with a juicy burst of mandarin and peach, leading to a heart of delicate gardenia, iris, jasmine, and heliotrope. The base notes of vanilla, leather, and patchouli give the fragrance a sensual and warm character, making it perfect for those who appreciate a relatively sweet and comforting scent. HUNDRED SILENT WAYS X is a must-try for those who love the original fragrance and are looking for a new take on the charming mood the original formula has.
TOP NOTES
tuberose - mandarin - peach
HEART NOTES
gardenia - orris - jasmine - heliotrope
BASE NOTES
vanilla - leather - patchouli
output: Hundred Silent Ways X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hundred Silent Ways X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Peach, Tuberose and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Gardenia, Jasmine, Heliotrope and Iris; base notes are Leather, Vanilla and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar is the new feminine fragrance from Giorgio Armani. An addictive fruity and floral expression, born from the contrast between juicy pear and creamy radiant tuberose. This modern and floral Eau de Parfum from Armani for women is timeless and elegant.
My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar fragrance notes Fragrance family: Floral, Fruity
Top notes: Bergamot Calabria, Orange blossom, Pear accord
Heart Notes: Tuberose Absolute, Jasmine Superinfusion, Violet leaf
Base notes: Bourbon Vanilla, White Musk, Cedarwood

Fruity floral scent My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar captures the essence of enchantment in an intoxicating composition. The top note reveals a refreshing fusion of Bergamot Heart Calabria, juicy Pear, and the intoxicating scent of Orange Blossom. The heart features the mighty Tuberose Absolute, accompanied by Jasmine Grandiflorum Superinfusion and a hint of Violet Leaf Accord. The base embraces the senses with sustainably sourced Bourbon Vanilla from Madagascar, enveloped by warm Cedarwood and a subtle addition of White Musk. These harmonious fragrance notes create a timeless aura of irresistible elegance.
The bottle of My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar is a visual masterpiece that reflects the essence of the fragrance. With a refreshing pink hue, the bottle brings a new, vibrant interpretation of the My Way collection. It retains the recognizable rounded yet square shape, while the all-pink look, including the talisman cap, adds a vibrant look.
output: My Way Nectar by Giorgio Armani is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. My Way Nectar was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pear, Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine and Violet Leaf; base notes are White Musk, Bourbon Vanilla and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I designed an ultra-modern Alien, reaching the quintessence of florality.”
- Dominique Ropion, Master Perfumer
A radical rebirth of Alien, Alien Hypersense Eau de Parfum takes the captivating essence of the original Alien fragrance and drives it into a new hyperbolic and hypnotic territory. Curated by Mugler with Dominique Ropion, the ultimate Master Perfumer who composed the original Alien Eau de Parfum in 2005, this new woody, floral fragrance showcases Mugler’s boundless imagination and distinctive expertise, igniting the awakening of your hypersenses through three captivating revelations.
The awakening revelation
The awakening revelation promises a vivid and enlivening experience. Hyper-tempting and vibrant, Green Mandarin Superessence arouses your senses, while the juicy Pear Accord is so crisp and ripe you could almost taste it.
The overblooming revelation
The overblooming revelation reveals a fiercely hypnotic facet and a hyperbolic femininity. Harvested from Mugler’s own field in India, precious Jasmine Sambac over blooms here in exceptional quality for a sensual and palatial scent. Its white petals, skin-soft, bloom on your skin, exuding an opulence that is quintessentially Mugler.
The electrifying revelation
The electrifying revelation is what unleashes your inner Alien. Smooth as musk and silky as driftwood, Cashmeran reveals the salty, sexy, sun-kissed tinge of amber woods, radiating an aura of enticing hyper-sensuality.
output: Alien Hypersense by Mugler is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Alien Hypersense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Pear and Green Mandarin; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac and Indian Jasmine; base notes are Cashmeran, Musk, Amberwood and Driftwood.

input:
Parfums de Marly introduces its first-ever limited-edition flacon to celebrate the iconic Delina eau de parfum and its multi-faceted, addictive Damascena rose. An ode to the 18th century and, above all, to femininity.
Inspired by the floral motifs in 18th-century interiors, a climbing rose evokes Nature's way of prevailing, whether the flower overtakes the bottle or blossoms when worn. For collectors, the Delina Limited Edition is a must-have.
At the heart of this eau de parfum is the Damascena rose, the most noble of them all, blossoming upon contact with the skin and imprinting its distinctive signature. Elevated by notes of lychee and enveloped in vanilla and white musk.
output: Delina Limited Edition by Parfums de Marly is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Delina Limited Edition was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Litchi, Bergamot and Rhubarb; middle notes are Vanilla, May Rose and Peony; base notes are Musk, Cashmeran and Vetiver.

input:
In 2023, Chanel introduced the new version of the iconic Chanel N°19 Eau de Toilette. The fragrance, with a contrasting accord composed of green and powdery notes, pays tribute to the day Mademoiselle was born—August 19, 1883.
"A daring, distinctive fragrance. A floral-woody-green fragrance with perfect balance. The last fragrance launched and worn by Gabrielle Chanel. An uncompromising composition, in the image of Mademoiselle.
A daring floral-woody-green fragrance that plays with contrasts. A perfect balance between the vibrant, green notes of Galbanum and the soft, powdery notes of Iris Pallida."
"The last fragrance Gabrielle Chanel ever launched or wore. A fragrance that pays tribute to the day she was born: August 19, 1883.  When the idea for this new women's fragrance came to mind, she met with resistance from those around her who did not think a new fragrance could exist alongside N°5. But Coco refused to give up and asked Henri Robert for a composition with a personality just as strong as that of N°5. And her request was granted, in a completely different olfactory composition: a contrasting accord of green and powdery notes. Mademoiselle passed away just a few weeks after the launch of the new fragrance, on January 10, 1971."

Available in 100ml Eau de Toilette.
output: Chanel N°19 Eau de Toilette (2023) by Chanel is a Floral Green fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Chanel N°19 Eau de Toilette (2023) was launched in 2023.

A tribute to Vietnam's cultural symbol of livelihood - the white jasmine rice. Found at nearly every Vietnamese meal, the humble bowl of rice has nurtured generations. This scent presents a subtly sweet aroma, harmonizing gentle softness with the rice grain's nuttiness. As you savor it, you embrace the heart of Vietnamese culture, where humble beginnings flourish into enduring strength.
Gender: Unisex
Top Notes: Rice, Pandan
Heart Notes: Orris, Jasmine
Base Notes: White Musk, Cedarwood, Tonka Bean

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The concept:
Bold, feminine, and fearless, embark on an outdoor adventure with Daisy Wild, the newest addition to the iconic Daisy Marc Jacobs collection. The new refillable fragrance exudes a freshness reminiscent of a wildflower bouquet. It inspires us to reconnect with nature and embody our young, free-spirited selves.
The design:
Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs introduces a new flower to the cap. Inspired by a wildflower bouquet, this wild daisy harmoniously blends with pink and green iconic daisy flowers. Inside the bottle, flower stems peep through, for yet another playful display of nature’s allure. The juice is reimagined in a light green shade to complete the new color story of Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs.
For the first time ever, this Daisy fragrance is fully refillable. All the Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs fragrances (30ml, 50ml, and 100ml sizes) can be refilled with a 150ml refill format. The Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs box is reimagined in a beautiful vibrant green color. The new wild daisy flower is elegantly mixed amidst pink and green signature daisy flowers. The flower border on the carton is now ‘overgrown’, playing to the blooming wilderness emblematic of the product.
The fragrance:
Daisy Wild blends notes of banana blossom, never seen before in prestige perfumery, with an exquisite jasmine and nutty vetiver. These notes create a new addictive scent that beautifully captures the essence of nature.
Top: Banana blossom accord
Heart: Jasmine, macadamia accord
Base: Sandalwood, vetiver des sables
Fragrance house: Givaudan
Perfumers: Sonia Constant, Roxanne Kirkpatrick, and Adriana Medina

The campaign:
Shot by photographer Nick Newbold, the campaign transports you to a lush green landscape, following the cast on an adventure in the woods. The cast features a group of up-and-coming talent spanning different interests and industries. Together, they embark on a road trip, sharing moments of genuine elation. The campaign is an authentic exploration of youthfulness and spontaneity, igniting a sense of nostalgia. Their escapade is an encouragement to get in touch with your inner child and reconnect with nature.
Director/Photographer: Nick Newbold
Talent: Ever Anderson, Grace Burns, Alva Claire, Nailea Devora, Marlee Guillory, Erin Kim, Sophia Santamarina, Stevie Sims, Lennon Sorrenti
Stylist: Katie Grand
Hair: James Pecis
Makeup: Diane Kendal
Location: Atlanta, GA
Date: October 2022
The line-up:
Daisy Wild 30ml (Refillable)
Daisy Wild 50ml (Refillable)
Daisy Wild 100ml (Refillable)
Daisy Wild 10ml Pen Spray
Daisy Wild 150ml Refill Bottle
Daisy Wild 150ml Body Lotion
Daisy Wild 150ml Shower Gel
output: Daisy Wild by Marc Jacobs is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Daisy Wild was launched in 2024. Daisy Wild was created by Sonia Constant, Roxanne Kirkpatrick and Adriana Medina-Baez. Top note is Banana Flower; middle notes are Jasmine and Macadamia; base notes are Vetiver and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Like Cirque du Soleil’s elaborate stage shows, L'eau de Parfum by Cirque du Soleil offers a journey that elevates classic olfactory notes to dazzling new heights, weaving a delicate synthesis of bergamot, red apple, and cotton candy, iris and freesia, buttery popcorn, and warm sandalwood, vanilla bean, and caramelized amber. The glass bottle is crowned with an Art Deco tiered top and a ridged gold stopper featuring a large sun rising above the moon, paying homage to the “circus of the sun.”
TOP: BERGAMOT NATUREPRINT®, COTTON CANDY, RED APPLE SMELL-THE-TASTE
MID: IRIS PETALS, FRESH FREESIA, BUTTERY POPCORN ACCORD
DRY: VANILLA BEAN, SANDALWOOD, CARAMELIZED AMBER
output: L'eau de Parfum by Cirque du Soleil is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'eau de Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexis Grugeon. Top notes are Cotton Candy, Red Apple and Bergamot; middle notes are Butter, Popcorn, Freesia and Iris Petals; base notes are Caramel, Vanilla Bean, Amber and Sandalwood.

The newest edition is celebrating 20 anniversary of Narciso Rodriguez For Her Eau de Toilette fragrance, launched in 2003. A scent that is truly recognizable and does not get old in its beauty and creativity over all these years, a musky and powdery masterpiece of the perfumers Christine Nagel and Francis Kurkdjian.
Notes of the newest edition combine the rich white florals (African orange blossom, Tuberose, Gardenia, Jasmine), Osmanthus, Frangipani, the Narciso musk specialty, and patchouli.

input:
Blu Mediterraneo Mandarino di Sicilia is a fragrance inspired by Sicily's sun-drenched landscapes, where architecture and culture merge with nature's splendor, encapsulating the Italian Arte di Vivere as a state of mind. The fragrance blends fresh, green notes of mandarin with a heart of Italian citrus, creating a lively and refreshing sensation.
The fragrance opens with the invigorating aroma of green mandarin, sparkling with an effervescent blend of bergamot, lemon, and juicy red orange. This combination wraps the scent in the brightness of a Sicilian summer, radiating intense emerald nuances and a lively freshness. In its heart, the green hue of the mandarin meets the freshness of the notes of petit-grain and spearmint in a blend that extends the fragrance's longevity. The cedarwood base note completes this green sensation, while the musk note adds a clean, sophisticated brilliance.
Green Mandarin, Bergamot, Lemon, Blood orange
Petitgrain, Spearmint
Patchouli, Cedarwood, Musk
output: Mandarino di Sicilia by Acqua di Parma is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mandarino di Sicilia was launched in 2024. Top notes are Green Mandarin, Blood Orange, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Petitgrain and Spearmint; base notes are Musk, Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In 2024, Viktor&Rolf is introducing Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum, an enchanting fragrance that transports you to the heart of untamed nature. This scent is a vibrant and captivating experience that awakens your senses.
The perfume begins with a burst of radiant coconut milk accord, creating a solar-like explosion that radiates warmth. A lush floral bouquet takes center stage in the fragrance's heart, featuring the exotic and wild tiger lily accord. This floral note is skillfully paired with the alluring essence of mango, which intertwines gracefully with the rich benzoin base, igniting a passionate sensuality.
Designed for the bold and sensual woman who exudes confidence, Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum embraces femininity with unapologetic authority. Flowerbomb Tiger Lily, in particular, harnesses the power of the wild tiger lily, symbolizing confidence and allowing your sensuality to roar.
Flowerbomb by Viktor&Rolf is renowned for its distinctive bottle, resembling a diamond-cut pomegranate adorned with a sun-kissed amber hue. This design perfectly embodies the multifaceted nature of modern women, who are both explosive and dynamic.
Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum can be found in convenient 50ml and 100ml spray formats.
Emily Ratajkowski, widely known as Emrata, is the face of Flowerbomb. She embodies the essence of the Flowerbomb woman - strong, feminine, and unafraid to embrace her power. Emily invites women to celebrate their femininity, recognizing its transformative influence on the world.
output: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily by Viktor&Rolf is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flowerbomb Tiger Lily was launched in 2024. Top notes are Coconut Milk and Bergamot; middle notes are Tyger Lily, Jasmine and Freesia; base notes are Mango and Benzoin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"My dear Madeleine, many times have I heard these stories, and never once have we tired of them. You forged and filled my imagination. Your tales of the tribulations and wild imaginings of the different members of our family are so close to my heart that they seem like a dream to me.
I now have, thanks to you, my great theatre of memories, in which fantastic fables worthy of Jules Verne endlessly re-enact. You have surrounded me with all your attentions and are in all my happy memories. I owe my first olfactory memories to you : rhubarb tart, Auton pear jam, egg cream and all the other desserts I've patiently prepared alongside you.
This Blue Madeleine fragrance is for you.»
Intimately linked to emotions, olfactive memory has the ability to revive deeply buried memories with intense vividness. A simple inhalation of a familiar scent can transport you instantaneously to a precise moment in your past, evoking long-forgotten sensations, emotions and experiences. Perfume, like the most powerful of all memories, awakens the olfactory memory that makes us suddenly and intensely relive those moments.
"...I raised to my lips a spoonful of the tea in which I had soaked a morsel of the cake. No sooner had the warm liquid mixed with the crumbs touched my palate than a shudder ran through me and I stopped, intent upon the extraordinary thing that was happening to me. (…) A delicious pleasure had invaded me, isolated me, without my being able to grasp its cause. (…) And suddenly the memory revealed itself." »
Extrait « Du côté de chez Swann » – Marcel Proust.
Top: Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Cinnamon
Heart: Rose Centifolia «infusion pays», Black Tea, Milky Note
Base: Cade, Peruvian Balsam, Praline, Sandalwood
output: Blue Madeleine by Atelier des Ors is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blue Madeleine was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Cinnamon and Bergamot; middle notes are Black Tea, Milk and Rose; base notes are Peru Balsam, Sandalwood, Cade oil and Praline.

input: "The scent that captivated the senses of the American public 25 years ago is making its comeback this spring. Lolita Lempicka Le Parfum, the storied French fragrance with an intoxicating nectar of liquorice flower, anise, amarena cherry, violet and tonka bean, returns to US available exclusively at Macys.com. The fragrance now features a composition of its classic formula that is vegan and without coloring agents, fixatives, filters, or endocrine disruptors. Lolita Lempicka products also proudly flaunt the One Voice label to indicate that no animal testing has taken place during production. All production decisions are based upon the principles of smart and sustainable consumption for the protection of consumers and the planet. The fragrance will once again feature its iconic, forbidden apple-shaped bottle." (a note from the brand)
output: Lolita Lempicka Le Parfum 2023 by Lolita Lempicka is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Lolita Lempicka Le Parfum 2023 was launched in 2023. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Lattafa Her Confession Eau De Parfum Spray is a mesmerizing fragrance for Women that beautifully balances warmth, mystery, and elegance. It begins with a captivating blend of cinnamon and mystical accords, creating an intriguing and inviting opening. As the scent unfolds, a luxurious heart of jasmine, tuberose, and incense emerges, adding floral richness and depth, while mahonial enhances the fragrance with a subtle yet enchanting touch. The tonka beans, musk, and vanilla base notes provide a sensual and long-lasting foundation, leaving a trail of warmth and allure. Her Confession is the perfect scent for the modern woman who exudes confidence, charm, and a hint of mystery, making it ideal for any occasion.
Top Notes: Cinnamon and Mystikal

Middle Notes: Jasmine, Tuberose, Incense and Mahonial

Base Notes: Tonka Beans, Musk and Vanilla
output: Her Confession by Lattafa Perfumes is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Her Confession was launched in 2024. Top notes are Mystikal and Cinnamon; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine, Incense and Mahonial; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
GABRIELLE CHANEL L'EAU is a fresh floral composition, tinged with sparkling and fruity notes which brings new radiance to the radiance of the GABRIELLE line.
GABRIELLE CHANEL L'EAU is a floral composition, fresh and fruity, created around four flowers: jasmine, exotic and intense, ylang-ylang, with fruity and bright notes, orange blossom, fresh and sparkling, and tuberose from Grasse, creamy and intensely feminine. Considered the most captivating of all flowers, Grasse tuberose is reworked in a new harmony to accentuate its green and vegetal facets. The floral heart of GABRIELLE CHANEL L’EAU is illuminated by sparkling notes with accents of red fruits.
output: Gabrielle L'Eau by Chanel is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Gabrielle L'Eau was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Red Berries and Green Notes; middle notes are Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Tuberose and Ylang Ylang; base notes are Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Chanel launched Cristalle Eau Verte Eau de Parfum in 2023 as a new version of Cristalle Eau Verte (EDT) from 2009, which was a modern successor of Cristalle fragrance from 1974.
"A breath of green nature, rays of crystalline light. A transparent floral-green-fresh fragrance that blossoms with a delicate and subtle Magnolia accord.
CRISTALLE draws inspiration from Gabrielle Chanel's taste for life in the great outdoors and her natural yet sophisticated femininity. Its name evokes the transparency and purity of the fragrance.

CRISTALLE EAU VERTE is another interpretation of the CRISTALLE fragrance. A variation on Magnolia, recomposing its delicateness and Citrus-Jasmine notes using the purest raw materials."
Available in 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Cristalle Eau Verte Eau de Parfum by Chanel is a Floral Green fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Cristalle Eau Verte Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 reveals the tonka bean in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most addictive signature. Overdosed with natural tonka and a hint of coumarin, the deliciousness of the tonka bean is intoxicating, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers enhance the almond facet of the tonka bean by enriching it with bitter almond essence and a microdose of coumarin. Pushing the addiction to its peak, the tonka bean becomes burning on contact with vanilla, cocoa and hot spices.

Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.
output: Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 by Guerlain is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 was launched in 2023. Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Our first-ever female-inspired fragrance, Sirène, is crafted for those who dare to stand out.
Sirene embodies the essence of mystery, sensuality, and empowerment. Beginning with a captivating burst of cherries, a bold declaration of feminine strength that demands attention. At its core, a melody of incense weaves a dance of elegance and intrigue - an invitation to a journey of self-discovery and personal growth, encouraging you to unlock and embrace the Sirène within.
TOP NOTES
Cherry, Pepper

MIDDLE NOTES
Oud, Incense, Lactonic

BASE NOTES
Moss, Benzoin, Cistus, Labdanum, Cypriol

Available in 75ml bottle.
output: Sirène by Fragrance Du Bois is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Sirène was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nanako Ogi. Top notes are Cherry and Pepper; middle notes are Oud, Lactones and Incense; base notes are Benzoin, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Labdanum and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Included in the first-ever NISHANE collection launched globally in the year 2015, WŪLÓNG CHÁ has reached a huge fanbase worldwide thanks to the journey it takes the wearer to the serene tea gardens of the Far East, where the delicate notes of oolong tea leaves and Mediterranean fig fill the air. The original WŪLÓNG CHÁ has been celebrated mainly because of its robust power of refreshing notes. However, WŪLÓNG CHÁ X is designed to mute the sharp edges of the original formula and enhance it with the addition of florals namely magnolia. This fragrance opens with a burst of zesty citrus notes of bergamot, orange, mandarin, and yuzu, transporting the wearer to the sunny shores of the Mediterranean. As the scent settles, the heart notes of magnolia, thyme oil, and green tea weave a magical spell around you, evoking the tranquil stillness of a teatime. Finally, the musk and fig base notes provide a warm and grounding finish to this fragrance that will keep the wearer feeling fresh and revitalized all day.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - yuzu - litsea - mandarin
HEART NOTES
magnolia - thyme oil - green tea
BASE NOTES
musk - fig
output: Wulong Cha X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Wulong Cha X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Bergamot, Yuzu, Litsea Cubeba and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Green Tea, Magnolia and Thyme; base notes are Musk and Fig.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Light Blue Summer Vibes reinvents the two iconic fragrances for him and her. Made in Italy  using only the highest quality raw materials, these fragrances are brought to life by the  craftsmanship and attention to detail inherent in Dolce&Gabbana’s DNA, characterized by  the majolica print that embellishes the iconic bottles.
Crafted by master perfumer Olivier Cresp, the iconic fragrance Light Blue is tinged with novelty thanks to its fruity notes and woody touch. Keeping the classic base of fresh citrus, flowers, and warm notes, this rendition opens with notes of Calabrian Bergamot. The heart of the fragrance reveals the sweetness of ripe peaches. As a finishing touch, the pleasant woody warmth of amber.
Light Blue Summer Vibes comes in an elegant rectangular glass bottle, while Light Blue Summer Vibes  Pour Homme comes in a trapezoidal bottle with soft lines. Both feature the classic silhouette of Light  Blue fragrances and are embellished with a white cap.
The campaign is an homage to spontaneity and passion. The protagonists, the iconic couple Bianca Balti and David Gandy under the shade of the Faraglioni amidst the crystal-clear waters surrounding the spellbinding Capri Island. From the boat to the shore, right up to the sun-drenched terrace steeped in scents of lemon trees, the couple shares intimate moments of smiles, jokes, and passion. An intense and profound attraction that captures the energy of summer on the seaside. Director Steve Brahms unveils intimate glimpses of a shared life full of tenderness and love with the notes of the song Parlami d’amore Mariù in the background.
output: Light Blue Summer Vibes by Dolce&Gabbana is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Light Blue Summer Vibes was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top note is Calabrian bergamot; middle note is Peach; base note is Cedar.

input:
"Commanding yet tender at the same time. Rooted in lushness, FATHER FIGURE is a vivid green fragrance that captures the intimate feeling of cool. Opening with fleshy fig and dewy cassis, then folding into a creamy sandalwood, orris root, vanilla Madagascar, FATHER FIGURE is layered and vibrant. Skin musks and sheer patchouli add intimacy and sensuality."
"This fragrance is inspired by hidden gardens. There is a contrast between the vivid greenness and something more skin-like. The milky nectar of fig compliments buttery suede qualities of orris to create a naturally sensual effect." - Frank Voelkl.
Top: Waterlily, Lush Fig, Cassis Buds
Heart: Orris Root, Iris Flower, Jasmine Dew
Base: Skin Musks, Vanilla Madagascar, Patchouli Leaf, Sandalwood
Available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Father Figure by Phlur is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Father Figure was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Frank Voelkl. Top notes are Fig, Water Lily and Cassis; middle notes are Iris, Orris Root and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Madagascar Vanilla and Patchouli Leaf.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In 2023, Chanel launched a new edition of Cristalle Eau de Parfum, originally presented in 1993 as a take on the original Cristalle Eau de Toilette from 1974. It is described as a floral-fresh fragrance with pure elegance.
"The invigorating breath of a weekend in the country, the reflection of a pure and free elegance. A floral-fresh fragrance with a balance of character and transparency. Strong and light. Natural yet sophisticated.
A vibrant, delicate composition that opens with a fresh and fruity burst. The heart blossoms with green notes of Hyacinth, softened with a Honeysuckle accord. A fragrance with a trail of scent tinged with Absolutes of Jasmine and Iris from Florence.
CRISTALLE draws inspiration from Gabrielle Chanel's taste for life in the great outdoors and her natural yet sophisticated femininity. Its name evokes the transparency and purity of the fragrance."
Available in 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Cristalle Eau de Parfum (2023) by Chanel is a Floral Green fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Cristalle Eau de Parfum (2023) was launched in 2023. Top notes are Citruses and Fruity Notes; middle notes are Hyacinth and Honeysuckle; base notes are Jasmine and Iris.

input:
This 2024 crafted signature scent is a testament to florality that expands the boundaries of sensory perception. This unique fresh and floral signature is augmented by Artificial Intelligence that enables perfumers to explore new possibilities and express their creativity, and compose new and unexpected accords with a jasmine accord.
Paradoxe Virtual Flower Eau de Parfum is a floral musky fragrance that captures the airy floral scent of Jasmine as perceived in nature. The signature reveals fresh and zesty top notes of Italian Vert de Bergamot, a lively flowery heart incorporating Jasmine accord and Neroli, and base notes of Musk and Ambrette for comfort. This feminine eau de parfum is ideal for Spring and Summer with its fresh and floral olfactive profile and impressive longevity.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A distinguished rose combining power and gentleness.
Rose Amira is a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
The Allegoria fragrance collection celebrates the wonders of the world. Each creation pays tribute to nature’s beauty and sweeps us up in a discovery of exceptional raw ingredients and notes, beautifully enhanced by our perfumer-explorers. Discover Rose Amira, a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
"Rose Amira is my vision of rose, sumptuous and sensual within the secrecy of the night. A rose stood upright, turned towards the moon, within a poetic, nocturnal fragrance.” - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer   Absolus Allegoria, the absolute fragrance collection, is an enchanting and mysterious journey to the heart of the world’s wonders once night falls fragrance trails celebrating deep and powerful nature, revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.
A powerful symbol of Guerlain's commitment to the planet, Absolus Allegoria fragrances contain up to 90% natural origin. The French beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.  Rose Amira comes in the Allegoria collection’s emblematic bottle made in France using 15% recycled glass. Featuring a removable spray pump and transparent lacquer finish, its design can be easily recycled. 90% to 94% of ingredients are of natural origin, by ISO 16128, the calculation includes water.
output: Rose Amira by Guerlain is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rose Amira was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk.

input:
A new intense and alluring interpretation of La Vie Est Belle embodied by our iconic Iris Pallida, 10x more concentrated, diffusing an irresistible floral heart. Encapsulated in a reinvented bottle with an infinite crystal smile.
- A CELEBRATION OF INFINITE, INTENSE HAPPINESS
- A MORE CONCENTRATED AND ALLURING IRIS SIGNATURE
- A RADIANTING NEW BOTTLE WITH AN INFINITE CRYSTAL SMILE
WHAT MAKES IT DIFFERENT
The green and juicy accents of Fig Accord and Blackcurrant blend with Jasmine Sambac and a powerful trail of Iris, ten times more concentrated, enhanced by deep notes of patchouli and a gourmand accord.
WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW
The new La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu offers a vibrant, strong, and multiplied vision of happiness, inviting us to unite our voices around the beauty of life and feel the intensity of togetherness.

A new interpretation of the quintessential La Vie Est Belle fragrance that highlights its most iconic ingredient, the Iris Pallida. The Iris essence is captured in the most concentrated expression to create a unique new fragrance that pays tribute to this exceptional ingredient.
output: La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu by Lancôme is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu was launched in 2023. La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu was created by Anne Flipo and Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Black Currant, Fig and Orange Blossom; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Iris, Gourmand Accord and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I wished to create a perfume about utopic adolescence, capturing an ideal of eternal youth. The recklessness of the young French writer Françoise Sagan, the ingenue boyishness of Jean Seberg filmed by Jean Luc Godard, the magnificent heroines of the Velvet Underground, together with the young women I was able to photograph more than 20 years ago.
I called my new perfume for Celine “Zouzou”, an affectionate and child-like nickname that appeared in the last century to describe a young woman with short hair. — Hedi Slimane
output: Zouzou by Celine is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Zouzou was launched in 2024.
