instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Libre L'Absolu Platine is a flanker to the original Libre, which includes a white lavender accord, reminiscent of the coolness of ice, thus enhancing the interplay between lavender and orange blossom, the defining essences of the line.
The fragrance opens with a bold combination of aldehydes and invigorating citrus notes like bergamot and mandarin, setting a vibrant and fresh tone. This is followed by the heart of orange blossom, lavishly embracing the "masculine" diva lavender and the refreshing essence of cool and pear-like white lavender. The final layer offers a seductive allure with the inclusion of sensual ambergris and the sweet, balsamic tones of vanilla.
Libre L'Absolu Platine is available as a 30, 50 and 90ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Libre L'Absolu Platine by Yves Saint Laurent is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Libre L'Absolu Platine was launched in 2023. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Lavender, Blue Lavender and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla and Amber.

"La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire is a reinterpretation of the rose, Lancôme's iconic flower. The new floral Eau de Parfum is composed of a heart built around Iris Concrete and three different rose extracts: fresh rose water, sensual damascena absolue and space rose accord. Its floral heart is enhanced by an enveloping signature with woody musk undertones.
The iconic smile of La Vie Est Belle is reinvented by the renowned artist Catherine Krunas, making way for a sculpted rose at the heart of the bottle. Each petal pays tribute to all the facets of women. In the hands of three French master perfumers in pursuit of the perfect rose, La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire emerges as a modern interpretation of the iconic flower of perfumery.
'La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire is a modern interpretation of the Rose, the iconic flower of perfumery,' as beautifully put by Anne Flippo, perfumer. It's a testament to the dedication and artistry of those who crafted this extraordinary fragrance.
Inspired by rose petals, the wings of La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire transition from white to pink, accentuated with a touch of silver glitter."
Available in 30, 50 and 100ml Eau de Parfum Florale.
output: La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire by Lancôme is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire was launched in 2024. La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire was created by Anne Flipo and Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Bergamot, Orange and Stems Greens; middle notes are Damask Rose, Rose, Rose Water and Iris; base notes are Ambroxan, Musk, Woody Notes, Sandalwood and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Once upon a time... A middle summer garden afternoun. The calm of a sunny nap. And the children’s snack. Jany. She’s getting busy in the kitchen, between sugar and flour. What she loves to prepare, above all other delicacies, is tarte tatin. The butter melts on the glass. She drops grains of brown sugar into it, in the silence of a fine, icy rain. Its scent swirls around the room, echoes to the veranda, travels to the path. Baked apples and cinnamon sticks fade into the exhalations of puff pastry. Then come caramel, almonds and vanilla, powerful aromas that linger into the evening.
Antoine’s daughter, Jany carries the fragrance of his recipes, cakes, madeleines and cookies. An original childhood pastry, Jany delivers the aromatic memories of all our unforgettable delicacies. Here’s to your emotions.
output: Jany by Sora Dora is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Jany was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Margaux Le Paih Guérin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Beneath the shade of a peach orchard, a handsome villain struts out trumpeting an exuberance of juicy fruit—peach, guava, nectarine and prune. The creaminess of vanilla and caramel build mouthwatering anticipation like some salacious Peach Melba demanding to be eaten al fresco. Orris creates soft focus; a velvety fuzz under Renaissance skies.
But the plot soon thickens. Childish naivete gives way to adult sensuality underscored by sensual musks heated by the scorching afternoon sun. Spices emerge—cardamom, ginger, cinnamon. Bark threatens to turn into wood; these amber daggers are hard.
With one sip of amaretto, you’re reminded that even a sweet peach’s stone can be poisonous. When danger threatens, you’ve got to be Machiavellian. Peach’s Revenge is a dish best spritzed cold, but not without the warmth of body heat."
Notes : peach, guava, nectarine, amaretto, orris, cardamom, ginger, cinnamon, bark, amber, vanilla, caramel, musks.
Available in 50ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Peach's Revenge by Sarah Baker Perfumes is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Peach's Revenge was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice.

input:
La Petite Robe Noire Rose Cherry is a delicate fruity floral trail tinged with joie de vivre. As if traversed by a spring breeze, the iconic rose of the Petite Robe Noire is reinvented in cherry blossom and white tea accord of absolute finesse. A wind of freedom that makes the heartbeat and sets the body in motion. Carried away by the mythical soundtrack of Nancy Sinatra, La Petite Robe Noire is freer than ever: who loves me follows me! More than a perfume, an invitation to love.
La Petite Robe Noire Rose Cherry is a floral Eau de parfum with delicately fruity accents. The encounter between two accords, cherry blossom, and white tea, sublimates the iconic rose of La Petite Robe Noire. Wrapped in a cloud of white musk, vanilla brings a gourmet note to this irresistible trail.
“THE ROSE IS THE MAIN CHARACTER OF THE COMPOSITION. SHE IS THE HEART, THE SOUL. » Delphine Jelk, Perfumer Guerlain
TOP NOTES: cherry blossom, white tea
MIDDLE NOTES: cherry water, Bulgarian rose essence, Turkish Damask rose absolut
BASE NOTES: white musk, vanilla
output: La Petite Robe Noire Rose Cherry by Guerlain is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Petite Robe Noire Rose Cherry was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Cherry Blossom and White Tea; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Turkish Rose and Cherry; base notes are White Musk and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: APOM, an acronym for 'A Part of Me', is a genderless fragrance by Maison Francis Kurkdjian. Originally introduced as separate fragrances for men and women in 2009, APOM has been reimagined by perfumer Francis Kurkdjian to combine the best elements of both versions. Inspired by the perfumer's visit to Lebanon, APOM is a flowery amber fougere built on a classic structure with a modern twist. The luminous top of orange blossom gives way to the beauty of aromatic lavender, leading to an alluring base of vanillic amber, comforting white musk, and the sunny smile of ylang-ylang.
output: APOM by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. APOM was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Gucci Guilty Pour Femme Elixir de Parfum is announced as an intense fragrance for an intense connection. An ambery floral woody fragrance for women, it represents a daring assertion, a colorful extraversion: a sensual and provocative scent that extends a loving invitation to accept who we are and let our authentic selves be seen while celebrating the countless iterations of love.
Perfumers Quentin Bisch and Nathalie Cetto sign the composition. It is embued with a base of vanilla absolute and dark tonka beans, complemented by Gucci Guilty's signature of earthy patchouli, mandora, and floral wisteria. It is rounded off by a top note of citric bergamot which is balanced by rose, osmanthus, and a sweet and soft violet accord.
Gucci Guilty Pour Femme and Pour Homme fragrances launched with a campaign starring A$AP Rocky, Julia Garner and Elliot Page. An ode to self-acceptance, friendship and love in all its forms.
Available as a 60ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Gucci Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Femme by Gucci is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Gucci Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Femme was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Natalie Gracia-Cetto. Top notes are Violet, Mandora and Bergamot; middle notes are Wisteria, Osmanthus and Rose; base notes are Tonka Bean, Vanilla and Patchouli.

Iris Pallida Extrait 6 reveals the iris in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most sophisticated signature. Overdosed with precious iris butter with exceptional powder, its enveloping softness is intense, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Iris Pallida Extrait 6 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"The task of creating this more intoxicating version of Dia Woman fell to Alexandra Carlin. A perfumer renowned for her technical skills and her instinctive understanding of the ways materials interact with each other, she maintained the distinctive, effortless elegance of the 2002 composition whilst making its base even more profound – imbuing it with darker, more sumptuous hues. The result is a floral bouquet projecting an astonishing array of images and emotions: a breathtaking journey from sunrise to zenith and finally to sunset.
At the scent’s opening, the familiar Aldehydes lend softness and delicacy to a veil of daylight-blush Musks. This is followed by the grand floral quartet of Rose, Orange Blossom, Carnation, and Ylang-Ylang: vivid, uncompromising ingredients that combine all their many shades and textures to create a vision of femininity that is now even more regal, even more graceful. In the closing stages, Orris, Sandalwood, and Amyris glow with a luminous aura: a regal shimmer beneath the vibrant intensity of the flowers. Effervescent and light-hearted, yet always exuding refinement, Dia 40 Woman sings softly of eternal beauty."
Top notes: Cyclamen, Aldehydes, Musks, Blackcurrant, Violet Leaves
Heart notes: Rose, Orange Blossom, Carnation, Ylang-Ylang, Cistus, Bay Leaves, Tarragon
Base notes: Orris, Sandalwood, Amyris, Guaiac Wood
Available in a 100ml bottle as extrait de parfum containing 40% pure perfume oils.
output: Dia 40 Woman by Amouage is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Dia 40 Woman was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexandra Carlin. Top notes are Aldehydes, Musk, Cyclamen, Violet Leaf and Black Currant; middle notes are Rose, Ylang-Ylang, Carnation, Cistus Incanus, Orange Blossom, Tarragon and Bay Leaf; base notes are Orris Root, Sandalwood, Amyris and Guaiac Wood.

This is followed by the grand floral quartet of Rose, Orange Blossom, Carnation, and Ylang-Ylang: vivid, uncompromising ingredients that combine all their many shades and textures to create a vision of femininity that is now even more regal, even more graceful. In the closing stages, Orris, Sandalwood, and Amyris glow with a luminous aura: a regal shimmer beneath the vibrant intensity of the flowers. Effervescent and light-hearted, yet always exuding refinement, Dia 40 Woman sings softly of eternal beauty."
Top notes: Cyclamen, Aldehydes, Musks, Blackcurrant, Violet Leaves
Heart notes: Rose, Orange Blossom, Carnation, Ylang-Ylang, Cistus, Bay Leaves, Tarragon
Base notes: Orris, Sandalwood, Amyris, Guaiac Wood
Available in a 100ml bottle as extrait de parfum containing 40% pure perfume oils.. Sentence B: Dia 40 Woman by Amouage is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Dia 40 Woman was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexandra Carlin. Top notes are Aldehydes, Musk, Cyclamen, Violet Leaf and Black Currant; middle notes are Rose, Ylang-Ylang, Carnation, Cistus Incanus, Orange Blossom, Tarragon and Bay Leaf; base notes are Orris Root, Sandalwood, Amyris and Guaiac Wood..

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Autumn winds skip across golden wheat fields. As the tall grasses billow, the rattle of husks beats a soft prairie lullaby, signalling to the weary sun to rest. In the fading light, tiny harvest mice venture forth, scrambling to gather seeds and fruits. For once the sun sinks fully beneath the horizon, its rule of the sky is bestowed on another. And when the coo of the owl breaks the night, the mice dash, trembling, back to their nests.
Like a countryside bathed in sweet sunlight, Harvest Mouse by Zoologist conjures images of home-baked goodness. Stalks of wheat sway among chamomile, davana and hay, and rich beer extracts are sobered by resins and woody notes. Cozy up in a warm nest of homespun scent.
output: Harvest Mouse by Zoologist Perfumes is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Harvest Mouse was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Luca Maffei. Top notes are Chamomile, Clove, Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Beer/Ale, Hay, Benzoin, Opoponax, Davana and Rose Oil; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Peru Balsam, Cedar, Balsam Fir and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
ANI was the first reference launched in 2019 under the new theme “NO BOUNDARIES” that aimed to eliminate all emotional boundaries between people. The fragrance immediately became a global hit being often mentioned as the best vanilla scent ever. With ANI X, NISHANE wanted to enhance this mystical journey through time that the fans had with ANI, a fragrance that pays homage to an ancient metropolis that now stands as a monument to the might of empires and the inevitability of time. Just like the original bestseller, ANI X aims to break down boundaries and to empower the wearers to build their own empire from the ruins. In an attempt to reach the perfume lovers who specifically seek for the refreshening aspect of the scent, ANI X was designed to open with a richer burst of juicy citrus than the original formula of ANI. The freshness that the wearer will feel with the new ANI X on top of the well-known vanilla excellence of the original ANI will be a nice surprise for the perfume lovers.
ANI X is a fragrance with true heritage to its name, and invites you to explore how to eliminate the boundaries of time and space, to create your own empire even when all that remains is nothing but the ruins. So spray on ANI X, let the fragrance take you on a journey through the ages, and embrace the power of history in a bottle.
TOP NOTES
bergamot oil - lemon oil - watery notes - honeydew melon - cardamom oil - blue ginger - pink pepper
HEART NOTES
lavender oil - sage - green apple - blackcurrant - rose - patchouli
BASE NOTES
cedarwood - cashmere wood - vanilla - ambergris infusion - white musk - sandalwood
output: Ani X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ani X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Cécile Zarokian. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot, Melon, Ginger, Cardamom, Water Notes and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Green Apple, Black Currant, Patchouli, Lavender, Sage and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Cashmere Wood, Ambergris, White Musk and Cedar.

Acne Studios X Frédéric Malle represents a fusion of fashion, perfumery, and art. This unique collaboration yields a fragrance that delivers a neoclassical olfactory experience—vibrant yet comforting, magnetic yet bold.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Disrupt your senses with L'Interdit Tubéreuse Noire. Available as a limited edition, this first release of the Forbidden Flowers olfactory saga captures the elusive scent of burnt Tuberose petals. Sulphurous by nature, Tuberose enhances the iconic Eau de Parfum with a smoky facet that is as addictive as it is forbidden.
At the heart of this limited-edition fragrance, the immaculate whiteness of sulphurous Tuberose conceals a devastating charm. One of the world’s most fragrant flowers, its heady, sensual scent conquers anyone who crosses its path... At the iconic heart of L’Interdit’s white bouquet, Indian Tuberose Absolute provides the addictive sillage of this new creation.
Thanks to an extraction technique that captures the uncapturable, Givenchy pushes olfactory boundaries and unveils a unique new facet of Tuberose. Each bottle encapsulates at least eight hand-picked Tuberose flowers and an original accord of burnt Tuberose petals. Combined with roasted coffee notes, the composition leaves a magnetic scent on the skin while a base of Vetiver and Patchouli enhances its addictive sensuality.
output: L'Interdit Tubéreuse Noire by Givenchy is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. L'Interdit Tubéreuse Noire was launched in 2024. Top note is Tuberose; middle notes are Tuberose and Orange Blossom; base notes are Precious Woods, Patchouli, Coffee CO2 and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Q Eau de Parfum Intense, maintains the top notes of its original counterpart, characterized by the freshness of Sicilian lemons, enhanced by the brightness of the orange and the fervor of jasmine petals. “In the new Q Eau de Parfum Intense, cherry continues to be the common thread, but turns into a delicious dark cherry with the warmest and deepest accords, mixing with the more feminine and intoxicating side of heliotrope, giving the fragrance a material texture – explains Daphne Bugey –. Contrasting with the brighter base of the original Q Eau de Parfum, the sensual ambery accord accentuates the seductive energy of this new version».
The opulence of the new woody ambery fragrance is also expressed through the precious glass bottle and the juice, characterized by a strong shade that recalls the cherry color. In continuity with Q Eau de Parfum, the cap depicts a royal crown in gold and red.
Q by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense is available in 30ml, 50ml, 100ml.
output: Q by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense by Dolce&Gabbana is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Q by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Sicilian Lemon, Orange and Jasmine; middle notes are Black Cherry and Heliotrope; base notes are Amber and Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
From the Garden is a part of the Replica collection - Reproduction of Familiar Scents and Moments of Varying Locations and Periods. It captures the essence of a sunny afternoon in a garden, where you can feel the earth in your hands and savor the aroma of ripe tomatoes while bees buzz in the air.
It combines the freshness of tomato leaf and green mandarin with the earthiness of patchouli and geranium, creating an elegant and crisp scent that brings back memories of those tranquil moments spent in a sun-drenched garden.
Perfumer Olivier Cresp drew inspiration from his own experiences, recalling cherished moments in his childhood garden and reliving them with his son, Sebastien, through the green and earthy notes of this fragrance.
Provence and Period: Puglia, 1998.
Available as a 100 ml Eau de Toilette.
output: From the Garden by Maison Martin Margiela is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. From the Garden was launched in 2023. From the Garden was created by Olivier Cresp and Sébastien Cresp. Top notes are Tomato Leaf and Green Mandarin; middle note is Geranium; base note is Patchouli.

Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the perfumer’s love for the most famous French dessert, this journey of inspiration began in the high elegance of a leading Parisian patisserie. An accomplished confectioner had the idea to create a delicious crème brûlée for the perfumer by adding coconut milk, giving the perfume a rich taste and smell. The attractive aroma and delightful taste ignited the perfumer’s imagination, leading him to create this aromatic masterpiece.
Crafted with precision and passion, CRÈME BRÛLÉE may show simplicity in its aromatic notes but hides a complex blend of precious ingredients. At its heart lies a creamy union of coconut milk and vanilla, while at the top, caramelized sugar sets the emotions on fire just like the fire that burns sugar and releases the sensual smell of caramelized sweetness.
Created right under the iconic Eiffel Tower, with the innovative idea of the perfumer taking the perfume workshop with him, compressed into a suitcase, allowing him freedom of inspiration. Prepare to be endlessly asked about the divine essence you wear.
output: Creme Brûlée by Theodoros Kalotinis is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Creme Brûlée was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Theodoros Kalotinis.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
This is the soul of an Angel reinvented. An angel you don’t expect. A pure elixir that expresses the heightened femininity of today’s fearless superwomen. Innocent but powerful. Down to earth, but unusual. Ultra-sharp yet enveloping. With Angel Elixir, a new star is born.
A completely original, woody-floral gourmand fragrance that reinvents what makes Angel Eau de Parfum so unique. Here, Angel’s signature indulgence transforms into a floral Milky Way, encapsulated in Mugler’s iconic star-shaped bottle, transforming into a bewitching navy blue.
A shimmering spark of metallic spices. An ethereal milky-floral bouquet designed by Mugler. A nebula of luscious vanilla infusion enhanced with the cutting-edge woody note of Oriental Xtreme™. Angel Elixir is more than just a fragrance it is a catalyst for rethinking your reality. Because the real world is not enough.
output: Angel Elixir by Mugler is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Angel Elixir was launched in 2023. Angel Elixir was created by Domitille Michalon Bertier and Anne Flipo. Top note is Pink Pepper; middle notes are Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang, Sandalwood and Orange Blossom; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla and Amber Xtreme.

input:
Floral, with notes of ylang-ylang and jasmine, radiant with hints of monoi and coconut. A dash of LUST FOR SUN lets you immerse yourself in summer. A sensual fragrance that evokes the sun's rays on warm, golden skin.
TOP NOTES: freesia, coconut, bergamot
HEART NOTES: ylang ylang, jasmine absolute, orange blossom, gardenia
BASE NOTES: vanilla, ambroxan, white musk
Available in bottles of 50 and 100 ml.
output: Lust for Sun by Juliette Has A Gun is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lust for Sun was launched in 2023. Top notes are Coconut, Freesia and Bergamot; middle notes are Gardenia, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and Orange Blossom; base notes are White Musk, Vanilla and Ambroxan.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Dolce is the melody you can't stop listening to.
An irresistible combination of luscious fruit and floral notes with a sweet touch. The debut of sparkling Mandarin, tasty Saffron and juicy orange hints at something more mysterious. In the dreamy heart, where Rose creates a fresh and willing invitation to creamy white notes of Jasmine and Gardenia, a delicious Blackcurrant weaves its way out of the shadows. It induces the sensuality of Sandalwood and Vanilla into a siren’s song, while whispers of White Musk dance around to create a deep base which enables the sweetness to resonate softly throughout the day.
A sweet scent from which there is no escape.
Top Notes: Mandarin, Orange, Saffron
Heart Notes: Rose, Jasmine, Gardenia, Pear, Blackcurrant
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vanilla, White Musk
output: Dolce Melodia by Sospiro Perfumes is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dolce Melodia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Orange and Saffron; middle notes are Pear, Black Currant, Gardenia, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, White Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The story of a Sicilian dynasty that has known glory, wealth and power.
Quattro Pizzi, the most iconic palace that was home to Palermo’s most symbolic and prominent families. A perfume reminiscent of the Belle Époque era, where love, beauty and nobility entwine with secrecy and sin.
A juxtapose of sweet and spicy hits the senses on first spray with rum, davana and pink pepper, where the intoxicating notes of tuberose enchant and seduce at the heart, a sensual scent that lingers like a lover's forbidden touch on the skin long after the sun goes down.
Heat and passion unravel through the notes of this scented story ahead of Sicily’s breathtakingly beautiful backdrop.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Rum, Davana, Pink Pepper , Coriander
Tuberose , Coconut
Hay, Blonde Leaf Tobacco , Tonka Bean
Available as 30ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Quattro Pizzi by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Quattro Pizzi was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sofia Bardelli. Top notes are Davana, Rum, Pink Pepper and Coriander; middle notes are Tuberose and Coconut; base notes are Hay, Tonka Bean and Tobacco Leaf.

Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Queening is a celebration of achieving one's goals, symbolizing a journey through challenges, and overcoming obstacles to emerge stronger and renewed. This exquisite perfume fragrance combines the royal scent of Orris with the sweetness of vanilla, creating an uplifting opening, followed by aged rum and saffron. Dedicated to daily successes, major accomplishments, and the rewards they bring, this captivating scent empowers all current and aspiring Queens.
"Undeniably loved by all, Queening brings the most desirable notes of clean cotton, creamy orris and vanilla together in a dreamy, cocooning blend. Fluffy musks, rum and coconut embody the enveloping gourmand elements of comfort and nourishment." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.
output: Queening by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Queening was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Cotton Flower, Apple and Cypress; middle notes are Orris Root, Rum and Saffron; base notes are Vanilla, Coconut and Musk.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
CHANEL N°5 is a far-reaching mosaic that transcends passing time and retains the ethereal lightness of possibility in its fragrance trail. It is a promise made once before in 2016, when N°5 L’EAU was born, the iconic, newly enchanting fragrance, with floral freshness and unprecedented spirit. An active source of energy; light and transparent, but with sufficient gravitas to drop anchor and stay in the moment. It is an impulsive radiant drop whose dazzling citrus rays soar skywards, elevated by aldehydes. Then comes a floral swirl of jasmine, rose, and ylang-ylang, and then finally, dynamic vetiver and cedar.
A fragrance as addictive as a life line, simple in its sophistication, and capable of making the wildest dreams reality. A fluid and vigorous drop that goes against the flow, and houses every emotion in the world.
With it, we can be everything and its opposite: carefree, joyful, spiritual, mysterious, brave, wishful, and kind… This floral fragrance can fulfill current needs and release the emotions needed to live an instant in a few seconds, at a moment’s notice. It is an olfactory garment suitable for every occasion and every emotion. It is always ready, so you can be who you want when you want. Bravely, and with total freedom." - says Chanel.
The Drop bottle contains 1.7 FL. OZ. (50ml).
output: N°5 L’EAU – Limited Edition by Chanel is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. N°5 L’EAU – Limited Edition was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Aldehydes, Lime, Lemon, Orange, Bergamot, Mandarin Orange and Neroli; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, May Rose and Jasmine; base notes are White Musk, Cedar, Orris Root and Vanila.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Omnia Crystalline Eau de Parfum by Bvlgari is a more precious and intense interpretation of the house’s iconic feminine fragrance. Created by Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas, this version exalts the beauty of the original vision with new vibrant notes of green mandarin essence, jasmine absolute, and sandalwood essence.
"Omnia Crystalline Eau de Parfum offers an even more precious and intense interpretation of Bvlgari’s most iconic fragrance. Crafted around the same signature accords of Nashi Pear and Lotus as the Eau de Toilette, Omnia Crystalline Eau de Parfum pushes the boundaries of creativity and olfactive craftsmanship with a new composition signed by Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas. The Eau de Parfum exalts the beauty of the original vision with new vibrant gems of nature: Green Mandarin essence, Jasmine absolute and Sandalwood essence."
output: Omnia Crystalline Eau de Parfum (2024) by Bvlgari is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Omnia Crystalline Eau de Parfum (2024) was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Nashi Pear and Green Mandarin; middle notes are Lotus, Green Tea and Jasmine; base notes are Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Pear Gelato is more than just a fragrance, it’s a journey back to the sweet nostalgia of childhood. Picture yourself strolling down memory lane, clutching the most delectable ice cream while the sun’s warm rays paint a smile on your face. The crisp waffle cone, sturdy as a biscuit and utterly delicious, mingles with the scent of fresh milk and sugar, whisking your mind away. But the true magic unfolds when these elements intertwine with the irresistible aroma of ripe pear. Inspired by authentic Italian ice cream, this creation reflects the perfumer’s adoration for Italian gelato.
Crafted with meticulous care, “Pear Gelato” is a testament to the perfumer’s artistry, infusing each molecule with passion and creative brilliance. It offers an aesthetic experience that speaks to the soul, capturing the essence of pear gelato with unparalleled realism.
This fragrance isn’t merely a blend of ingredients, it’s an immersive experience that transports you to a realm where the love of ice cream transcends gender and age.
output: Pear Gelato by Theodoros Kalotinis is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pear Gelato was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Theodoros Kalotinis.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The new flanker of  Valentino Donna Born In Roma is described as a dazzling fragrance inspired by Valentino's Pink PP color, a unique shade of pink created by Pierpaolo Piccioli for Maison Valentino. It is a limited edition with new design.
Pink PP is described as bold and lively, playful and irreplaceable - it is a celebration of the uniqueness of everyone and many vibrant ways to be you.
"In 2023, you are welcomed to the Valentino monochromatic world, inspired by the iconic Pink PP. Born in Roma Pink PP is a dazzling floral-ambery fragrance that brings the vibrance alive on your skin. A magnetic note that blends vibrant Madagascar Bourbon vanilla and magnificent orange blossom accords.
Rendez-vous 2023 dresses the iconic rockstud bottles in strong monochromatic colors, celebrating the uniqueness of everyone and many vibrant ways to be you."
A Color Top Note: Bright and sweet, Calabrian green mandarine sparkles with a fresh lively take-off. A Couture Heart Note: The heart of this dazzling floral note is built around orange blossom accords, revealing both sweet and fresh facets like a delightful bouquet. A Cool Base Note: The warm and woody aroma brought by Madagascar Bourbon vanilla amplifies the magnetism of this sensual fragrance.
Key Note: Calabrian Green Mandarine, Orange Blossom Accord, Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla.
The bottle pays tribute to the iconic Valentino Rockstud. This edgy pyramidal design, inspired by Roman architecture, is a house signature of Maison Valentino. Part of Valentino’s fashion iconography and a symbol of Roma where it embellishes the city’s doors and walls, the Rockstud is a transformative symbol, taking a bag or a shoe from classic to instantly current.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Pink PP by Valentino is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Valentino Donna Born In Roma Pink PP was launched in 2023. Top note is Calabrian Mandarin; middle note is Orange Blossom; base note is Bourbon Vanilla.

input:
With Rosa Rossa Harvest, delicately hand-picked Bulgarian and Turkish roses combine with the freshness of organic rose water from Grasse, enhanced by delicious lychee and blackcurrant accords.
The Aqua Allegoria Harvest fragrances contain up to 95% natural origin*. The French beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming. (*90% to 95% natural origin.In accordance with the iso 16128, calculation including water).

input:
"Idôle Eau de Toilette is a perfume that combines the freshness and energy of green teat into a memorable trail, enclosed in an elegant and sleek bottle.

Idôle Eau de Toilette is the perfect encounter between strong notes and a subtle, surprising freshness. This green tea perfume opens with a vibrant green tea accord, followed by a duo of roses, with green notes and Rose Damascena essence, combined with a fresh bergamot that adds juicy and fresn tones."
GREEN TEA - "A green tea accord captures energy into this scent, created through carefully crafted and blended tea of the harvest."
BLOOMING ROSES - "Discover the refreshing floral notes of Rose Damascena essence."
FRESH BERGAMOT- "Bergamot adds a juicy freshness and a strong citrus heart to this fragrance."
"Idôle Eau de Toilette stands strong in a sleek, thin bottle with golden metallic frames. Idôle Eau de Toilette is now unscrewable, opening endless opportunities to customize it and give it a second life, as a true object of design."
Available as a 30,50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette.
output: Idôle Eau de Toilette by Lancôme is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Idôle Eau de Toilette was launched in 2024. Idôle Eau de Toilette was created by Shyamala Maisondieu, Nadège Le Garlantezec and Adriana Medina-Baez. Top notes are Green Tea and Bergamot; middle notes are Damask Rose and Rose Water; base notes are Musk, Patchouli, Bourbon Vanilla and Cedar.

Montblanc launches Signature Absolue in 2023 as the first flanker of Signature fragrance for women from 2020.
"Radiant and bright, Signature Absolue draws on another important element from Montblanc’s DNA: gold. The nib, the very soul of Montblanc’s iconic writing instruments, is crafted by hand from gold. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I imagined this new fragrance as a tribute to blandness.

A floral musk with a minimal and creamy composition, like a break in the tumult of a fast-paced world. This fragrance, indisputably comforting, wraps the senses in a veil of softness and invites introspection.
“Ode to Dullness”, celebrates the apparent banality of everyday life and the poetry of small nothings, simplicity in art, and the ordinary in sublime.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Artemis is the essence of the forest at night, captured in a bottle. This enchanting fragrance invites you to wander through a moonlit grove, where the air is thick with the mysteries of the woodland. Top notes of luscious peach, juicy nectarine, and ripe plum create a mouth-watering allure, reminiscent of a hidden orchard bathed in silvery moonlight. These top notes blend seamlessly with the delicate floral heart of osmanthus, whose apricot-like scent adds a touch of ethereal elegance. The fresh, crisp aroma of green leaves weaves through the composition, evoking the sensation of a gentle breeze rustling through the trees. Finally, the scent settles into a warm, grounding base of sandalwood and cedar, capturing the essence of the forest floor and the sturdy trunks that stand as silent guardians of the night.
output: Artemis by Soki London is a Floral Green fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Artemis was launched in 2024. Artemis was created by Ruth Mastenbroek and Nic Mastenbroek. Top notes are Nectarine, Peach and Plum; middle notes are Green Leaves, Osmanthus and Peony; base notes are Cedar and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Unveil the essence of Irresistible Very Floral, a fragrance that masterfully blends the allure of florals with the warmth of woody and solar notes. At its core lie roses and a bouquet of delicate white flowers, their charm heightened by the unique twist of coconut water's freshness. The bold touch of blackcurrant further enriches this interplay. The scent evokes an image of elegance and powerful femininity, encouraging you to embrace your boldest side.
This fragrance belongs to the Floral Woody Solar family. Its composition starts with the lively notes of Bergamot, Coconut Water, and Blackcurrant. The heart features a harmonious blend of Rose Essential, Rose Absolute, Iris, Ylang Ylang, and Jasmine. The base rounds off with Cedarwood, a Solar Accord, and the subtle notes of Ambrette, Sinfonide, and Ambrettolide, creating a lasting impression.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Coconut Water, Blackcurrant

Middle Notes: Rose Essential, Rose Absolute, Iris, Ylang Ylang, Jasmine

Base Notes: Cedarwood, Solar Accord, Ambrette, Sinfonide, Ambrettolide
Irresistible Givenchy Very Floral will be offered in 50ml and 80ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Irresistible Givenchy Very Floral by Givenchy is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Irresistible Givenchy Very Floral was launched in 2024. Irresistible Givenchy Very Floral was created by Anne Flipo, Dominique Ropion, Fanny Bal and Caroline Dumur. Top notes are Coconut Water, Black Currant and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose, Grasse Rose, Ylang Ylang, Iris and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Ambrette, Solar Notes, Ambrettolide, Sinfonide and Cedarwood.

input:
Inspired by the universal sentiment of love, Coach Love embodies its diverse ways of expression.
THE FRAGRANCE
This fruity floral scent begins with a cheerful note of wild strawberries, underlined by a velvety red rose, before revealing a warm base of cedarwood.
THE DESIGN
The intense red bottle symbolizes the color of passion. It features a gold "turnlock" clasp, a symbolic code of the House, and an irresistible heart-shaped charm. The red case, adorned with the iconic golden carriage logo, is crafted in a faux leather texture, paying homage to the House's leatherworking heritage.
THE CAMPAIGN Created in collaboration with Artistic Director and photographer Juergen Teller, the campaign celebrates love in all its different forms and expressions. The campaign showcases the unique languages of love, reminding us that love is a distinctive state of mind.
Coach Love is available as a 30ml, 50ml and 90ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Coach Love Eau de Parfum by Coach is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Coach Love Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. Top note is Wild Strawberry; middle note is Red Rose; base note is Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
THE MINERAL SHORES OF MASIRAH
A dream of faraway. Sundrenched horizons, empty lands, the mineral tang of Sichuan Pepper, the pulsing radiance of Ginger and a whiff of sea spray that altogether smell like the promise of breaking free from the world.
On a desert island, wrought of golden Myrrh and Frankincense, a silhouette lies beneath the sun, beneath the sky. A waft of suntan skin catches you unaware, a whiff of Fenugreek, like maple sweet, more gourmand than summer.
It beckons you closer. The warmth sunsets, the saltiness of Myrrh and Frankincense absolutes appears at last under maroon strikes of Benzoin and Labdanum.
A song of salty incense, of mineral warmth and summer meditations, Lineage is the scent of travelling far from home to get closer to yourself.
output: Lineage by Amouage is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lineage was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Vinchon Spehner. Top notes are Ginger, Sichuan Pepper, Peruvian Pepper and Saffron; middle notes are Olibanum, Myrrh and Fenugreek; base notes are Olibanum, Myrrh, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vetiver and Patchouli.

input:
Guerlain launches Tobacco Honey in September 2023 as a part of the  L'Art & La Matière collection. The fragrance combines delicious amber tobacco accord with vanilla, tonka bean, and sesame, that come alive under the glow of intoxicating honey, enhanced by clove and anise accord. At the base, the precious accord reinforces its trail with woody notes combining the creamy softness of sandalwood and the power of oud wood.
"I've wanted to combine honey and tobacco for a long time. On the one hand, we have the dried tobacco leaves with their swirls of powdery aroma; on the other, we have honey as a delicious, enveloping nectar," said Delphine Jelk, Perfumer and Creative Director at Guerlain.
Available in 100ml and 200ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Tobacco Honey by Guerlain is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tobacco Honey was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Honey, Cloves and Anise; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla, Tonka and Sesame; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Sandalwood.

input:
KILIAN launches the latest addition to its Smokes Collection called Smoking Hot in late September 2023. The fragrance offers a fusion of sweetness and smokiness, reminiscent of delectable caramel.
With a contemporary take on the smoky essence, this creation not only redefines the genre for modern sensibilities but also encapsulates an element of scorching allure. The heart of the fragrance is steeped in the lusciousness of caramel, blending the robust depth of Kentucky tobacco absolute and apple shisha. The bold undertones of Bourbon vanilla further contribute to the untamed and opulent nature of this olfactory composition.
The scent opens with apples, and the warm cinnamon bark essence is added to the mellow apple hookah. Then, slowly over time, smoked Kentucky tobacco absolute emerges. A rich tobacco absolute blends with oak moss, followed by Bourbon vanilla with balsamic notes. Orkanox is added to Bourbon Vanilla, also known as Pure Jungle Essence, to express its powerful and sensual charm with a scent.
The exquisite "Smoking Hot" is elegantly presented as a 50ml Eau de Parfum, encapsulating the essence of this alluring fusion within its meticulously crafted formulation.
output: Smoking Hot by By Kilian is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Smoking Hot was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathieu Nardin. Top notes are Apple, Smoke and Cinnamon; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla and Moss; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Licorice, Orcanox™, Iso E Super and Clary Sage.

input:
"KILIAN PARIS presents its new limited edition summer perfume, inspired by monoi oil and tiare flower infused in coconut oil: Sunkissed Goddess. Our founder revisited this Polynesian elixir to give it an unparalleled radiance with floral notes as fresh as they are captivating that revive the sensory memories associated with the summer season. A fragrance that evokes the smells of summer, of tanning oil and the warmth of the sun radiating on the skin.

The fragrance opens with this happy marriage between a white tiaré with delicious creaminess and a terribly sensual essence of ylang-ylang, before giving way to the warm roundness of coconut and vanilla, and ending with notes of guaiac and labdanum cistus, two emblematic scents that KILIAN PARIS loves for their resinous character, their energy and their persistent charm."

Fragrance Notes: Ylang Ylang Essence, Tiare Flower, Coconut.
output: Sunkissed Goddess by By Kilian is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sunkissed Goddess was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Bergamot and Neroli; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang and Tiare Flower; base notes are Coconut, Vanilla, Guaiac Wood and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Café Tabac - A hedonistic scent that celebrates the undocumented moment.
A sumptuous party that goes on for days. Endless dinners and all-night merengue dancing under charcoal skies. Smoke meets flower and spice settles in for the next inhale. This is CAFÉ TABAC.
Before Aedes de Venustas’s newest scent was realized in a bottle, it had a name: CAFÉ TABAC, inspired by the iconic 90s bar in the East Village. Upstairs at Cafe Tabac was where Kate met Johnny, Madonna picked up the phone, Leo picked up supermodels. It was a place where the truly glamorous could be truly off-duty, an unselfconscious, pre-cell phone era that feels so far away as to be longed for again.
“It’s the deep mood of a place to be, creating its own legend,” says perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour. “The deep blue smoke of cigarettes, cigars, weed … whatever. We’re exploring other paradises: laughs, desires, and pleasures, again and again.”
That spirit was also present when Duchaufour and Gerstner went to visit the Dominican Republic last year for another scented project. “It was an explosion of vibrant and chic people from Mexico, France, Rio, New York; different cultures and conversations and ideas and opinions,” says Gerstner. “We went from a tropical forest to the coast together, but it wasn’t until we were standing in a cigar factory that I looked at Bertrand and said, ‘Can you put this in a bottle?’”
The result is as dazzling, sexy, and complex as the trip: It opens with sparkling notes of expected (bergamot) and unexpected (apple, tamarind) fruits but the overall perfume is an homage to tobacco in many forms. Dry leaves, humid flowers, and a cigar lit by fire are represented thanks to herbal clary sage and davana, a tint of mango with dried fig and date, and a rough smokiness using tobacco absolute, tar, cade, and cedarwood. An amber accord of secretions and sugars from cistus and labdanum, ambergris, oakmoss, vanilla, cacao accord and Peru balm at the heart gives way to a darkly rich and resinous base. There is no saccharine here. Instead, distinctive burnt sugar and fresh clove and cardamom are infused with vapors that keep CAFE TABAC multilayered instead of perfectly round. It is blended at a twenty percent concentration made in the old school haute parfumerie style, including a month-long maceration in France.
With CAFE TABAC, there is a mad sensuality that feels like the olfactive equivalent of a twist of orange atop a demitasse of espresso—rich with a touch of freshness and tang. To wear it is to maintain a state of heightened emotions that are sooner remembered than they are recorded.
output: Café Tabac by Aedes de Venustas is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Café Tabac was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour.

instruction: Given a numerical representation of the seasons for which a perfume is appropriate, answer which season is the most appropriate.

input:
Sentence A: Café Tabac - A hedonistic scent that celebrates the undocumented moment.
A sumptuous party that goes on for days. Endless dinners and all-night merengue dancing under charcoal skies. Smoke meets flower and spice settles in for the next inhale. This is CAFÉ TABAC.
Before Aedes de Venustas’s newest scent was realized in a bottle, it had a name: CAFÉ TABAC, inspired by the iconic 90s bar in the East Village. Upstairs at Cafe Tabac was where Kate met Johnny, Madonna picked up the phone, Leo picked up supermodels. It was a place where the truly glamorous could be truly off-duty, an unselfconscious, pre-cell phone era that feels so far away as to be longed for again.
“It’s the deep mood of a place to be, creating its own legend,” says perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour. “The deep blue smoke of cigarettes, cigars, weed … whatever. We’re exploring other paradises: laughs, desires, and pleasures, again and again.”
That spirit was also present when Duchaufour and Gerstner went to visit the Dominican Republic last year for another scented project. “It was an explosion of vibrant and chic people from Mexico, France, Rio, New York; different cultures and conversations and ideas and opinions,” says Gerstner. “We went from a tropical forest to the coast together, but it wasn’t until we were standing in a cigar factory that I looked at Bertrand and said, ‘Can you put this in a bottle?’”
The result is as dazzling, sexy, and complex as the trip: It opens with sparkling notes of expected (bergamot) and unexpected (apple, tamarind) fruits but the overall perfume is an homage to tobacco in many forms. Dry leaves, humid flowers, and a cigar lit by fire are represented thanks to herbal clary sage and davana, a tint of mango with dried fig and date, and a rough smokiness using tobacco absolute, tar, cade, and cedarwood. An amber accord of secretions and sugars from cistus and labdanum, ambergris, oakmoss, vanilla, cacao accord and Peru balm at the heart gives way to a darkly rich and resinous base. There is no saccharine here. Instead, distinctive burnt sugar and fresh clove and cardamom are infused with vapors that keep CAFE TABAC multilayered instead of perfectly round. It is blended at a twenty percent concentration made in the old school haute parfumerie style, including a month-long maceration in France.
With CAFE TABAC, there is a mad sensuality that feels like the olfactive equivalent of a twist of orange atop a demitasse of espresso—rich with a touch of freshness and tang. To wear it is to maintain a state of heightened emotions that are sooner remembered than they are recorded.. Sentence B: Café Tabac by Aedes de Venustas is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Café Tabac was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour..

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: “In the hands of Destiny – cruel puppeteer – she becomes a ballerina Yet, without being its toy, through her magical fingers, she also directs her luck!” Cruelty, fragility, what are we made of? The truth is often hidden behind appearances. Graceful, delicate and ethereal, a ballerina seems manipulated like a doll, by an elegant puppeteer. Slender dandy with spider fingers, the fate of the little one is in his hands. Precarious balance, fatally inevitable destiny! However, between the executioner and his intended victim, are things so obvious? On closer inspection, wouldn't she also be pulling the wires on her side, giving direction to the emaciated fingers? The orphan, fascinating actress of our illusions! When reality resurfaces, letting doubt settle in, it evaporates into a mystical and disturbing incense. Serge Lutens
output: L'Orpheline Edition Limitée by Serge Lutens is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Orpheline Edition Limitée was launched in 2024. Top note is Incense; middle note is Castoreum; base note is Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
YLOP Ylop is born from a loving craftsmanship. Its effluvia are imagined by touch: it is directly on the skin that this water overturns our senses. Playing on the echoes between the velvety softness of an apricot and the sensuality of the dermis, this textured perfume captures the scents of the nature of flesh. A true capture of the beloved body in a bottle, Ylop offers a prismatic vision of our romantic stories. Sometimes notes resonating from a single body, sometimes mirrors of millions of other skins, Ylop oscillates between its inspiration - Poly - and its multiple sprays - polyamorous. From osmanthus to black sesame, Ylop promises the caresses of a cherished skin. To your loves.
Top Notes: Roasted Apricot, Apple Tea
Heart Notes: Osmanthus Absolute, Rosemary Essence, Almond
Base Notes: Black Sesame CO2 Extract, Black Vanilla Absolute, Haitian Vetiver Essence
output: Ylop by Sora Dora is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ylop was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Amelie Bourgeois. Top notes are Apricot, Tea and Apple; middle notes are Osmanthus, Almond and Rosemary; base notes are Sesame, Vanilla Absolute and Haitian Vetiver.

CLEAN RESERVE's limited-edition "Wink & Smile" fragrance, a warm and spicy blend of blackcurrant (cassis berries), peach nectar, and white musk. This fun and flirty scent is the perfect balance of sweetness and sass, with pink sugar and ambrette adding a touch of natural musk.
Crafted with sustainably sourced ingredients, this farm-to-fragrance collection is not only luxurious, but eco-conscious too. The beautiful bottle, adorned with ladybugs, is a nod to CLEAN RESERVE's partnership with earthday.org to protect pollinators and raise awareness.
Moreover, CLEAN RESERVE is dedicated to making a positive impact, which is why they have partnered with a company that sources sustainable ambrette harvested by farmers in El Salvador. This partnership helps to support education programs and provide a stable source of income for the local farmers and their communities. Indulge in a fragrance that is not only irresistible but also supports a good cause. Get your limited-edition "Wink & Smile" today!
output: Sparkling Sugar by Clean is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sparkling Sugar was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover the new intense feminine perfume from ZADIG&VOLTAIRE. The iconic love story This Is! is enriched with a daring new chapter: the story of two soul mates who walk the streets of Paris, embarking on a new adventure. A floral amber fragrance that breaks the codes.
For this new captivating, intense eau de parfum from ZADIG&VOLTAIRE, Sidonie Lancesseur, the nose behind the This Is Her! collection, has composed a new floral amber juice with addictive intensity. The perfume sparkles from the first spray while it releases lively notes of pink berries, illuminated by the green scent of basil notes. At the heart of the composition, a sparkling metallic accord blends with ZADIG&VOLTAIRE's signature floral aromas of rose and chestnut notes, creating shimmering reflections. This Is Really Her! becomes even more irresistible as the base notes are revealed through a seductive blend of honey, patchouli, and vanilla. The result is a fragrance that awakens sophisticated sensuality from nightfall to dawn.
A perfume bottle with a metallic look Inspired by fashion, the bottle of This Is Really Her! has been revamped to have a metallic effect, embodying the eternal chic of the ZADIG&VOLTAIRE style. Accented with dazzling gold elements, the design evokes the sparkling lights of an unforgettable night in the City of Lights. The smooth glass contrasts with the iconic ZADIG&VOLTAIRE label, now textured, evoking metallic leather for a sensual and provocative look.
Available as 30ml, 50ml, and 100ml Eau de Parfum Intense from mid-January 2024.
output: This Is Really Her! by Zadig & Voltaire is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. This Is Really Her! was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sidonie Lancesseur. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Basil; middle notes are Rose and Chestnut; base notes are Honey, Patchouli and Vanilla.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
La Petite Robe Noire, Eau de Parfum Absolue concentrates the power of an intense eau de parfum, the sophistication of a perfume absolute, and a rose embroidered with the woody accents of patchouli that adorn the skin with intense and elegant notes. Inspired by the inimitable style of Parisiennes, La Petite Robe Noire is a hymn to freedom and love, an incarnation of elegance and allure, an invitation to joie de vivre and irreverence. A trail of character in homage to the rose. A tailor-made rose, embroidered with the most beautiful black notes of perfumery.
In La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum Absolue, the rose pushes seduction to its peak. Hemmed with a hint of bergamot, the flower first reveals the delicate charm of its petals, then the refinement of the powdery facets of the iris. Embroidered with the deep woody accents of patchouli, darkened by a smoky tea accord enhanced with leather, the queen of flowers leaves the skin with a trail that is both elegant and disturbing, with a rare power.
Created in 1912, the “inverted heart” bottle has gone through more than a hundred years of history to become an icon in its own right. For La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum Absolue, its timeless lines are adorned with a gradient from black to intense pink to evoke the notes of the perfume.
Top Notes: bergamot, cherry, almond
Heart Notes: Damask rose, smoked tea accord, iris
Base Notes: patchouli, leather accord, tonka bean
Available as 30ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum Absolue.
output: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum Absolue by Guerlain is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum Absolue was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cherry, Almond and Bergamot; middle notes are Smoke, Rose, Tea and Iris; base notes are Leather, Patchouli and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
AKRO's Glow Eau de Parfum is inspired by late-night escapades where one can try on a new character among a sea of strangers. This warm and sensual scent ensures that every evening is one to remember.
GLOW is "an addictive party fragrance. One of the reasons we go to parties is the chance to be noticed, admired, or possibly seduced. At their best, parties allow us to become movie stars for the night, bringing people into our orbit and watching them gaze adoringly at us. To attract people, you need to dress beautifully and style your hair perfectly, but the truth is, nothing pulls others towards you like the power of scent.

GLOW is a fragrance formed by our love for parties and nights out. It’s a warm, sensual perfume that will make you the star of any room. A quick spray on your skin and you’ll be brimming with confidence, ready to own the night, ready to Glow.  It subtly evokes flashing lights, the vibration of bass, and the voices floating across a room."

Available as 100ml and 30ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Glow by Akro is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Glow was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top note is Pink Pepper; middle note is Incense; base notes are Vanilla and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In commemorating the opening of the first BDK Parfums store in Paris, David Benedek sought to mark this significant moment with a new addition to La Collection Parisienne. Named after the boutique's address, 312 Saint-Honoré, this fragrance is made with white musks, ambery musks, and lactones.
The opening notes, featuring pink peppercorn, exude a softly spicy adictivness. The floral freshness of orange blossom harmonizes with an animalic accord. The inspiration for this scent is drawn from the materials that decorate the boutique, including window glass, concrete, and white stone, infusing it with freshness and luminosity. Together, they embody a mineral design approach – mirroring the essence of the perfume itself.
Available in 100ml EDP.
output: 312 Saint-Honoré by BDK Parfums is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 312 Saint-Honoré was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexandra Carlin. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Angelica Root; middle notes are Iris, Orange Blossom and Tonka Bean; base notes are White Musk, Ambroxan, Ambrostar™ and Thailand Oud.

Rose Centifolia Extract 1 reveals the rose in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most powerful signature. Overdosed with precious fatty absolute, the rose transcends its power of attraction, beyond its extraordinary florality, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers highlight the intensity of the queen of flowers, sublimating the spicy and honeyed facets specific to Rose absolute, while reinforcing them with swirls of incense and intense patchouli.

Rose Centifolia Extract 1 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.

A sophisticated fragrance that exudes true confidence, French Defense takes control in a tantalizing scent of succulent black cherry, seductive notes of smooth liqueurs, and a bed of velvety woods and ambers. Soft florals are woven throughout the perfume's composition bringing a quiet grace and natural beauty to its structure. Completely captivating, French Defense rises to every occasion, with a scent that sets the tone for success.

A fragrance where water meets matter in the full light of spring. Born under the sun's rays, it combines warmth with freshness, and delicacy with passion, to create a modern violet fragrance full of contrasts.
A luminous floral fragrance for women. Experience a captivating solar encounter in this fruity floral fragrance that opens with the juicy aromas of a sun-kissed pear accord. These bright top notes enhance the powdery and luminous essence of violet leaf absolute at the heart, crafted with 100% responsibly sourced natural violet leaves from Egypt. As the fragrance settles, the tenderness of the violet gains texture with the elegant, silky base notes of iris.
A perfume in harmony with nature. Made entirely of wood, the patented design of the cap requires no plastic, reducing environmental impact. The bottle is made with 20% post-consumer recycled glass. The box is made from material from responsibly managed forests certified by FSC™ and other regulated sources.
Celebrating the beauty of nature, this perfume is made with 90% natural origin ingredients. A perfume bottle inspired by nature. Inspired by violet petals, a delicate purple tone permeates the bottle and box of L'Eau d'Issey Solar Violet. Reflecting the purity of water, the iconic bottle is made of transparent glass, while the pure wood cap echoes the density of matter.

Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Jupiter’s immense satellite has not only inspired our perfume’s name, but is also known to be full of craters and to have an underground ocean vaster than all of earth’s oceans put together. The perfume’s creators, Marc-Antoine Barrois and Quentin Bisch, have imagined it here in a world with an atmosphere brimming with aromatics that it becomes combustible: its sky is gleaming with the sour spike of mandarin and the holy fumaroles of incense and myrrh. It’s a planet covered with warm velvet dunes where the spicy and caramelized everlasting flower is preponderant. The fiery heart of this fragrance reminds us that the gods gave Ganymede eternal life so that his beauty would never fade. Is it the smoldering skin hidden underneath the wild leather? This precious perfume extract is as much a sophisticated perfume as a carnal one.
Ganymede EXTRAIT unfolds in its dizzying trail the seduction of great Classics.
The sound of the waves from far away. The wind is sweeping a field of everlasting flowers. The sun takes out its right and heats the spicy, almost syrupy scent of these yellow flowers. The waves are caressing the dune.
The wind picks up the sand into warm, leathery, heady gusts- incense, myrrhe? Grains of sand are twirling, incandescent. The rock is flushing, the Akigalawood and Mandarin bring minerals and freshness. The air becomes… captivating.
output: Ganymede Extrait by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ganymede Extrait was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Incense, Myrrh and Mandarin Orange; middle note is Immortelle; base notes are Akigalawood and Safraleine.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"In honour of Elle, the first perfume born into the first collection ever created in the Xerjoff portfolio, 17/17, the much-adored scent is celebrated with the creation of Elle Anniversary, a sensual and enchanting scent inspired by the pure beauty that lies at the heart of Elle.
Graceful and floral, the true spirit of Elle is carried in the flair and elegance of Elle Anniversary, scattered with light flecks of fresh notes in the opening, with lychee and bergamot at the top.
A calming and uplifting heart, Elle Anniversary is threaded with delicate jasmine and warm cashmere wood that merge to create a rush of romanticism, which slowly settles to an illustrious base of amber, musk, and patchouli."
OLFACTORY NOTES
Available as 50ml Parfum.
output: Elle Anniversary by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Elle Anniversary was launched in 2023. Top notes are Red Fruits, Litchi, Green Apple and Bergamot; middle notes are Peony, Jasmine, Licorice and Cashmere Wood; base notes are Musk, Amber, Sandalwood and Patchouli.

It has been combined with an exclusive ingredient used for the very first time in perfumery: the ultrasound extract of Hazelnut from Piémont Italy designed internally using a 100% green extraction technology, and the world most qualitative origin of hazelnut! output: Patchouli Noisette by Les Indemodables is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Patchouli Noisette was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Kilian Hennessy crafts in Can't stop loving You a true love declaration: a perfume celebrating love. This floral perfume enters the Narcotics olfactive family with, at the centerpiece, Orange Blossom, a symbol of eternal love. Both luminous and somber, Can't stop loving You is a narcotic floral fragrance that puts peace in danger.

The Perfume: The fragrance opens with the Orange Blossom flower, alongside with Paradisone, an ethereal jasmine compound suggests pure paradise. Its heart is incredibly suave, featuring Honey from Provence, a new ingredient in the KILIAN Paris repertoire, for a delicious French touch. Vanilla absolute from Madagascar adds a doubly gourmand incitement to pleasure, while notes of Oak Moss bring an earthy intensity. Incense extract from Somalia lends sensuality, volume and endless mystery.

The Perfume notes: Orange flower, Labdanum Cistus, Honey."
output: Can't Stop Loving You by By Kilian is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Can't Stop Loving You was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Orange Blossom and Paradisone; middle notes are Honey, Labdanum and Styrax; base notes are Oakmoss, Madagascar Vanilla and Olibanum.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Englewood, New Jersey—Commodity, the modern American perfumery, emphasizes the importance of the journey with the launch of their latest fragrance, JUICE. This new addition comes three years after their bestseller, Milk.
The delay in launching JUICE stems from its unexpected development. Originally, Commodity planned to release a “non-floral floral” fragrance and explored over 50 samples without finding the desired impact. The breakthrough came when perfumer Nathalie Benareau of Symrise presented a fruit-forward fragrance with a distinct floral background that captured their attention, prompting a shift in direction.
“The goal was never to launch a new fragrance just for the sake of novelty,” said Vicken Arslanian, Commodity's Re-Founder and Brand Architect. “We took our time developing the right fit, even if it diverged from our initial plan.”
“JUICE is unlike anything else in our lineup, and I’m excited for customers to explore its three variations,” Arslanian added.
JUICE joins Commodity’s Scent Space Collection, available in three distinct versions: Juice- Personal, Juice Expressive, and Juice+ Bold. Each iteration reimagines a traditional juicy fragrance with tantalizing notes of Strawberry, Raspberry, and Rhubarb. The differences among the versions are highlighted by additional key notes, which alter the projection and define their respective Scent Space:
Juice- Personal: This closely-projecting personal skin scent features fresh Violet Leaf, offering a sparkling interpretation of JUICE that showcases the transparent side of ripe red fruits.
Juice Expressive: This noticeably unique version blends perfectly ripe Strawberry, Rhubarb, and Raspberry Pulp until smooth, with a base of Orientalwood.
Juice+ Bold: This room-filling rendition is steeped in Vetiver and Patchouli, resulting in a jammier interpretation of JUICE.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum, and in travel 10ml size.
output: Juice by Commodity is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Juice was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Benareau. Top notes are Raspberry and Strawberry; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose and Cyclamen; base notes are Rhubarb and Amberwood.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: The new fragrance from Filippo Sorcinelli is being unveiled today right on the heels of Easter events. Filippo emphasizes these moments by interpreting in olfaction some passages from Mark's Gospel, particularly the moment of the Women's astonishment and fear when they realize that the stone of the Sepulcher has rolled away. In an ideal image to describe this moment, the bottle the very expensive aloe- and myrrh-based aromatic oils that they had prepared to anoint Jesus' body is dropped to the ground the moment they saw not only the stone rolled away, but all the white linen cloths that wrapped the body. Hence the announcement of a young man dressed in blazing white.... The bottle along with the four "wings" that open as "ritual" are covered with sand, with dust, just to remind us of the steps, the road and the place. But the attention-blocking element is the cap that mimics the stylistic features of the tombstone that has rolled away, just as they used to be built. The artwork is covered in its entirety by a white linen veil, on which the name of the fragrance is reproduced: HÆEC DIES. The outside of the packaging is also covered with the same linen.
output: HÆC DIES by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. HÆC DIES was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Aloe Vera, Bergamot, Jasmine and Orange; middle notes are Peach, Myrrh, Cedar and Rose; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A new infatuation. A secret escape. The seductive scent of desire. Victoria Beckham evokes the enrapturing fragrance of burgeoning romance through the memory of Portofino ‘97: A euphoric hit of calabrian bergamot and black pepper; crisp white sheets suffused with incense and amber; patchouli and vetiver lingering on the skin of a significant other.
"When David and I first met, we kept our relationship under wraps. This was when I was in the Spice Girls, when we were enormously successful all around the world, and David was playing for Manchester United. In 1997, we decided to take a trip to Portofino. I remember the light, I remember how the hotel smelled and how exciting that time was. I remember it all like it was yesterday." xVB
Available in 50 and 100 ml EDP.
output: Portofino'97 by Victoria Beckham Beauty is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Portofino'97 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. Top notes are Calabrian bergamot and Black Pepper; middle notes are Sea Notes, Amber and Incense; base notes are Vetiver, Musk and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Bergamot Fantastico Extract 11 reveals bergamot in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most intense signature. Top note by essence, bergamot exudes intense freshness and the power of an amber trail, that of a great Guerlain perfume, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers overdose on bergamot and reinforce its green bitterness of petit grain, the very essence of the bergamot tree leaf. Prolonging this intensity, a signature Guerlain amber accord – Shalimar opopanine – reveals a trail as powerful as a base note, carried by the woody and smoky facets of Gaïac wood essence.

Bergamot Fantastico Extrait 11 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.
output: Bergamote Fantastico Extrait 11 by Guerlain is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bergamote Fantastico Extrait 11 was launched in 2023. Bergamote Fantastico Extrait 11 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"A bright summer morning in Sapa Valley, Vietnam, where the morning dew is on the flowers and the sun penetrates through the leaves. A unique and magical moment to admire the magnificent nature.
My eyes caught on a wild red camelia (camellia) with its scarlet petals, I was overwhelmed ... To highlight this floral, humid bouquet, I combined it with the glow of a bergamot and with clean fresh facets. In addition, the sweetness of vanilla and tonka gives this floral fragrance a sensual effect."
Top notes: Bergamot,  Ginger,  Pitaya (Dragon Fruit)
Heart: Camellia,  Orange Blossom,  Jasmine
Base: Tonka Bean,  Vanilla,  Patchouli,  Vetiver

Coty introduces Infiniment Coty Paris, its premium fragrance collection, conceived by CEO Sue Y Nabi and businessman Nicolas Vu, founders of Orveda skin care brand. Featuring 14 fragrances, the line uses Molecular Aura technology, capturing and releasing notes over time. Bottles are refillable, stackable, and reusable, with packaging that represents the letter ‘i’.
"Addictive vanilla elixir. Encore and encore… A thousand times encore! An overdose of never stop ‘til you get enough. An addiction to skin, its essence, the desire to devour this ambery vanilla. An elixir-in-the-rough swoons with carnal proclivities. A concentrate of voluptuousness overwhelms me. Eternal beginnings, here we go again.
The encounter of the sweetness of Vanilla Planifolia and the warm addiction of Vanilla Bourbon, amplified by the amber of Peru Balsam.
Olfactory family: Addictive ambery
Main ingredients: Duo of vanilla
Fragrance oil concentration: 20%"
Available in a 75ml Parfum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Eau de Rochas Citron Soleil, a Citrus Floral Musk, takes you to the Mediterranean Riviera, at the foot of a lemon tree, in a fragrant setting bathed in sunshine.
Eau de Rochas Citron Soleil is a luminous, fresh, and contemporary eau de toilette that is simply delicious. A true star of the perfume, Lemon essence radiates its tangy freshness. The sweetness of Neroli and the crunch of Fig Leaves transport you directly under the lemon trees in bloom. In the heart, Orange Blossom radiates these different facets that are intense and delicate, warm and fresh. In the drydown, the cottony softness of White Musks creates an absolutely irresistible wake. A solar and enveloping fragrance refreshed by a tangy wave for comfortable and radiant wear.
A modern and timeless bottle, faceted and tinted with a sparkling yellow, recalls the iconic Eau de Rochas bottle. A revisited and colorful design whose obvious simplicity creates impact.
Top note: Lemon essence, Neroli, Fig leaf
Heart note: Orange blossom, Rosé accord, Aquatic floral accord
Base Note: White Musks, Oriental Accord, Vibrant Woods
Available as a 100ml Eau de Toilette.
output: Eau de Rochas Citron Soleil by Rochas is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Eau de Rochas Citron Soleil was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lemon, Neroli and Fig Leaf; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Watery Notes, Floral Notes and Rose; base notes are White Musk, Woodsy Notes and Amber.

input:
Pink Woods is a mesmerizingly delightful fragrance introduced by LOVENOTES. Captivating and instantly appealing, this fragrance opens with sparkling notes of Italian Bergamot, making it bright and inviting. A divine woodiness comes from both the back and heart and is wrapped in alluring Vetiver and Lotus Flower. A beautiful blend of Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods shines with a subtle hint of Cotton Candy, creating an unexpected addicting yet unforgettable signature.
"LOVENOTES Pink Woods
Airy. Dreamy. Entrancing.
Introducing Pink Woods, the mesmerizingly delightful fragrance.
A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, exclusively available in North America.
Captivating and instantly appealing, this fragrance opens with sparkling notes of Italian Bergamot making the fragrance bright and inviting.  A divine woodiness comes from both the back and heart and is wrapped in alluring Vetiver and Lotus Flower. A beautiful blend of Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods shines with a subtle hint of Cotton Candy, creating an unexpected addicting yet unforgettable signature.
Fragrance Notes
Top: Italian Bergamot, Lotus Flower
Mid: Jasmine Petals, Tea Leaves, Vetiver
Base: Tonka Beans, Cashmere Woods, Cotton Candy"
output: Pink Woods by Ariana Grande is a Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Pink Woods was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot and Lotus; middle notes are Tea, Vetiver and Jasmine; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Cotton Candy and Tonka.
