instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
HACIVAT X is the new interpretation of NISHANE’s global hit HACIVAT (launched in 2017), paying homage to the traditional shadow play character with a chypre structure that exudes elegance, competence, and love of art. This fragrance is a celebration of life, with stimulating notes of pineapple and bergamot backed by woody notes. It features top notes of juicy pineapple, zesty bergamot, and spicy pink pepper, leading to a heart of refreshing lime, delicate jasmine,and orange blossom. The base notes include earthy patchouli, woody cedarwood, and vetiver from Haiti.
NISHANE is looking forward to hearing the thoughts of the crowded HACIVAT fans worldwide about HACIVAT X and is sure that it will quickly become a new favorite amongst the fragrance enthusiasts with its highly addictive and noticeable scent.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - pineapple - pepper pink
HEART NOTES
lime - jasmine - orange flower
BASE NOTES
patchouli - cedarwood heart - vetiver oil haiti
output: Hacivat X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hacivat X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Pineapple, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lime, Tunisian Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Haitian Vetiver, Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Mirto di Panarea by Acqua di Parma is inspired by an island suspended in time, combining sparkling citrus accents with notes of myrtle and the freshness of juniper. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle, basil, and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
"An original motif of circles, triangles and swirls, created by Dorothée Meilichzon, decorates the special packaging of Mirto di Panarea eau de toilette in a tribute to the serene beauty of the sea and the vibrant energy of the sun that touches the waves. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle that combines with basil and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
Mirto di Panarea is presented in the unmistakable Acqua di Parma bottle, embellished with a decorated cap. An icon of Art Deco, the bottle is made of pure glass in shades of deep blue, which in a play of reflections evokes the transparency of the sea."
output: Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 by Acqua di Parma is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Italian Lemon, Bergamot, Myrtle and Basil; middle notes are Jasmine and Damask Rose; base notes are Amber, Cedarwood and Juniper.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover the amplified intensity of the original Nina scent! Nina Le Parfum is the latest pure and vegan fragrance by Nina Ricci, encouraging you to trust your instincts.
With its captivating allure, Nina Le Parfum tempts you to take risks and hypnotizes you. Let the enticing blend of juicy apples, elegant white flowers, and warm amber wood awaken your curiosity. This fruity, woody, and floral Eau de Parfum lets you explore the limitless bounds of your imagination.
Crafted from 91% naturally derived ingredients, this pure and vegan perfume includes the signature component of the original Nina fragrance, the recycled Italian lemon. The fruits discarded from the food industry due to their size or appearance are repurposed instead of being destroyed, serving as raw fragrance materials. Every part of the lemon, from the flesh to the peel, is utilized, achieving an extra tangy, citrus scent.
“With Nina Le Parfum, we wanted to capture the temptation of forbidden fruit with a trio of natural apple extracts, which is given a body with warm amber wood. A surprising and daring Eau De Parfum to mark a new era for the iconic Nina perfumes.” –Olivier Cresp, Master Perfumer – Ilias Ermenidis, Perfumer
Nina Le Parfum, created with sublime apple extracts, opens with an explosion of fresh fruit. The recycled Italian lemon invigorates the enchanting mixture, accentuating the irresistible allure of the iconic Nina notes. An elegant bouquet of white flowers unfolds at the heart of the perfume, composed of orange blossom, gardenia, and tuberose, bestowing a profound sophistication onto the composition. The warm notes of amber wood combined with vanilla infuse a gentle sensuality for a softer result.
The iconic apple-shaped Nina perfume bottle now wears a charming, bright pink exterior, adding a fresh spin to the scent's appearance. The shiny surface is adorned with silver streaks for a visually delightful brilliance, too enticing to resist. The bottle is crowned with a vibrant pink ribbon, resulting in an utterly captivating and dazzling spectacle.
Top note: Apple trio, Lemon
Heart note: Gardenia, Orange blossom
Base note: Orientalwood, Vanilla
Nina Le Parfum is available as a 30ml, 50ml and 80ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Nina Le Parfum by Nina Ricci is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Nina Le Parfum was launched in 2023. Nina Le Parfum was created by Olivier Cresp, Ilias Ermenidis and Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are Red Apple, Apple, Green Apple and Italian Lemon; middle notes are Tuberose, Orange Blossom and Gardenia; base notes are Amberwood and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Explore the exquisite new rendition of L'Air du Temps Eau de Parfum by Nina Ricci, masterfully reimagined by the gilding virtuoso, Anne Brun.
Embracing the rich tradition of French craftsmanship, Nina Ricci has joined forces with Atelier Anne Brun to present a unique, limited edition of this cherished women's fragrance, L'Air du Temps.
Encased in a fragile lattice of golden blooms, this iconic fragrance bottle is enhanced with Anne Brun's distinguished artistic touches, transforming it into a timeless artwork, as elegant as fine jewelry.
This creation's brilliance is echoed in the scent's new iteration: a radiant, musky amber floral essence brimming with the warmth of sunlight.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Pear, Coconut
Heart Notes: Tiare Flower Accord, Tuberose, Heliotrope
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vetiver, Benzoin
output: L'Air du Temps x Atelier Anne Brun by Nina Ricci is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. L'Air du Temps x Atelier Anne Brun was launched in 2024. input:
Wearing Lucky candy is like drawing a tarot card that continually unveils a delicious surprise. When the marshmallow pops up, you know you’re in for a treat .. your wheel of fortune has appeared. Bergamot and honey commence this sweet celebration, joined by a dollop of coconut cream. Then, it enters the frangipani flower, which raises this scent to another level of delectation. Follow this with a creamy caramel wave of amber and musk kissed by vanilla and sweet toffee. Say hello to your new lucky charm.
TOP NOTES
Roasted Mexican Cocoa Bean, Bergamot Zest, Sweet Honey.
HEART NOTES
Marshmallow & Neroli, Lily of the Valley, Mexican Coconut Cream, Frangipani Flower.
BASE NOTES
Vanilla Pods from Reunion Island, Sweet Toffee, Dry Oriental, Fluffy Musk.
Available as 100ml Eau de Parfum.

Top notes are Bergamot, Honey and Cacao; middle notes are Frangipani, Marshmallow, Neroli, Coconut and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Toffee and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Like an Egyptian," the 17th Eau de Parfum from Miller et Bertaux, beckons you to traverse both time and space. This scent is a captivating journey, transporting you in a moment to the birthplace of fragrances—the era of the Pharaohs. Conceived as a mystical tribute to ancient aromatic concoctions, the perfume is daringly reimagined for contemporary sensibilities by Lucien Ferrero, marking his triumphant comeback to Miller et Bertaux. This heavenly elixir draws inspiration from the ancient Kyphi formula, decoded from an age-old papyrus scroll.
Top notes: Black Pepper, Peruvian Pink Pepper
Heart notes: Indian Cypriol, Oud Boya, Oriental Xtreme
Base notes: Indian Sandalwood, Labdanum Absolute, Oriental, Ambrocenide, Indian Vetyver
output: like an Egyptian... by Miller et Bertaux is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. like an Egyptian... was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Lucien Ferrero. Top notes are Black Pepper, Pink Pepper and Caraway; middle notes are Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Oud, Amber Xtreme and Rose; base notes are Vetyver, Labdanum, Sandalwood, Amber and Ambrocenide.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"What does PHILTRE smell like? Let me set the scene:

By moonlight, the alchemist prepares his philtre, a potion for love and its reciprocation. Around him are a dozen open wood drawers, the contents of which have no name. No need: he knows the recipe by heart. Into a chalice he deposits them carefully—a sprinkle of a fine, powdered spice, a dash of a viscous inky tincture. And for a finishing touch, a single red carnation. As it simmers, the potion begins to glow, emitting a light that warms the whole room." -Hiram Green.
output: Philtre by Hiram Green is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Philtre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Hiram Green.

This unisex fragrance captures and reflects the complexity of precious ingredients with vibrant sophistication. The fragrance opens with invigorating notes of bergamot and mandarin, enhanced by spicy nuances of black pepper, pink pepper, and cardamom. instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I would like to get dirty slowly,
precious useless angel
slow sun fire
where the water rests with me
and caress the song of the skin.
A watch made of honey
with the hours marked by a warm wind
shadows of cicadas
silence of the prickly pear
in an orange
that stings the loneliness.
What does it mean today: "there is no hurry"?
In the obsession of the speed paradoxically the cognition of the time is lost. Here then the desire to stop to recognize and build the solitude of a sunny afternoon.
Slowness then becomes a necessary Caress, almost like boredom, to sink into the limits of silence and continue to listen to life in a way that has now become unknown.
Relying on the arms of a wind without running, which moves the earth burned by memories, is a courage of few, because bathing in this value revolutionizes and repairs.
Lentezza Carezza is a summer smell where loving each other becomes a tool for addressing others with new eyes and a reconstructed soul.
A perfume that transforms the perception of remaining motionless, becoming «a new form of resistance, in a world where everything is too fast. And where the greatest power is to decide what to do with one's time», as Sepùlveda says.
output: Lentezza Carezza by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lentezza Carezza was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are prickly pear, Myrrh, Bergamot and Orange; middle notes are Green Accord, Cedarwood, Cyclamen and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Benzoin, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.

Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Ambre Rubis Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a fragrance for women and men and belongs to the Oriental family. The composition opens with notes of orange, incense, and pink pepper (red berries), followed by a heart of rum, cherry, and jasmine. The base consists of woody notes, cedar, grey amber, and fir resin (balsam).
output: Ambre Rubis by Houbigant is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Rubis was launched in 2024. Ambre Rubis was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Red Berries, Pink Pepper, Orange and Incense; middle notes are Cherry, Rum and Jasmine; base notes are Ambergris, Woody Notes, Cedar and Fir Resin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The elusive scent of Lionora celebrates the seductive allure of grace, beauty, and wisdom. Indulgent bursts of fruits and florals soak into the honeyed, animalic notes of Osmanthus fragrance, before melting into the soft and creamy notes of sandalwood in this luxury perfume. Powerful in its delicacy, and completely enchanting, Lionora captures the passion and romance of new love, and the strength and sweetness of true love.
"Lionora is meant to immerse the senses in the multidimensional texture of apricot skin and blooming white floralcy. Top notes of ginger Madagascar and passionfruit are encased in the soft heart of freesia and the delicate, blossoming petals of our Osmanthus DeLaire. Creamy, edible sandalwood and tonkalactoneleave a warming, skin- hugging trail that feels effortlessly elegant and timeless." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.
output: Lionora by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lionora was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Passionfruit, Tonka Bean and Ginger; middle notes are Apricot, Osmanthus and Freesia; base notes are Lactones, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Vanille Imperiale Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a unisex fragrance belonging to the Citrus and Floral families. The composition opens with notes of bergamot, red orange, and neroli, leading to a heart of rose, tuberose, vanilla, and jasmine. The base features ambrette, musk, and grey amber.
output: Vanille Imperiale by Houbigant is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanille Imperiale was launched in 2024. Vanille Imperiale was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Blood Orange, Neroli and Bergamot; middle notes are Vanilla, Rose, Tuberose and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Ambrette and Ambergris.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: ORANGER SIROCCO was born out of a desire to imagine an olfactory landmark, a sensory compass that is both bright and joyful. This ‘Eau de Parfum’ embodies a return to simpler values, presents itself as an ode to life, and aims to be somewhat contemplative. From the first notes, the mind is carried away by a warm, shimmering wind of sand, on the other side of the Mediterranean, in the heart of an orange blossom grove. With closed eyes, scents and sounds intertwine: the powerful and intoxicating fragrance of orange blossoms, echoing the distant hustle and bustle of a souk, where the aroma of spices mixes in waves, saturating the regular breath of the sirocco.
output: Oranger Sirocco by Les Indemodables is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oranger Sirocco was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Lie.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Immersive and alluring, Good Fortune Elixir Intense Eau de Parfum pulls you in with an entrancing note of incense, paired with an extraordinarily rich infusion of Jasmine. The scent journey continues with the introduction of a mystical Palo Santo blend accompanied by a delicious touch of Bourbon Vanilla.
Good Fortune Elixir Intense represents a more enticing and potent iteration of the original Eau de Parfum. Enigmatic and sensuous, this Intense Eau de Parfum serves as the ultimate charm to seize control of your fate. The fragrance greets you with an enthralling incense note, delicately woven with an ultra-rich Jasmine infusion radiating solar notes. The scent narrative unfolds a mystic harmony: Palo Santo, an incense wood revered for its cleansing properties, is married with a delicious hint of ethically-sourced Madagascar Vanilla Bourbon and Caledonian sandalwood, leading to a seductive, profound, and lavish trail.
Aligning with the ethics and long-term environmental commitment of Maison Viktor&Rolf, Good Fortune Elixir Intense is a cruelty-free fragrance, free from any animal-derived ingredients.
The Good Fortune Elixir Intense is presented in an enigmatic glass container designed like a crystal orb, topped with a faceted amethyst cap that symbolizes strength and positive energy.
Taking inspiration from Maison Viktor&Rolf's "Spiritual Glamour" Haute Couture collection, Good Fortune Elixir Intense Eau de Parfum is a physical representation of a refreshing, positive lifestyle. It serves as an aromatic proclamation around spirituality and self-empowerment, bestowing upon you the power to shape your own destiny.
Top notes: Incense
Middle notes: Solar Jasmine Superinfusion
Base notes: Vanilla Bourbon, Palo Santo, and Caledonian Sandalwood.
output: Good Fortune Elixir Intense by Viktor&Rolf is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Good Fortune Elixir Intense was launched in 2023. Top note is Incense; middle notes are Jasmine and Solar Notes; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Palo Santo and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Hexensalbe is a dark floral fragrance, rooted in the botanical underworld of witchcraft.
Hexensalbe, also known as witches’ flying ointment, was a hallucinogenic salve used in witchcraft in the middle ages. It was a mixture of extremely poisonous ingredients that produced an ecstatic trance with powerful sensations of flying, images of otherworldly creatures and a primal sexual hunger.
The ointment was so poisonous that eating it would be directly fatal, instead it was applied to other soft membranes of the body, armpits and more commonly the genitals. Because of the erotic effects of the high, the salve would often be rubbed directly onto a phallic object like the end of a staff or a broomstick. And so the popular image of witches riding on broomsticks has survived into our times, even if they rode them in a rather different sense. There are records from the 1200’s and forward where women have been found naked in a delirious trance, pleasuring themselves with the spicy devil’s dildo.
output: Hexensalbe by Stora Skuggan is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hexensalbe was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Anna Barkne. Top notes are Licorice and Wormwood; middle notes are Angelica, Rosemary, Belladonna and Tuberose; base notes are Patchouli, Black hemlock or Tsuga and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
SYNOPSIS: 
Have you ever stood alone atop a mountain with chunky snowflakes swirling all around? Such is the splendor you will experience within The Language of Glaciers, a romantic epic which reaches incredible heights and inspires one to leave no moment unappreciated. From the stillness of a moonlit snowshoe excursion, to the rush of witnessing an avalanche safely from above, the recollections of our unnamed narrator will captivate you the same way the solitary song of the snow owl captivated them. Find comfort in the cold and begin to see the world from stunning new perspectives. Critics have called it “A slow-paced story that will burrow straight to the center of your soul” and “Sharp as ice and smooth as a glacial lake.”
NOTES:
White Pine, Lilac, Cashmere, Juniper, Forget Me Not, Blue Bugle, Virgin Snowfall.
output: The Language Of Glaciers by Imaginary Authors is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Language Of Glaciers was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.

Rêvée d'Eliya returns to the rainforest and invites you to immerse yourself in a utopian jungle that comes to life after the rain: a new, untouched garden full of mystical birds and unfamiliar sounds. Its intriguing, warm and aromatic atmosphere is the origin of the sparkling sivas, where exotic flowers combine with tuberose and violets.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: December Vanilla by Paris Corner is a warm and inviting fragrance that captures the essence of the festive season. The scent opens with a blend of vanilla orchid, jasmine, and rum, creating a sweet and alluring introduction. The heart of the fragrance features notes of vanilla, creme brulee, spicy accords, leather, tonka bean, and rose, adding depth and warmth. The base is a rich combination of patchouli, brown sugar, agarwood (oud), amber, and musk, providing a lasting and comforting finish.
output: December Vanilla by Paris Corner is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. December Vanilla was launched in 2023. Top notes are Rum, Vanilla Orchid and Jasmine; middle notes are Vanilla, Creme Brulee, Spicy Notes, Tonka Bean, Leather and Rose; base notes are Brown sugar, Patchouli, Agarwood, Oud, Amber and Musk.

Ripe for the picking.
Alluring, addictive and undeniably sexy, STRAWBERRY LETTER is a crisp, fruity gourmand that opens with playful juiciness and then transitions with unexpectedly chic decadence. Pulpy red strawberries combine with juicy plum nectar to provide a burst of brightness. Fresh florals cascade on top of a sensual mix of amber and tonka bean to reveal a fragrance that is compelling and surprisingly complex. Like a love note sealed with a kiss, STRAWBERRY LETTER is hard to forget.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tom Ford launches Myrrhe Mystère, a new addition to the Private Blend collection, in September 2023. The new exclusive creation delves into the enigmatic world of amber, crafted to showcase Tom Ford's personal interpretation of the ingredient of myrrh.
Myrrhe Mystère embraces the rarity and exclusivity fueled by the ingredient's ancient heritage and expands olfactory horizons with the allure of warm, woody, and sweet notes.
The composition develops with myrrh essence and myrrh resinoid absolute, wrapped up in smooth sandalwood and vanilla notes.
Tom Ford Myrrhe Mystère is available as a 30 and 50 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Myrrhe Mystère by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Myrrhe Mystère was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Rodrigo Flores-Roux.

input:
For this new limited edition, La Petite Robe Noire by Guerlain unveils its first alcohol-free fragrance: L'Eau Rose.
"L'Eau Rose gradually unfurls to leave a bespoke rose scent that combines the freshness of rose essence with the soft, naturally honeyed fragrance of a rose absolute that’s true to the original Eau de Parfum. La Petite Robe Noire’s sumptuous rose, faceted by the most beautiful notes in perfumery, and its instantly recognisable olfactory signature is revealed in all its purity. "
Embodying the chic and effortless style of Parisian women, La Petite Robe Noire is a celebration of freedom, love, and elegance. This fragrance is a tribute to the rose, crafted with a signature blend of the finest black notes in perfumery, symbolizing a unique blend of joy and irreverence.
This latest creation marks a milestone as Guerlain’s inaugural alcohol-free perfume: L'Eau Rose. Composed of 92% natural ingredients, L'Eau Rose merges the beloved scent of the original La Petite Robe Noire eau de parfum with the revitalizing and hydrating properties of an innovative rose water-based formula. This new fragrance approach offers a gentle yet indulgent experience, available for a limited time only.
The iconic “inverted heart” bottle, a staple since 1912, is reimagined for La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose. It features a custom pastel pink lacquer that evokes the soft petals of a delicate rose, reflecting the tender essence of this alcohol-free fragrance.
Top notes: bergamot, black cherry
Middle notes: rose essence, almond, black tea, Damascena rose water
Base notes: patchouli, tonka bean, licorice
Available as 100ml Eau de Parfum, limited edition.
output: La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose Eau de Parfum by Guerlain is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose Eau de Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Black Cherry and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose Water, Rose, Almond and Black Tea; base notes are Tonka Bean, Patchouli and Licorice.

Sol de Janeiro presents After Hours as an intoxicating, velvety, and amber-floral fragrance that invites you to experience the magnetism of an uninhibited evening. Dusk turns to dawn with hypnotic notes of midnight jasmine, black currant, and amber woods.
"I created a bold yet sensual fragrance that dances with you until the sun comes up. A smooth take on Sol de Janeiro’s signature warmth with the intoxicating surprise of night-blooming jasmine."—Gino Percontino.
It is available as a 90ml limited-edition perfume mist.

The nose behind this fragrance is Gino Percontino. Top notes are Black Currant and Pear; middle notes are Vanilla, Night Blooming Jasmine, Whipped Cream and Freesia; base notes are Caramel, Amberwood and Patchouli.

input: Bath & Body Works Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist is a newly launched product from the popular American brand, Bath & Body Works. This fragrance mist contains an alcohol-based formula that is lightweight and easy to wear for everyday use. As a fine fragrance mist, it has a lower concentration of fragrance oils compared to an eau de parfum, making it ideal for those who prefer a more subtle scent. The Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist belongs to the Floral Fruity group of fragrances and is designed to evoke happiness and femininity with its beautiful floral notes. The fragrance notes of the Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist include pink strawberries, peach nectar, and peony blooms. The scent starts off with a sweet and fruity aroma of strawberries and peach, which then blends into a floral heart of peonies. The overall effect is a beautifully balanced fragrance that smells both feminine and fresh. This fragrance would be ideal for those who love fruity scents but also want a touch of floral elegance. The Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist is perfect for spring and summer wear or for any occasion that calls for a light and refreshing fragrance.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tiffany & Co. Rose Gold Eau de Parfum Intense comes out in September 2023, celebrating the house's expertise in precious metals, evoking the sleek and contemporary spirit of rose gold. Maintaining the core identity of the original Rose Gold fragrance, Rose Gold Intense evolves the story for a deeper, richer sensorial experience.

The composition consists of a vibrant world of sparkling citrus and fruits, balanced with radiant pink pepper. At its heart lies a bouquet of orange blossom and jasmine sambac that are mixed with Turkish rose oil and orris butter. The base adds a playful complexity, anchored by an elegant, sustainably sourced patchouli, warm woods, pink sugar, and a marine accord.
Top note: Pink Pepper
Middle note: Orange Flower
Base note: Patchouli
Available in 30, 50 and 75 ml Eau de Parfum Intense.
output: Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense by Tiffany is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense was launched in 2023. Top notes are Fruity Notes, Pink Pepper and Citruses; middle notes are Turkish Rose Oil, Orris, Orange Blossom and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sugar, Patchouli, Woody Notes and Sea Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Ambrosia Aurea opens with a delicate and enticing blend of floral and citrus notes, as the fresh aroma of medlar leaf and narcissus intertwines with the uplifting scent of orange and the soothing sweetness of Roman chamomile and vanilla. This combination creates a bright and uplifting introduction, reminiscent of a sunlit garden in full bloom.
As the fragrance evolves, it moves into a captivating heart where the earthy warmth of carrot seed pairs with the fiery intensity of fire lily, balanced by the gentle sweetness of linden tree and the subtle floral notes of mock-orange. This middle phase adds depth and complexity to the scent, evoking a sense of mystery and allure.
Finally, the fragrance settles into a rich and comforting base, where the golden sweetness of honey combines with the soft sensuality of musk and the warm richness of tonka bean and wattleseed. This final phase leaves a lasting impression, wrapping the wearer in a cozy embrace of sweetness and warmth.
Top Notes: Elysian Narcissus, Vanilla Orange, Roman Chamomile, Nespola Leaves
Heart Notes: Orange Lily, Mythological Linden, Angelica Flower, Carrot Seeds
Base Notes
Acacia Chestnut Wood, Ambrosia Honey , Imperial Musk, Tonka Bean
output: Ambrosia Aurea by Laura Biagiotti is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Ambrosia Aurea was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Cerizza. Top notes are Chamomile, Vanilla, Narcissus, Orange and Medlar; middle notes are Linden Blossom, Fire Lily, Mock Orange and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Honey, Acácia, Tonka Bean, Chestnut and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Lunatique invites you to embrace your darker, hidden aspects, revealing the depths of your personality. This unique fragrance is a journey of contrasts, from bright top notes to deep, mysterious undertones. It opens with a refreshing blend of juniper, pear, and the bold kick of Sichuan pepper, lifting your senses and preparing you for the adventure ahead. The heart reveals unexpected twists of iris, carrot, and neroli, blending a soft floral sweetness with earthy warmth. As the fragrance lingers, it transitions into a sultry base of leather, oud, and ambergris, underscored by rich sandalwood and a whisper of vetiver. The result is a magnetic, enigmatic scent that plays with light and mystery, much like the hidden aspects of your soul.
output: Lunatique by Les Liquides Imaginaires is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lunatique was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Ricord. Top notes are Sichuan Pepper, Pear, Juniper, Marigold and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Blackcurrant, Carrot, Iris, Frankincense, Cyclamen, Ginger and Neroli; base notes are Leather, Oud, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Ambergris, Musk and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the quote “Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames” by Rumi, FAN YOUR FLAMES, launched in 2016, is another global hit of NISHANE. Underlining the desire of people to be surrounded by the friends who would encourage them no matter what they want to do with their life, the original formula offers a blend of notes that evoke a warm and inviting atmosphere. The new offering FAN YOUR FLAMES X is designed to soften the flames of the original bestseller by a gentle touch of tropical flavors.
The fragrance opens with a combination of coconut, rum, and lentisque, which gives off a sweet and tropical vibe. The heart of the fragrance features a mix of tobacco, tonka bean, and thyme oil, which creates a rich and spicy aroma. The base notes consist of cedar, oakmoss, and patchouli, which provide a woody and earthy finish to the fragrance. This scent is a great choice for those who love warm and comforting fragrances with a touch of exoticism.
TOP NOTES
coconut - rum - lentisque
HEART NOTES
tobacco - tonka bean - thyme oil - carrot
BASE NOTES
cedar- oakmoss - patchouli
output: Fan Your Flames X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fan Your Flames X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Miroslav Petkov. Top notes are Coconut, Rum and Mastic or Lentisque; middle notes are Tobacco, Tonka Bean, Carrot and Thyme; base notes are Patchouli, Cedar and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
White Pearl is inspired by the magnificent Akoya pearls that enchant with the wonder of roundness and shades of color, as well as the natural luster that makes them unique in the world. Pearls have always been synonymous with class and elegance, and Queen Elizabeth particularly loved them. Symbolizing the bond with these very special pearls Queen Elizabeth II’s historic piece of jewelry, the four-strand pearl choker the “Japanese Pearl Choker.” The pearl, one of the most precious gems, is a symbol of purity and innocence. A little treasure given to by the sea and it is precisely the marine notes that serve as the basis for an interweaving of ethereal floral notes and lively spices.
The fresh accord of Pink Pepper and Cardamom is masterfully interwoven with the fleshy floral bouquet of Ylang Ylang, Rose, and Iris. A blend capable of evoking the iridescent hues and smooth, polished texture of a precious white pearl. Perfumer is Cristian Calabro.
"The harmony of details and overall vision marks the moment of balance, from that moment the creative idea has form and identity." Cristina Mercaldo, Creative Director
White Pearl is available in the iconic bottle of 75ml and belongs to Royal Stones collection.
output: White Pearl by The House of Oud is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. White Pearl was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Cristian Calabro. Top notes are Ylang-Ylang, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Iris, Rose and Tonka Bean; base notes are Marine notes and Ambergris.

Sentence A: White Pearl is inspired by the magnificent Akoya pearls that enchant with the wonder of roundness and shades of color, as well as the natural luster that makes them unique in the world. Pearls have always been synonymous with class and elegance, and Queen Elizabeth particularly loved them. Symbolizing the bond with these very special pearls Queen Elizabeth II’s historic piece of jewelry, the four-strand pearl choker the “Japanese Pearl Choker.” The pearl, one of the most precious gems, is a symbol of purity and innocence. A little treasure given to by the sea and it is precisely the marine notes that serve as the basis for an interweaving of ethereal floral notes and lively spices.
The fresh accord of Pink Pepper and Cardamom is masterfully interwoven with the fleshy floral bouquet of Ylang Ylang, Rose, and Iris. A blend capable of evoking the iridescent hues and smooth, polished texture of a precious white pearl. Perfumer is Cristian Calabro.
"The harmony of details and overall vision marks the moment of balance, from that moment the creative idea has form and identity." Cristina Mercaldo, Creative Director
White Pearl is available in the iconic bottle of 75ml and belongs to Royal Stones collection.. Sentence B: White Pearl by The House of Oud is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. White Pearl was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Cristian Calabro. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "Maison Guerlain invites you to its new exceptional event in a numbered edition dedicated to the Chinese New Year. Each year, a new collaboration will celebrate the astrological sign of the Chinese calendar. Guerlain thus inaugurates the first edition with its 2024 vintage under the sign of the dragon, symbolizing the year to come. Dressed in red for the occasion, the legendary Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a sumptuous golden dragon adorned with Swarovski® crystals designed by Parisian jeweler Francesco Truscelli. This exceptional piece welcomes the powerful trail of Néroli Outrenoir in the image of the imperial dragon."
output: Néroli Outrenoir (2024) by Guerlain is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Néroli Outrenoir (2024) was launched in 2024. Néroli Outrenoir (2024) was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser. Top notes are Petitgrain, Bergamot, Lemon, Tangerine and Grapefruit; middle notes are Tea, Neroli, Earthy Notes, Orange Blossom and Smoke; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Myrrh and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tinged with modernity by the spiciness of pepper, the creamy velvety Italian milk foam accord frees itself of its candor.
The hedonistic spirit of Roma in glass and light.
The rectangular glass bottle stands the true test of time. A transparency evincing that there is nothing to hide yet everything to discover. The studded cap made of glass echoes Maison Valentino’s signature emblem, the stud, a square and cruciform shape that pays homage to Rome and to the "bugnato" found on the Roman Palazzos. A recognizable insignia that has expressed the Maison’s identity over time.
The flacon is completed by a golden champagne spray button and the engraved VLogo. Echoing the fabric of Haute Couture boxes, each fragrance finds its name on the canvas fabric. A dimensional stud reflects each juice’s color at the base of the bottle.
output: Sogno In Rosso by Valentino is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sogno In Rosso was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Black Pepper, Juniper Berries and Petitgrain; middle notes are Milk, Orange Blossom and Olibanum; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Madagascar Vanilla, Sandalwood and Ambergris.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Desert Dawn by Byredo is a celebration of nature’s creative juxtapositions, offering a universal take on the woody olfactive family. This scent opens with the inviting sweet spices of cardamom and rose petals, before giving way to the enveloping warmth of sandalwood, cedarwood, and carrot seeds at the heart. An enticing finish of vetiver and silk musk is enlivened by the crisp, clean scent of papyrus, invoking the dry heat of the desert and the warmness of the first rays of dawn.
Byredo Desert Dawn is available in 50 ml and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Desert Dawn by Byredo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Desert Dawn was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. Top notes are Rose Petals and Cardamom; middle notes are Sandalwood, Cedarwood and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Musk, Papyrus, Silk and Vetiver.

input:
Caressing a dark oud, the rose is soft but provocative. It is both brutal and warm, its unpredictability is addictive. Rich, dark, warm and dangerous. An intense and heady oud wood enveloped in a blanket of sweet praline and delicate rose. Like contemplating a starry night in the sky of the Domaine, at the height of summer.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Fabrice Pellegrin:
"The first gourmet oud: a deliciously irresistible oud... This 'pleasure oud' awakens our senses with its addictive intensity and its epicurean signature."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.
output: Absolue Oud Bouquet by Lancôme is a Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Oud Bouquet was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin.

Available in a 75ml Parfum.

Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Rose Du Desert Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a unisex fragrance and belongs to the floral and oriental families. The composition opens with notes of bergamot, lemon blossom, and yuzu, leading to a heart of violet, iris, rose, and vanilla. The base includes cedar, musk, patchouli, and ambergris.

Rose du Desert was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Yuzu, Lemon Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose, Iris, Violet and Vanilla; base notes are Ambergris, Cedar, Patchouli and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Cherry Baby by Sabrina Carpenter is the third fragrance in her Sweet Tooth collection with Scent Beauty. This Eau De Parfum features a blend of cherry cosmo, glazed apple, plum nectar, brown sugar, red poppy, peony blossom, dark chocolate, vanilla orchid, cashmere wood, sensual musk, patchouli elixir, and amber resin. The fragrance is presented in a red, chocolate bar-shaped bottle, mirroring the design of the other perfumes in the collection.
"Cherry Baby: A Flirty, Addictive Fragrance
Let the indulgent aroma of cherries and chocolate envelop you, swirling in a flirty mist of red poppy and peony. Feel the addictive embrace of vanilla orchid and the whisper of sensual musk as it caresses your skin, leaving a trail of seduction in its wake."
Sabrina Carpenter said: “I wanted my new fragrance to be unexpected but something upscale and sophisticated while still feeling playful and provocative. Cherry Baby is timeless and flirty which encourages letting the sultry, glamorous side of you show in the best way possible.”
Available in 75 ml Eau de Parfum as a sa body mist.
output: Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby by Sabrina Carpenter is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gil Clavien. Top notes are Cherry, Brown sugar, Plum and Apple; middle notes are Dark Chocolate, Red Poppy, Vanilla Orchid and Peony; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Musk, Amber, Resin and Patchouli.

The fragrance is dedicated to a special variety of jasmine called Grand Duke de Toscane – a jasmine sambac variety with lush double and even triple flowers that resemble small white roses.
The perfumer assembled a jasmine accord from jasmine sambac absolute and jasmine grandiflorum absolute by IFF- LMR (Jasmine Absolute India LMR), noting that the Indian absolute, unlike others, smells cleaner and brighter, with fruity overtones, and is devoid of animalistic "dirtiness." In addition to the precious materials mentioned, the scent of the Grand Duke de Toscane flower itself, obtained using the headspace method, is added to the jasmine accord. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Dreams inspire our creativity; they surround us with images, memories, and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family,
SISLEY. CRUSHED MASTIC PISTACHIOS
"The most wonderful of the stars became his downfall," wrote the poet Philippe Desportes in one of his beautiful interpretations of the myth of Icarus. Free and adventurous, the fragrance named in honor of Icarus, Rêvée d'Ikar, takes its inspiration from the shining sun, and proud and fresh landscapes of Corsica, one of the places that the d'Ornan family calls home. The essence of green mastic pistachio, an airy resinous shrub, combines with earthy vetiver to reveal warm, unexpected notes. A powerful and seductive aroma.
Top notes: bitter orange, lemon, geranium
Middle notes: pistachio, iris, mastic
Base notes: sandalwood, labdanum, vetiver
output: L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar by Sisley is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Ricord. Top notes are Lemon, Bitter Orange and Geranium; middle notes are Mastic or Lentisque, Iris and Pistachio; base notes are Vetiver, Labdanum and Sandalwood.

input:
L'EAU KENZO for Women Sunlight Limited Edition Eau de Toilette 50ml
KENZO PARFUMS introduces its new fragrance for women, L'Eau Kenzo Sunlight Limited Edition.
L'EAU KENZO continues to draw inspiration from abundant nature. Capturing the scents of flowers, fruits, freshness, and happiness, KENZO seizes this sun-drenched and colorful water for a rendezvous with the skin. Twenty-seven years after the launch of L'EAU Kenzo Pour Femme, Olivier Cresp reinterprets his iconic creation. This new eau de toilette is characterized by a generous bouquet of lotus flowers, uplifted by light lemon notes resting on a base of cedarwood. The smooth, velvety notes of osmanthus flowers infuse the fragrance with its Japanese origins.
The formula contains 92.5% natural ingredients*, aligning this new Eau de Toilette for women with our vision of a more beautiful world. The L'Eau Kenzo bottle reflects one of nature's essential elements: water. Its vertical design pays tribute to the strength of this incredible life source. Committed to a more beautiful world, the L'Eau Kenzo Sunlight Limited Edition for Women bottle contains 15% recycled glass.
output: L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme Sunlight Edition Limitée by Kenzo is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme Sunlight Edition Limitée was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top note is Lemon; middle notes are Lotus and Osmanthus; base note is Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Flower By Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne is announced as a radiant Eau de Parfum that combines the iconic urban poppy with the flowers that grow freely in the Parisian fields. The fragrance brings new vitality to Kenzo's iconic Eau de Parfum.
Perfumers Alberto Morillas and Dora Baghriche visit the Masami flower farm to capture the olfactory notes of the Dahlia, the emblematic flower of the countryside. Using headspace technology, which allows the natural aromatic compounds exhaled by the flowers to be collected under a glass dome, dahlias release their aromas in a pure state, intact and wild, so that perfumers can recreate them with a natural and spontaneous olfactory identity.
Its signature, a subtle blend of Rosa Damascena and White Musks, opens to fresh new facets: the acidity of bright yellow mandarin, the spiciness of a pink Dahlia accord, and the sweetness of Tonka Bean.
Top notes: Yellow mandarin essence, Pink pepper extract
Heart notes: Dahlia, Rosa Damascena Essence
Base Notes: Vanilla, White Musk, Tonka Bean
Available in 40 and 75 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne by Kenzo is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne was launched in 2024. Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne was created by Alberto Morillas and Dora Baghriche. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Yellow Mandarin; middle notes are Dahlia and Damask Rose; base notes are White Musk, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Magnolia Grandiflora is a grandiose evergreen tree whose traces can be found also in the prehistoric era. It questions our notion of time with its unusual ability to pass through times, to adapt to different environments, and to preserve its one-of-a-kind individuality. A rare talent that reminds of Officina Profumo-Farmaceutica di Santa Maria Novella’s own history. An awe-inspiring exemplar of Magnolia Grandiflora also graces the facade of Villa Medici di Castello: this species arrived in Florence in the 18th century, and it was soon grown in the Medici's family possessions.
output: Magnolia (2023) by Santa Maria Novella is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Magnolia (2023) was launched in 2023. Top notes are White Rose and Geranium; middle notes are Magnolia, Jasmine Sambac and Champaca; base notes are Musk and Amber.

input: Jimmy Choo Blossom Special Edition 2023 is a rounded fruity floral aroma, created as a celebration of Spring. For the 2023 Edition of Blossom perfume Jimmy Choo combined floral and fruity woody aromas with bright edible fruits, such as Raspberry. Jimmy Choo Blossom Special Edition 2023 perfume begins with sweet exotic fruits, such as Mandarin Orange, Mango and Grapefruit. These are delicately layered over a floral heart dominated by the key note of Frangipani Flower with Jasmine and Raspberry to brighten. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Vanilla Suede by Ariana Grande is a richly sensorial fragrance that delivers an incredibly edible and delectable, almost veil-like sensuality. The top teases with sparkling notes, while the heart reveals intimate warmth with Creamy Sandalwood and Rice Milk. The base of Vanilla Beans and Liquid Musks further enhances the cocooning sensuality and skin-like appeal.
"LOVENOTES Vanilla Suede
Lush. Sensuous. Exotic.
Introducing Vanilla Suede, a richly sensorial fragrance.
A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, exclusively available in the UK.
An irresistible beautiful second skin feeling, the fragrance delivers an incredibly edible and delectable, almost veil like sensuality. The top teases with an introduction of sparkling notes, but the essential story of intimate warmth starts to emerge in the heart from the Creamy Sandalwood and Rice Milk. The Vanilla Beans and Liquid Musks in the back further push this story bringing more cocooning sensuality and a skin-like appeal.
Fragrance Notes
Top: Italian Bergamot
Mid: Creamy Sandalwood, Rice Milk
Base: Vanilla Beans, Liquid Musks"
output: Vanilla Suede by Ariana Grande is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Suede was launched in 2024. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Milk, Rice and Sandalwood; base notes are Vanilla and Musk.

input:
The ozonic theme corresponds to the style and artistic vision of Francesca Bianchi. The perfume has a fresh and cheerful aspect, but also complex and dramatic. The ozonic accord works thanks to the strong presence of amber. The transparency of the ozonic chord is converted into an opaque and iris into an opaque and dense note by the iris and has an almost sacred and mystical character evoked by elemi and incense.
This unisex fragrance is fresh and transparent on the one hand and dense and structured on the other. The citrus and ozonic opening has a crisp and modern character, enhanced by the sharp edge of the aldehydes.
output: The Mariner's Rhyme by Francesca Bianchi is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Mariner's Rhyme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francesca Bianchi. Top notes are elemi, Bergamot, Grapefruit and Lavender; middle notes are Ozonic notes, Iris and Orange Blossom; base notes are Oakmoss, Frankincense, Patchouli and Amber.

At dawn, the first rays of the sun are reflected on the morning dew, the rose shines with its lily of the valley accord. She is as optimistic as a new day. She dances alongside the Domaine’s jasmine. Clean and bright, fresh and floral, it reminds us of the endless possibilities available to us.
The vision of Master Perfumers Fanny Bal & Dominique Ropion:
"This composition is clear as morning dew. A pure, delicate and sunny rose, shaped instinctively."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first collection of high perfumery dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the construction of the halo. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each fragrance in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of Lancôme's exclusive rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.
output: Absolue 6AM Rose by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue 6AM Rose was launched in 2024. Absolue 6AM Rose was created by Fanny Bal and Dominique Ropion.

Inspired by the captivating sight of a sunset on the Amalfi Coast, Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon reveals a fresh and sunny composition of Italian blood oranges illuminated by the femininity of Jasmine Sambac and the essence of Basil. In the background, the enveloping creaminess of cedarwood and white musk reveal its irresistible fragrance. A bright citrus floral fragrance that combines freshness and sensuality, like a delicate caress on the skin.
CONTINUITY
An elegant and modern bottle, tinted with a pop and sparkling orange, twisting the iconic codes of Eau de Rochas into a colorful and decidedly contemporary variation.
output: Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon by Rochas is a Citrus fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophie Labbé. Top notes are Blood Orange, Tangerine and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac, Magnolia and Basil; base notes are White Musk, Ambrofix™ and Cedar.

input:
Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY.
IRISES BETWEEN WATER AND ICE
If the fragrance Rêvée d'Alma were a picture hanging on the wall, it would reflect the French countryside with rivers, ponds and reeds. In the aroma, you can feel the depth of silky clear fresh water, which grabs and awakens you like a crystal song. The combination of delicate watery irises and icy cardamom transforms Rêvée d'Alma into a pure and joyful aroma.
Top notes: basil, bergamot, icy cardamom
Middle notes: water iris, jasmine, rose
Base notes: cedar, patchouli, vetiver

Top notes are Basil, Bergamot, Ice and Cardamom; middle notes are Watery Notes, Iris, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vetiver, Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Maison Crivelli presents Oud Cadenza, an extrait de parfum developed in collaboration with perfumer Jordi Fernandez. Inspired by Thibaud Crivelli's personal adventure of smelling oud at a hidden party in a palm grove, this fragrance features a surprising contrast of oud with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.
"Oud Cadenza Extrait de parfum
The defining adventure: smelling oud while attending a hidden party in a palm grove.

The surprising contrast: oud contrasts with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.

Fragrance family: gourmand woody (vegan).

Key raw materials: cardamom oil from India ORPUR, cinnamon bark oil, saffron, oud wood accord, davana oil from India OPRUR, cocoa butter absolute ORPUR, vanilla extract from Madagascar ORPUR, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, toasted tonka bean absolute from Venezuela ORPUR, myrrh.

The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house."
output: Oud Cadenza by Maison Crivelli is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Cadenza was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernandez. Top notes are Saffron, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Ginger, Nutmeg and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Dates, Caramel, Agarwood (Oud), Sugar Cane, Incense, Amberwood, Myrrh and Davana; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Tonka, Cacao Butter, Leather, Benzoin, Musk, Patchouli, Labdanum and Mate.

A composition with an enveloping creaminess, in which the scarlet notes of black cherry and wild strawberry blend with champagne, in a seductive cocktail, and alternate with the voluptuous petals of rose and jasmine and then explode into a base of warm and intoxicating scents.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "I have always believed that perfume is (synonymous with) pleasure. I named the collection Oudgasm because I wanted something that was just as bold as the juices themselves! Out of all the fragrance notes in the world, oud has always given me this incredibly euphoric feeling that is both transformative and transportive - as if it exists in its own universe. My love for oud turned into passion once I moved to the Middle East over 20 years ago where I truly embraced the ritual of layering with it as an act of self expression and self love. The intensity, the richness and the beauty of this ingredient can tell so many stories - so when I started working on Oudgasm, I knew it couldn’t be bottled in just one fragrance! I wanted to explore oud and all of its brilliant facets in hopes that, you too, will fall in love." - Mona Kattan
output: Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense by Kayali Fragrances is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Hamid Merati-Kashani. Top notes are Cappuccino, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Geranium and Rose; base notes are Oud, White Musk, Vanilla and Patchouli.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.

input:
An alluring rendezvous. An entrancing escapade. The intoxicating parfum of glamour. Victoria Beckham conjures the sumptuous spirit of whirlwind weekends in Paris in the memory of Suite 302: An erotic mélange of black cherry and red peppercorn; dimmed hotel rooms clouded in rose centifolia, midnight violet and narcotic musk; plush velvets saturated with papyrus, black leather and masculine tobacco leaf.

Suite 302 embodies intoxicating glamour, a deep and confident love, wrapped up in the sumptuous memory of Victoria and David's whirlwind anniversary trips to Paris. What adventure: the seduction swirls from dimmed hotel rooms clouded with bold florals and spicy peppercorn to intimate walks of the city's winding streets at midnight, imbued with a trail of smoky masculine notes.

Each responsibly-crafted fragrance is bottled in a flacon inspired by a vintage parfum bottle Victoria collected while traveling. The white enamel of the Suite 302 bottle is reminiscent of the little white Roberto Cavalli dress Victoria wore for her surprise vow renewal with David.
"This fragrance captures the memories of David and I in Paris. This is the city we sneak off to, it is always our happy place, whether for an occasional weekend, or a birthday, or anniversary, I’ve always felt a natural connection to Paris." xVB
output: Suite 302 by Victoria Beckham Beauty is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Suite 302 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. Top notes are Black Cherry and Red Pepper; middle notes are Violet and Rose; base notes are Black Leather and Tobacco.

Out of all the fragrance notes in the world, oud has always given me this incredibly euphoric feeling that is both transformative and transportive - as if it exists in its own universe. My love for oud turned into passion once I moved to the Middle East over 20 years ago where I truly embraced the ritual of layering with it as an act of self expression and self love. The intensity, the richness and the beauty of this ingredient can tell so many stories - so when I started working on Oudgasm, I knew it couldn’t be bottled in just one fragrance! I wanted to explore oud and all of its brilliant facets in hopes that, you too, will fall in love." - Mona Kattan. Sentence B: Oudgasm Vanilla Oud | 36 Eau de Parfum Intense by Kayali Fragrances is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oudgasm Vanilla Oud | 36 Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2023. Oudgasm Vanilla Oud | 36 Eau de Parfum Intense was created by Hamid Merati-Kashani and Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Saffron, Praline and Pear; middle note is Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Vanilla Sugar, Oud, White Musk, Oakmoss and Cashmere Wood..

Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"There can be no mistaking his deep gaze. His eyes are fixated to the intangible and he moves forward peacefully. At first sight, this piquant character pulls you in. The brightness of his smile, and the pink Pepper come to pick you up. Cross his path and you immediately turn away from your routine. The space around him becomes his, permeated by a purple wave of Plum and black Cherry that whisper of its sweet origin and touch your soul.
It’s a beautiful summer, a summer echoing its temperance and made of the sun’s caresses under the light sheets, of fresh Flowers opening in the morning and of starry nights in the souvenir of the scorching day.
The soft Indian Rose gently balances the Leather and black Oud in a semi-hypnotic pendulum where Sandalwood and Vanilla mingle without excess. You are touching a rare, ambered and deeply oriental feeling, a sensation whose genesis you would not know: who from the message or the messenger, who from the wake one has been left in or its wearer? Who from the top note or the heart will take you to your own immensity?
It doesn’t matter, because in the end, all roads lead to Infinity." - Montale
NOTES
Black Cherry, Plum, Peruvian Pink Pepper, Cardamom & Saffron.
Black Oud & Leather, Indian Rose & Solar Tuberose, Sandalwood & Vetiver.
Vanilla Sugar, Intense Oriental, Tobacco Leaves, Tonka Beans & Musk.
output: Infinity by Montale is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Infinity was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Plum, Saffron, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Oud, Leather, Sandalwood, Rose, Vetiver and Tuberose; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Vanilla Sugar, Tonka, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Clary Sage Eau de Parfum Intense is a fantastic journey outside and inside us: it is walking on an imaginary path that reconnects us to nature, offering a sweeping bird's-eye view of everything and simultaneously profound introspection within ourselves. It is a tribute to one’s ability to disengage from a physical place — such as a frenetic city like Milan — and the present.  It is knowing how to be on the "Streets of Milan" yet in an abstract ‘elsewhere’. To create this transcendental effect, perfumer Julie Massé harmonized a bouquet of essences with a woody scent known in ancient medicinal wisdom for their relaxing and invigorating power. Clary Sage Eau de Parfum Intense has a charismatic personality that takes advantage of the presence of an extraordinary millèsime  ingredient, the concrete of Blue Hemlock, a conifer with greenish-blue reflections and fresh, vigorous notes able to convey an extraordinary relaxing effect.

Clary Sage has a bright and energetic overture that comes from the semi-sweet, tart notes of grapefruit essential oil and those of Clary Sage [Salvia Sclarea], famous in phytotherapy for its healing, if not salvific, properties, as the Latin name infers. In perfumery it is loved for its fresh, spicy and herbaceous olfactory imprint. Furthermore, Sclareol is extracted through the steam distillation of Clary Sage leaves and flowers, whose aromatic and woody notes add depth and complexity to the fragrance and also help improve its persistence. In the heart notes, we find the millèsime ingredient, Blue Hemlock concrete, whose vibrant, aromatic notes instill a feeling of relaxation and a desire to merge with nature. The woody accord is completed by the fresh, spicy notes of Balsam Fir Absolute, which invite mental clarity, and the sweet and luminous notes of Myrtle. Finally, the essence of Patchouli with its magical and aphrodisiacal notes enriches the fragrance. To fix the bouquet, two synthetic molecules were used: Vegan Ambrettolide, a synthetic molecule with delicate musky notes that increases the persistence of the fragrance, and Orcanox™ — synthesized from Sclareol — replacing ambergris of animal origin with fixative properties and powdery, sensual notes.
Julie Massé: “I wanted to create something unusual and provocative, strong enough to induce a dizzying sense of pleasure in which the unexpected note of Hemlock meets an enveloping note of Balsam Fir and a hypnotic note of Clary Sage.”
TOP NOTES: Grapefruit Essential Oil, Clary Sage Essential Oil
HEART NOTES: Myrtle Essential Oil, Hemlock Concrete, Balsam Fir Absolute                                 
BASE NOTES: Vegan Ambrettolide, Patchouli Essential Oil, Orcanox ™
OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Woody / Aromatic / Addictive
output: Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata by Trussardi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie Massé. Top notes are Grapefruit and Clary Sage; middle notes are Balsam Fir, Myrtle and Hemlock; base notes are Ambrettolide, Orcanox™ and Patchouli.

"Enter another dimension with Nina Illusion, the new conscious and vegan feminine Eau de Parfum by Nina Ricci. A colourful fragrance that invites you to escape the ordinary and experience the extraordinary.
Prepare to be delighted by the unexpected nature of this remarkable Eau de Parfum. Infused with a charming touch of enchantment, thischypre fruity floral fragrance beckons you to delve into its extraordinary world and reveal your magic.

Nina Illusion surprises as the softness of orange blossom intertwines with the tantalizing tang of raspberry, while velvety patchouli brings tender warmth. Together, they conjure an olfactory spell that mesmerizes the senses, inviting you to experience the illusion."
"Nina Illusion immerses you in a colorful world infused with a touch of magic. We blended soft orange blossom with effervescent raspberry and creamy patchouli to create this captivating and addictive new Eau de Parfum." – Olivier Cresp, Master Perfumer – Nicolas Bonneville, Perfumer
"The iconic Nina apple-shaped bottle glistens with bold iridescent pink, reflecting reality in a lens of rose-tinted enchantment.

Affixed with a vibrant green satin ribbon is a precious pink flower jewel designed by Hugo Kreit—to be worn as a choker, bracelet or ring. The box reveals hidden surprises within: a surreal illustration by artist Jeanine Brito, who has worked alongside Harris Reed for Nina Ricci fashion, and a message written inside for you to discover."
Available in 30, 50 and 80 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Nina Illusion by Nina Ricci is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Nina Illusion was launched in 2024. Nina Illusion was created by Olivier Cresp and Nicolas Bonneville. Top notes are Yuzu, Italian Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Raspberry and Orange Blossom; base notes are Patchouli and Bourbon Vanilla.

Italian fashion house Costume National introduces Paperplane, a fragrance paying homage to the brilliance of Leonardo da Vinci and the art of origami. A sensory journey delving into our emotions, Paperplane embodies wonder, the realization of dreams, and the illusion of suspended movement in the recesses of the mind.
This is a delicate "clean" scent that evokes the image of a graceful paper airplane hovering in the air. It displays transparent notes of cotton flowers combined with musk, vetiver and amber, with a whiff of incense.
Crafted by perfumer Dominique Moellhausen, the fragrance features notes of cotton flower, incense, pepper, musk, cypriol, sage, vetiver, and amber.
Costume National Paperplane is available in 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Paperplane by CoSTUME NATIONAL is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Paperplane was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Moellhausen. Top notes are Pepper, Paper, Incense and Cotton Flower; middle notes are Vetiver, Sage and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; base notes are Musk, Oakmoss and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The Merchant of Venice reminiscents of ancient times when pharaohs lived in grand palaces and lived luxuriously. The Queen of The Night Eau de Parfum starts with spicy notes of saffron and cinnamon, evoking the bustling bazaars of that era. As it delves deeper, it evolves into the comforting scents of incense and amber, creating a warm and sensual atmosphere, ultimately leading to the balanced blend of tonka bean and sandalwood.
Queen of the Night is a lavish fragrance that pays tribute to the opulence of timeless royalty. It takes inspiration from Kiphy, the traditional Egyptian perfume, but adds a modern twist, in line with The Merchant of Venice's approach of blending historical recipes with innovative elements.
Top notes: Blue lotus, Saffron, Cinnamon bark
Middle notes: Kyphi accord, Incense, Oriental
Base notes: Sandalwood, Tonka bean, Myrrh
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Queen of The Night by The Merchant of Venice is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Queen of The Night was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gaël Montero. Top notes are Saffron, Cinnamon and Blue Lotus; middle notes are Frankincense, Amber and Kyphi; base notes are Myrrh, Tonka and Sandalwood.

"A powerfully feminine amber floral fragrance with voluptuous tuberose amplified by daring kicks of red ginger on a warm rich dry down.
Who said that you’re too much? There’s no such thing. Take up space and amplify your presence with the powerfully feminine, daring fragrance All or Nothing Amplified."
"Powerfully feminine, this fragrance commands attention with voluptuous floral facets amplified by daring spiciness on a warm rich dry down. The fragrance opens with a burst of juicy mandarin and blazing pink peppercorn. A floral heart of voluptuous Tuberose interlaces with a bold and unexpected Red Ginger to make a daring statement. Leaving a voluminous sillage, woods and vanilla dance with addictive precious amber facets that set the tone."
This fragrance contains Orpur™ quality Tuberose Absolute, Red Ginger, Mandarin Oil and Patchouli Oil.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: White Milk is an inspired expression of Bianco Latte by Giardini Di Toscana. The scent of white milk is cleverly achieved through thoughtfully pieced together accords. Creamy caramel covers the blend with its lactonic and slightly salty personality. Tonka bean combines with the carnal sensation of honey, while white musk pieces everything together in a clean and comforting fashion. Vanilla occupies the base to build upon the sweetness and the white milk accord. White Milk is designed to bring about a sense of warmth and comforting familiarity.
output: White Milk by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. White Milk was launched in 2024.

Bath & Body Works Sweet Petal Pound Cake Fine Fragrance Mist is a scent that combines floral and fruity notes for a sweet and invigorating aroma. Bath & Body Works is a well-known brand that specializes in body care products, and this fragrance mist is no exception. The fragrance mist is a fine mist spray that can be used all over the body for a long-lasting scent experience.
The fragrance notes of Bath & Body Works Sweet Petal Pound Cake Fine Fragrance Mist include candied rose, raspberry swirl, and frosted bundt cake. These notes combine to create a scent that smells like the perfect swirl of fruity and floral. The candied rose note adds a touch of sweetness to the fragrance, while the raspberry swirl note adds a fruity aroma. The frosted bundt cake note brings a warm and comforting smell to the mix. Overall, this fragrance is best described as a Floral Fruity scent .
output: Sweet Petal Pound Cake by Bath & Body Works is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Sweet Petal Pound Cake was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The sun sparkled across rippling waves, its morning dance upon the Indian Ocean rousing the dodos from their carefree slumber. Stumbling drunkenly across the forest floor they feasted on overripe fruit where it lay, dropped for them by the lush island paradise that nurtured them. For generations, the predator-free and bountiful shores lulled them into such a state of complacency that their wings grew idle, and flight was lost – even to memory. Ultimately evolution would betray them, but while it lasted, the dodos enjoyed an existence marked by ease and comfort.
In Zoologist Dodo, notes of jackfruit and bergamot border a winding path dappled with aromatic turmeric and pink pepper. Venture along it to the heart of an island forest where hints of powdery orris emerge from beneath a potpourri of lavender, geranium, and orange flower. Soothed by the comforting florals, you’ll soon surrender, sinking into the loam where woody tonka and sandalwood sprout from an earthy base of patchouli and vetiver.
output: Dodo Jackfruit Edition by Zoologist Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dodo Jackfruit Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Yves Cassar. Top notes are Jackfruit, Turmeric, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lavender, Turmeric, Orange Blossom, Geranium and Orris; base notes are Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Patchouli and Labdanum.

input:
Experience the vibrant energy of New York's Lower East Side with DKNY's Be Delicious Orchard Street Eau de Parfum, a lively fruity-floral fragrance inspired by the dynamic urban landscape.
Radiating with vitality, the scent opens with the crispness of pink lady apple mingled with the zesty sparkle of pink grapefruit, creating a stimulating and refreshing burst. The heart reveals a blend of elegant jasmine and velvety orris, contrasting with the lush sweetness of black raspberry and the tang of pomegranate, embodying the multifaceted allure of femininity. The base notes of cedarwood and leather add a rich, textured depth that mirrors the intricate layers of New York City.
Top Notes: Pink Lady Apple, Pink Grapefruit
Heart Notes: Jasmine, Orris, Black Raspberry, Pomegranate.
Base Notes: Cedarwood, Leather.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Burning with fiery fire, the rose is fearless and dangerous. Combined with deep patchouli, it becomes indomitable. Her defiant spirit is matched only by her legendary beauty. Meeting deep, masculine vetiver, perfectly paired with earthy patchouli, our rose is sensual yet balanced and harmonious.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Daphné Bugey:
"Between elegance and carnal extravagance, a rose dressed in the depths of woods and amber... I was inspired by the duality of the rose, between its elegance and its sensuality."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Bath & Body Works Coco Paradise Fine Fragrance Mist is a luxurious fragrance that transports the wearer to a tropical paradise. The brand is known for its high-quality bath and body products, and this fragrance is no exception. The concentration of the fragrance mist is fine, which means that it is lightweight and perfect for everyday wear.
The fragrance features notes of salted coconut monoi, sugared neroli, and bronzed sandalwood. When combined, these notes create a warm, sweet, and soothing scent reminiscent of a sunny island getaway. The salted coconut monoi note adds a creamy, tropical element to the fragrance, while the sugared neroli provides a sweet, floral touch. The bronzed sandalwood note gives the fragrance a rich, earthy foundation. Overall, Bath & Body Works Coco Paradise Fine Fragrance Mist belongs to the Floral Fruity olfactory group.
output: Coco Paradise by Bath & Body Works is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Coco Paradise was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The elemental fragrance of Ann Demeulemeester centres around the cypher A, the designer’s initial and the first letter of the alphabet. A symbol founded in core and constancy, it is employed to signify the essence of an expression: a visual and emotional language distilled into a singular genderless parfum.

Crafted personally by Ann Demeulemeester through a lifelong instinctive study of notes and associations, the fragrance transmits the poetic purity and structural serenity of the designer’s enduring oeuvre. It is a unique and intriguing composition embodied by the primordial and mysterious obscurities of nature.

Created from instinct, it is a beguiling fragrance refined from ingredients in their rarest, purest form. This perfume was created from essential oils derived from the cold pressing of the finest quality of natural, raw materials.
output: A Parfum by Ann Demeulemeester is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. A Parfum was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cloves, Calabrian bergamot, Ceylon Cinnamon, Cumin and Sicilian Lemon; middle notes are Leather, May Rose, Birch Tar and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vetiver and Palisander Rosewood.
