instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Pressed Petals is an enchantingly feminine fragrance introduced by LOVENOTES. This multi-dimensional floral scent opens with an inviting blend of Bergamot and Italian Lemon, transforming into a beautiful story of rich Violet Leaf and Jasmine Petals, paired with the sweetness of Raspberry. The fragrance unfolds with Sandalwood, Oriental, and Marshmallow, bringing in a creamy and delectable warmth.
"LOVENOTES Pressed Petals
Floral. Magical. Romantic.
Introducing Pressed Petals, an enchantingly feminine fragrance.
A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, coming soon exclusively to Australia.
A multi-dimensional floral that is incredibly captivating, this fragrance opens with an inviting blend of Bergamot and Italian Lemon. The fragrance quickly transforms into a beautiful story of rich Violet Leaf and Jasmine Petals, paired with the sweetness of Raspberry adding alluring depth.  A new layer unfolds with the Sandalwood, Oriental and Marshmallow bringing in a creamy and delectable warmth and signature richness.
Fragrance Notes
Top: Bergamot, Italian Lemon
Mid: Violet Leaf, Raspberry, Jasmine Petals
Base: Sandalwood, Pink Oriental, Marshmallow"
output: Pressed Petals by Ariana Grande is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Pressed Petals was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot and Italian Lemon; middle notes are Jasmine, Raspberry and Violet Leaf; base notes are Marshmallow, Amber and Sandalwood.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.

input:
Every morning in May, the rose is freshly picked. Revealing petal by petal, its purest fragrance.
1001 Roses Eau de Parfum is a kaleidoscope of roses, the original emblem of our Domaine de la Rose. Its fresh, vibrant juice represents the freshness of a freshly picked rose.
Full of nuance, depth and contrast, the classic notes of rose come to life under the spring sun.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Louise Turner:
"The quintessence of the rose, more magnified than ever, natural and anchored in modernity. [...] 1001 Roses celebrates the emblematic Rose of Lancôme, a plural Rose with modern, fresh and airy flowering, represented through all its faces and all its facets."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.
output: Absolue 1001 Roses by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue 1001 Roses was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In the moonlight, the rose becomes hypnotic. Imagine a rose that has bloomed and thrived under the bright light of the moon, almost cold, mineral and mysterious. Enveloped in deep notes of sandalwood and sweetness of rose, it transports the mind and senses to a mystical state of inner peace.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Fabrice Pellegrin:
"A hypnotic rose, magnified by the sumptuous texture of sandalwood. I chose to create a synergy between the rose and the note of sandalwood; in this composition, the flower and the wood seem to intertwine."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.
output: Absolue Rose On The Moon by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Rose On The Moon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin.

input: "Khair Pistachio by Paris Corner is a luxurious and captivating fragrance that combines carefully curated ingredients to create a scent that not only lingers but also leaves a distinctive mark. This fragrance opens with top notes of Italian bergamot, pistachio ice cream, hazelnut, sweet rum, and cardamom, offering a delightful freshness and warmth. The heart features a lush and floral layer with notes of geranium, white peony, muguet, jasmine, raspberry, white peach, and pear, adding a vibrant and refined dimension. The base notes of whipped cream, marshmallow, cotton candy, Turkish delight accord, cocoa, cedarwood, sandalwood, and tonka bean bring a deeper and sensual complexity, making the scent irresistibly attractive.' -Brand info.

Emanuel Ungaro Cosmic is an amber floral fragrance for women that combines classic femininity with contemporary themes of escapism and futuristic appeal. It features a blend of fruity, floral, and spicy notes, creating a scent that captures the essence of both modernity and timeless elegance.
"This fragrance captures classic femininity, combining it with contemporary themes of escapism and futuristic appeal. Driven by her vision and determination, the EMANUEL UNGARO COSMIC woman explores the world, discovering the vast potential that lies dormant within her. Her adventurous spirit and innate confidence drive her to reach for the stars and manifest limitless possibilities. With EMANUEL UNGARO COSMIC, the world is yours."
"Inspired by Emanuel Ungaro's futuristic "Space Age" fashion from the 1960s, EMANUEL UNGARO COSMIC features a planet-shaped bottle with an elegantly integrated cap. Its marble patterns and luxurious golden ring accentuate its position as a luxurious and contemporary creation. Matching the bottle, the case reflects the creamy marble patterns with a metallic focal lens at its center."
Available in 40 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Cosmic by Emanuel Ungaro is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Cosmic was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"This is a sunbeam, a radiant joy that enchants every instant. A Coco-Rose warmth undulates between Sandalwood and White Musk. A vibrant ecstasy.
And suddenly, the horizon, bordered by Ozonic shades, lights up in a manifestation of joy... A silent glow of Pink Pepper warms our being, adding its imprint of Coco-Rose-colored happiness to the grand book of memories. Then, in a white embrace, all in Lily of the Valley and Frangipani, we find ourselves comforted under the most favorable auspices. Sovereign radiance, endless wonder, a sunbeam soft as a kiss of Sandalwood and White Musk. Ardent emotion of a Vanilla-ethereal warmth that caresses. Hearts open, souls blossom, intoxicated with light, in a moment of gentle fervor."
TOP NOTES: PINK PEPPER, COCONUT, OZONIC ACCORD
HEART NOTES: ROSE, LILY OF THE VALLEY, FRANGIPANI
BASE NOTES: VANILLA, MUSK, SANDALWOOD

The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Coconut, Ozonic notes and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Frangipani, Rose and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Leather and Agarwood (Oud).

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Gucci’s The Alchemist’s Garden is a Luxury Collection of sophisticated Eau de Parfums, Perfumed Oils, and Acque Profumate inspired by the art of alchemy. Captivated by the star-studded sky, the Gucci alchemist dreams of a new olfactory Gucci fragrance honouring the brightest star from the Lion constellation - Gucci The Heart of Leo. Guided by his brightness, the lion leaps from the sky in search of the world’s most precious ingredients. Knowing that resinous incense brings opulence to those who possess it, the lion jumps to the Arabic peninsula where Olibanum grows. Here, the noble creature encounters the tears of weeping trees, the bark exuding an unexpected, spicy scent that warms his heart. A symphony of balsamic resin traverses continents through golden winds, beckoning the lion to return to his homeland, Africa. As he follows the scent to yet another tree, he encounters the balsamic nectar of myrrh and its liquorice smoky undertones that liberate his soul. To sweeten his journey back to the moon, the lion garlands his mane in a blood-red blackcurrant accord. With the promise of dawn nearing, harmony returns as the lion resumes his position in the sky. Happy with the lion’s fabled journey, the Gucci alchemist carefully encases the fruity, ambery elixir– and its night-sky-inspired story – in a black lacquered bottle. Much like the alchemist's ability to transform all that he touches into newfound wonders, this unisex Gucci fragrance is manufactured using alcohol made from 100% recycled carbon emissions.
Capturing the spirit of nature and distilling it into exquisite elixirs, The Alchemist’s Garden collection is composed of customisable Gucci fragrances intended to be layered together.
Each olfactory creation draws on a hero ingredient that changes and magnifies its character when worn with other Gucci scents.
The beauty of alchemy lies in the transformation: layered aromas that become new expressions of art and unfold the magic of unseen worlds.
The Gucci Heart of Leo unisex Gucci Eau de Parfum offers six recommended layering combinations, each designed to bring out the richness and opulence of its warm facets captured by its golden mane.
Create a warm incense with Gucci The Eyes of The Tiger.
When applied with Gucci The Heart of Leo, the blend of Incense, Myrrh & Oriental captivates with its golden intensity.
Envision a floral tapestry woven with the opulent Damask Rose essence of Gucci A Reason to Love.
Incense, Myrrh & Rose-infused Oud Accord summon sultry depths, revealing a gourmand and floral bouquet of aromas.|Add a touch of sweetness to the Myrrh with Gucci A Chant for the Nymph.
Infuse floral undertones into Incense & Myrrh with the Frangipani accord to create a sweet incense.
Enhance the Gucci fragrance’s rich character with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil.
A fresh Rose combined with Incense & Myrrh enriches the composition with its symphony of warm and fresh aromas.
Envelop yourself in the magic of the night with Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
A Musky Lavender invigorates the ambery blend of Incense & Myrrh, infusing a sense of freshness into the composition.
Unveil the richness of the ambery facets with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil and Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
Rose & Lavender introduce floral hints to the Incense & Myrrh in this ambery aromatic olfactory creation.
output: The Heart of Leo by Gucci is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Heart of Leo was launched in 2024. Top note is Black Currant; middle note is Olibanum; base note is Myrrh.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Poivre Rubis is an invitation to a sensory journey where the exoticism of Timut pepper and the tangy sweetness of raspberry blend together. From the very opening, bergamot and black pepper awaken the senses, revealing a vibrant heart of Sichuan pepper and pink berries while a fresh and juicy raspberry accord unveils its character and almost ingenuous sweetness. The base, lightly woody with notes of olibanum incense and cashmere, establishes a velvety and captivating depth. Poivre Rubis is a fragrance that celebrates the art of blending spices and berries, offering an explosion of piquancy and sensuality.
output: Poivre Rubis by Superfumista is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Poivre Rubis was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Benjamin Sachs. Top notes are Sichuan Pepper, Black Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Sichuan Pepper, Pink Pepper and Raspberry; base notes are Woodsy Notes, Frankincense and Cashmeran.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A dark and feminine combination of burning incense and buttery lipstick permeating through a smoker’s leather jacket drying down to a creamy, warm sandalwood and musky, powdery orris root.
Girl of the Year is an exploration into the private enclaves of the woman, off film, away from parties, protected from the flash of the camera. It is the quiet moments between calls and engagements, the space reserved for nestling into your memories. Artifacts of a life being lived populate your space, untidy and endearing: the leather jacket left behind by a lover lazily draped on the sofa, your vanity clumsy with perfumes and jewelry, the littered ashtray on your windowsill. Every article of clothing and tube of lipstick a talisman of self expression and protection becomes a souvenir of the moment, iconic of an era. From the solitude of your dressing table, you stare at your reflection with no one else to see. The phone rings.
output: Girl of the Year by Thin Wild Mercury is a Leather fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Girl of the Year was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Cathleen Cardinali. Top notes are Lipstick and Incense; middle notes are Leather and Smoke; base notes are Orris Root, Fur and Sandalwood.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Vanilla comes from Mexico where the Aztecs used it to soften the bitterness of chocolate. There were numerous European attempts to cultivate pods outside their original cradle. Louis XIV fell in love with it and wanted to cultivate it on Bourbon Island, in Reunion. But all attempts under his reign failed. No one knew how to fertilize vanilla outside its native area. Europeans were unaware that the Mexican Melipona bee was responsible for pollination. Indeed, thanks to it, the orchid provides a long green fruit commonly called vanilla pod.
Gourmet and suave, Melipona is a fragrance that opens elegantly with woody and vanilla notes and gives way to oriental and amber notes in the base.
output: Melipona by Nectar Olfactif is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Melipona was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Serge de Oliveira. Top note is Bourbon Vanilla; middle notes are Cashmere Wood and Amber; base notes are Vanilla Sugar, Musk and Amber.

input: Ex Nihilo's Speed Legends Night Drive perfume is inspired by the thrill of high-speed racing, reflecting the adrenaline-fuelled rush in olfactory form through invigorating bergamot, vetiver, and tonka bean. output: Speed Legends Night Drive by Ex Nihilo is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Speed Legends Night Drive was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernández. Top notes are Bergamot, Sage, Ginger and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Labdanum and Blackcurrant; base notes are Patchouli, Amberwood, Tonka Bean and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Here, in Cappadocia, at the heart of Türkiye, the earth retains the memory of an unblemished emotion, a shiver of saffron, sandalwood and myrrh surfaces on the skin. Impressive, ancestral formations rise up like exclamations to the sky. They are known as ‘fairy chimneys’, natural pillars of soft, friable rock shaped by volcanic eruption, the passage of time and the weathering of the elements. They watch over the mountains, craters, plateaus and gorges, over the underground and cave-dwelling cities.
The palette of Cappadocia is organic, carnal: white jasmine, ochre benzoin, Turkish rose, gold vanilla and tawny sandalwood. Come nightfall, a purple iris arrives and then the chimney tops secretly open, releasing the caressing perfume of flowers, resins and woods: a message to the stars. A multi-coloured hot-air balloon appears on the horizon; the passengers in its basket sail above the landscape’s varied facets, swept away by its airy, scent-filled beauty. The fragrance Cappadocia makes this a dream come true.
output: Cappadocia by Memo Paris is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cappadocia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gaël Montero.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Le Labo invites us on a bold journey with LAVANDE 31—a captivating twist on lavender that reshapes our perceptions and redefines the tradition of this scent.
LAVANDE 31 revitalizes lavender, shedding its nostalgic connotations and elevating it to new heights. Infused with bergamot and neroli essential oils, it unveils an unexpected freshness, accentuating the purity of lavender flower buds through vertical distillation. The perfume's base, a Le Labo signature, mixes amber, musk, and tonka, creating a uniquely classic yet rebellious scent.
According to the brand, LAVANDE 31 exemplifies perfume as art, reinventing familiar notes into olfactory masterpieces that ignite the senses and inspire the mind.
Releasing on 1st October 2023, Lavande 31 is available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Lavande 31 by Le Labo is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lavande 31 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Neroli and Bergamot; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Musk, Tonka and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
This scent is a symphony of exotic and vibrant notes, harmoniously blending the zesty freshness of Italian bergamot and the creamy sweetness of coconut water with the tangy twist of orange bigarade. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with the peppery sparkle of pink pepper, intertwined with the rich, tropical aroma of Brazilian gardenia and the luxurious depth of ylang essential oil. The base notes provide a sensual foundation with the opulent essence of jasmine sambac absolute, the earthy warmth of sandalwood, and the subtle allure of skin musk. This fragrance embodies the essence of Carnival - a wild and enticing celebration of life, encapsulating the rhythm of a tropical night filled with dance, allure, and vivacious energy. It's an olfactory journey that is both seductive and lively, evoking the spirit of endless festivity under the stars.
A limited edition available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Bronze Goddess Flora Verde by Estée Lauder is a Floral Green fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Bronze Goddess Flora Verde was launched in 2024. Top notes are Coconut Water, Bigarade and Bergamot; middle notes are Gardenia, Ylang Ylang and Pink Pepper; base notes are Jasmine Sambac, Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The strength and majesty of leather, the sweet dance of hay on the summer’s eve; and overarching these, the compelling velvet heat of horse hide. Epona, a tribute to the Celtic goddess of horses, captures the essence of equine potency and pastoral tranquillity. The delicate floral touches of violet dance in ebbing sunbeams, while distinct saddle soap accord brings a vibrancy that springs forth from balmy hair. Gods and Goddesses streak luminous resin fingerprints on sun-drenched saddles; thundering hooves softened with honey. Verdant grass tumbles and sears in August’s gilded sun. Colt strands stream in summer’s soft tempest. And you breathe again, with leather, heat, meadows and skin.
Our Perfumer's Inspiration
"Epona embodies the cherished memories of Liz’s bond with her beloved horse amidst the enchanting English countryside. Inspired by their intimate connection, it captures the essence of warm summer days spent amidst sweet hay fields and the gentle caress of the sun. The fragrance intertwines notes of leather, opoponax, and violet to evoke the comforting scent of a cherished saddle and the earthy aroma of a horse's coat. With a subtle hint of saddle soap accord, it reminisces the tender care lavished upon a faithful companion. Epona is a nostalgic ode to the timeless bond between horse and rider amidst nature's embrace. Liz has placed her own leather accord and distinctive horse accord against honey, vetiver, oakmoass and petitgrain for a complex and stirring capturing of horse skin, hair, leather and meadows."
output: Epona by Papillon Artisan Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Epona was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "Laundry Day was dreamed up on a dark Parisian day, when Abel's founder tasked their master perfumer with bottling the optimism and energy of spring. The brief was to capture that first day of the season when you throw open your windows, inhale the aroma of freshly cut grass, and take joy in the ritual of hanging your sheets on the line, knowing they’ll dry crisp and fresh. Laundry Day is a metaphor for all that is possible in the change of seasons." -Abel Web Journal.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Celebrate 20 years of the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie with this special edition design, limited to only 150 bottles. Each will be signed and numbered by Roja Dove and includes a certificate of authentication.
An exciting new exclusive to the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie, RDHP20 is a celebration in scented form. Created especially for our 20th Anniversary, this special new piece commemorates two decades of our mission to bring the cutting-edge of luxury perfumery to fragrance-lovers across the world.
As we enjoy this exciting milestone, we invite you to celebrate with us by enjoying an exuberant new composition. Like a dazzling visit to the Haute Parfumerie, a collection of 31 luxurious raw materials set the scene for scene for an Ambrée accord as opulent and enduring as the boutique itself.
Luminous Citrus notes and Aldehydes which sparkle like our iconic chandeliers make a luminous first impression. A decadent blend of expensive Woods blend with pillowy base of Oriental and Vanilla to sink the senses into the plush surroundings of the shop. A finishing touch of Clear Woods - a unique material crafted from Patchouli Isolate - sign the hallmark of another pioneering new creation from Perfumer, Roja Dove.
An homage to an amazing 20 years with a bold vision of the future, RDHP20 is ready to enter the roaring 20's era for The Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie.
output: Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary by Roja Dove is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot, Lemon and Lime; middle notes are Jasmine, Geranium, Ylang Ylang, Magnolia, Freesia, Rose, Peach, Violet and Clary Sage; base notes are Musk, Amber, Sandalwood, Rhubarb, Clove, Transparent Woods, Frankincense, Patchouli, Cedar, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vanilla, Moss, Orris, Peru Balsam, Tonka Bean and Agarwood (Oud).

Experience the enchanting allure of Valentine, where vibrant violet meets earthy patchouli. The fragrance opens with a sparkling blend of Violet, Orange Blossom Absolute, and Indonesian Patchouli, accented by Raspberry and Cardamom Absolute adds a hint of spice.
The heart reveals luxurious Orris, Bulgarian Rose, and Jasmine Grandiflorum, enriched by Gardenia Extract and the sweet notes of Heliotrope and Sweet Cassie.
In the base, rich Cognac, Cypress Leaf, and White Chocolate blend with Vanilla Absolute, and Aged Laotian Benzoin. Valentine is a sophisticated embrace of floral elegance and depth.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Greedy. Amusing. Captivating. In a word: Pop! This fragrance transports us back to the past, bringing back that innocent carefreeness and infinite serenity of when we were children and we loved to gorge ourselves on sweet treats. The juicy notes of White Peach and exotic Coconut evoke the softness of candy. Woods and Oriental infuse warmth. Whole Sugar radiates its fragrant notes releasing an unparalleled sweetness. A triumph of delicious notes that gives us a little piece of nostalgic happiness. A veritable whirlwind of gluttony that envelops us in a sweet and intriguing embrace.
output: Bonbon Pop by The House of Oud is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bonbon Pop was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Douglas Morel. Top notes are White Peach, Coconut and Bergamot; middle notes are Patchouli and Jasmine; base notes are Brown sugar, Precious Woods, Musk and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspiration: bare essentials.
Any creator sooner or later finds himself confronted to the idea of simplicity. Feeling the lure to simplify again and again, until almost complete nakedness. In fact, we all seek an apparent carelessness concealing an actual sophistication.
This cologne is a perfume that becomes one with us in stark nakedness, exposing a studied casualness stating, “I am what I am”.

Olfactive Stylism: nudity through freshness.
Fleur d’Oh suggests naked simplicity through innocent freshness. This sharp creation highlights a signature shiso leaf paired with yuzu to boost a skin-soft orange blossom. A fragrance as necessary as water on bare skin.

Romeo's words: “Tender as maternal skin, smooth as a thin fabric.”
Perfumer: Alexis Dadier (Robertet)
Fleur d'OH is a gender fluid orange blossom that oscillates between the radiance and softness of orange blossom, and the vibration of modern amber woods. This is a theme that is dear to me because I have always wanted to wear an orange blossom perfume that is neither feminine nor classic cologne. The yuzu and shiso leaves start creates a spark whose light extends to the bottom of this fragrance lined with moss and musks.
output: Fleur d’Oh by OHTOP is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fleur d’Oh was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexis Dadier.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A profound perfume scent, Sissa embodies the power of exponential growth, opening with full-bodied notes of toasted sesame to awaken the senses before unfolding in a sultry, resonant flourish. Mirroring the promise of boundless potential, Sissa captivates gradually with each fleeting moment, revealing perfume notes of luscious gourmands and delicate florals, mesmerized by the warm, earthy foundation of labdanum and musks. Sissa exhilarates the mind with thought-provoking reminder that it is the small steps that pave the way to greatness.
"I was inspired to play with edible notes in a new way, less traditional sweet facets but more savory, warmed elements. Ambrette Seed leads the fragrance in warmth allowing the toasted sesame seed and coumarin heart to open and grow against the contrast of the enveloping, resinous facets of the labdanum in the finish. This fragrance feels personal and has a cocooning trail." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.
output: Sissa by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sissa was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Sesame, Coumarin and Ambrette (Musk Mallow); middle notes are Milk, Tonka Bean and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Musk and Labdanum.

You've been eagerly anticipating this for months, if not an entire year!

This collection was crafted exclusively for the most gourmand among you, and we have put in tremendous effort to achieve a masterpiece of excellence.

In the meantime, we wanted to reveal the secret of Jimmy Bodin's new working method by giving you a taste of ultra-gourmand perfumery with ultra-realistic scents. Le Gourmand and Ciao Bello Pistachio are the embodiment of your desires and emotions. 

Today, after an incredible and joy-filled journey, Les Délices de Jousset are finally available. Whether you have a tiny sweet tooth or a huge desire to indulge, we've crafted them in unique formats for Jousset Parfums.

Les Délices de Jousset are available in 30ml and 100ml of pure gourmandise.
Indulge in the luxurious world of Crème Brûlée, a fragrance that perfectly captures the essence of the classic French dessert with notes of caramelized sugar, rich vanilla custard, and a touch of burnt sugar crust.
This perfume is perfect for those who love sophisticated and sweet gourmand scents. Let yourself be captivated by the decadent aroma of Crème Brûlée.
Perfumer's Note: Gourmand, Sweet, Creamy, Caramelized, Rich, Luxurious
Top Notes: Caramelized Sugar, Fresh Cream
Heart Notes: Vanilla Custard, Burnt Sugar Crust
Base Notes: Whipped Cream, Bourbon Vanilla
output: Crème Brûlée by Jousset Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Crème Brûlée was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jimmy Bodin. Top notes are Fresh Cream and Spun Sugar; middle notes are Burnt Sugar, Custard and Vanilla; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla and Whipped Cream.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Why a perfume inspired by CBD and food?
If there are two things we like here at Versatile … It’s eating and partying! La Foncedalle is the perfect mix of those two. Inspired by the big party with our pals and that delicious crispy chicken, this fragrance is as bold as appetizing. We tried our best to replicate (like we always do), an unforgettable olfactive experience: a smell that reminiscent us of our best parties and made us hungry as well.
What does LA FONCEDALLE smell like?
It’s an atypical fragrance that is as intoxicating as mouth-watering! La Foncedalle is a combination of weed notes and aromas accompanied by a perfectly fresh beer and a delicious chicken straight from the rotisserie. Inspired by our drunk parties where we eat (more than we should) La Foncedalle offers us a similar experience … without the bad trip!
NOTES: Weed. Aromatic. Beer. Fresh. Sage. Chicken. Crispy. Butter. Musky
output: La Foncedalle by Versatile Paris is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. La Foncedalle was launched in 2024. La Foncedalle was created by Amelie Bourgeois and Margaux Le Paih Guérin.

"The women and men in these pages are lovers and brawlers, bullfighters and boxers, soft talkers and hard drinkers. They inhabit dusty Spanish villages and dank, dark brothels. At the heart of these unforgettable characters is a determined and undying passion that pushes them to make extraordinary decisions in the face of fear. Their fates are varied but the outcome is always the same, these are stories that grip you by the throat and don’t let go until you profess your devotion. Seductive and steadfast, this classic is not for the faint of heart but for the full of heart."
NOTES: Geranium, Spanish Rose, Patchouli, Black Musk, Tobacco, Sandalwood, Bull’s Blood.
"No other fragrance in our line balances brutality and elegance like this beast. Ignore the glares, take the bull by horns, and show the world who’s boss. "

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Interpretation of a hut with mystical scents; that of the worn leather and the silk of kimonos, majestic dresses impregnated with incense sachets that geishas slip into the hollow of their sleeves to perfume themselves. The Eau de Parfum Encens Lumière, for women and men, accurately combines the smoky notes of Incense with the floral sweetness of Freesia and Saffron flowers.
Perfumer Karine Dubreuil-Sereni explains

"I endeavored to capture the olfactory sensations - as I imagined them - that one may experience in a mysterious Japanese teahouse. Incense is the very pillar of my creation. A noble material, it brings unique light as well as depth and elegance to this perfume. Its contrasting scents first exude sparkling top notes, before giving way to a warm and enveloping trail."
output: Memori Encens Lumière by Kenzo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Memori Encens Lumière was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
FIG ME UP by Mancera is more than a fragrance—it’s an irresistible, sensory journey.
The bold, violet-grey hue of the juice hints at the depth within. Upon first spray, the luscious sweetness of fig and the soft, powdery elegance of violet immediately envelop you, evoking a sense of warmth and contentment. As the fragrance unfolds, a lively burst of green rhubarb injects brightness, while tonka bean adds a peppery nuance that invigorates the senses. This blend of contrasts makes Fig Me Up stand out as an unforgettable, distinctive scent.
Created for those with bold, confident tastes, Fig Me Up goes beyond being just a fleeting scent. It’s a signature that leaves a lasting mark. At its heart, an almost hidden yet deeply sensual accord emerges, where the sweetness of candied plum blends seamlessly with the opulence of oud and sandalwood. Earthy tobacco adds a soft, comforting layer, ensuring the fragrance lingers delicately, offering a quiet yet undeniable allure throughout the day.
Fig Me Up by Mancera evolves in three uplifting stages. It begins with a fresh, invigorating rush of Mediterranean fig leaves and zesty green rhubarb, evoking the vibrancy of a sunlit morning. The heart reveals a refined whisper of French violet, adding a soothing, floral grace. As the scent deepens, creamy fig milk envelops the senses in warmth, complemented by the richness of Australian oud and sandalwood. The base is enriched by sweet Venezuelan tonka and the comforting softness of Cuban tobacco, leaving a lingering trail of gentle, lasting pleasure.
Fig Me Up by Mancera is a fragrance crafted to evoke pure joy, unfolding in three uplifting phases. It opens with a vibrant burst of Mediterranean fig leaves and zesty green rhubarb, bringing an immediate sense of freshness and vitality, like a bright morning in a sun-drenched orchard. As the scent evolves, the heart introduces the soft elegance of French violet, a floral whisper that adds a calming, delicate touch. As the fragrance deepens, creamy fig milk wraps the senses in a warm cocoon, beautifully complemented by the richness of Australian oud and sandalwood. The base lingers with the sweet and soothing notes of Venezuelan tonka and Cuban tobacco, leaving behind a comforting trail that feels like an endless smile.
Top notes: Mediterranean fig leaves, green rhubarb, French violet
Middle notes: creamy fig milk, Australian oud and sandalwood, candied plum, geranium Bourbon
Base notes: hot toffee, Venezuelan tonka beans, Cuban tobacco, white musk
Fig Me Up is availablle as 60ml and 120ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Fig Me Up by Mancera is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fig Me Up was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Rhubarb, French Violet and Fig Leaf; middle notes are Fig Nectar, Plum, Oud, Bourbon Geranium and Australian Sandalwood; base notes are Tobacco, White Musk, Toffee and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Elie Saab Le Parfum Bridal launches in the fall of 2023 as a fragrance that draws its inspiration from the opulent bridal collection of designer ELIE SAAB. Just as the designer's exquisite gowns leave an indelible impression, this perfume aims to envelop you in a captivating veil of scent.
Like the delicate drape of a veil, this fragrance reveals an Eau de Parfum that is soft, self-assured, and utterly captivating. Elie Saab's Le Parfum Bridal celebrates the uniqueness of every woman, evoking a sense of cherished admiration.
Reflecting the essence of a bridal bouquet, it weaves together floral and creamy elements to create a truly enchanting olfactory experience. The romantic allure of gardenia finds expression in harmony with an irresistible blend of radiant amber, velvety white vanilla, and sunlit ylang-ylang. The luminous facets of mandarin and orange blossom lend an illuminating touch.
Top notes are mandarin, orange blossom, and neroli. Heart notes include vanilla, ylang-ylang, and gardenia. Base notes are musk, benzoin, and amber.
The bottle's facets, reminiscent of a diamond's precision cut, marry clean lines with an elegant, feminine aesthetic, adorned by a delicate lace pattern.
Elie Saab Le Parfum Bridal is available as a 30ml, 50ml, and 90ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Le Parfum Bridal by Elie Saab is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Le Parfum Bridal was launched in 2023. Top notes are Orange Blossom, Mandarin Orange and Neroli; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Gardenia and Vanilla; base notes are Amber, Musk and Benzoin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Bugatti Bella Donna embodies the quintessential Italian concept of la dolce vita, exuding an infectious enthusiasm for life. This scent captures the essence of a sun-soaked day and evokes a fruity-floral ambiance. Its lightness gracefully accompanies a woman throughout her day, accentuating her spontaneity while highlighting her sensuality and femininity with a touch of classic elegance.
Luscious peach conjures up the warmth of summer, blending seamlessly with juicy pear and a hint of spicy pink pepper to create a welcoming opening accord. At the heart of the fragrance lies a jasmine bouquet, which stimulates the imagination and tenderly caresses the senses.
A captivatingly graceful rose lends harmony to the heart, perfectly balanced by the bewitching intensity of gardenia. The delicate pink hues of the Bella Donna fragrance are echoed in its exquisite finale, where the powdery musk base is elegantly contrasted. The composition is artfully completed by the woody undertones of cedar.
output: Bella Donna by Bugatti Fashion is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Bella Donna was launched in 2023. Top notes are Pear, Peach and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Gardenia, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Powdery Notes, Musk and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Eternal Wood evokes the awakening of a unique inspiration where Palo Santo and White Copal impregnate the air with mystical magic. At the heart of this experience, the humid warmth of the skin blends with this exotic fragrance. Burnt Oud and Davana accentuate the sensuality of the sillage, while Red Saffron imparts a passionate touch. Woody notes evoke the dense jungle, and the sweet scents of Toffee and Tonka remind one of tropical delights. This sensory adventure, extracted from Amelie’s memories, crystallizes a moment where nature, warmth, and magic unite in an enchanting perfume. 🤎
As we journey from San Cristobal to the Chihuahuan deserts, the ethereal essence of Palo Alto gracefully envelops us, transcending the mundane. Eternal Wood materializes in our reverie, guided by Mayan incense and burnt Oud.
output: Eternal Wood by Mancera is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eternal Wood was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Saffron, Laotian Oud and Davana; middle notes are Palo Santo, Guaiac Wood, Copal and Cashmere Wood; base notes are Toffee, Tonka Bean, Amber and Oakmoss.

input:
Heritage and symbol of unique experiences, uncontrollable and incomparable emotions, MAGIE ROUGE is a tribute to the lush lifestyle of the bustling city of Marrakech that enchants our senses.
With an extremely captivating sensuality, MAGIE ROUGE is an intoxicating Oriental Spicy Musk perfume extract, smooth, opulent, and enveloping, exuding an aura of total seduction. It combines cinnamon and pink pepper with tender wild foral accents and features a persistent and voluptuous base accord of precious woods, tonka bean, vanilla, and velvety musks.
Top Notes: Pink Pepper, Cinnamon, Acacia
Middle Notes: Jasmine, Violet, Vanilla
Base Notes: Cashmere Wood, Tonka bean, Musk velvet
The fragrance is available in size of 100ml.
output: Magie Rouge by Marrakech Imperial is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Magie Rouge was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Carbonnel. Top notes are Acácia, Pink Pepper and Cinnamon; middle notes are Vanilla, Jasmine and Violet; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Velvet, Musk and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The Xerjoff K Blue perfume collection is based on the influential philosophical tradition of the alchemy associated with the holistic, ecological, and ethical methods of biodynamic philosophy.
Biodynamic agriculture and biodynamic gardening is how to integrate science with the spirit of nature.
Each perfume from the Kemi Blue collection is unique in the way it contains one or more ingredients obtained from biodynamic agriculture. Cosmic forces are important ingredients to complete the circle of the Xerjoff K Blue collection with a precise astrological perfume production calendar.
Inspired by ancient cosmologies and what is known as the “highest heaven”, Empiryan opens to earthy notes of cypriol and the warm yet sweet herbaceous notes of tobacco leaves. An experience that grounds the wearer with green, earthy notes gradually transports the senses to an ethereal state of calm and sacredness as incense and cedar are released at heart. Delicate yet compelling, Empiryan’s base of vanilla, labdanum, and amber perfectly rounds up this divine scent.
OLFACTORY NOTES
output: Empiryan by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Empiryan was launched in 2023. Top notes are Tobacco Leaf and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; middle notes are Incense, Singapore Patchouli and Atlas Cedar; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Amber and Labdanum.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
TO BE PEACEFUL
OUR INSPIRATION
Crafting Angélique was an adventure of making peace with failures. Our first idea was to use angelic seed essential oil, thinking it would perfectly embody the fragrance’s name. Yet, as art often dictates, it wasn’t quite right for the scent we dreamed of. That’s when we experimented with carrot seed essential oil—a less celebrated choice, the sidekick of many hero ingredients in perfumery, that doesn’t have the immediate charm of angelic seed essential oil but is rich with potential. It’s in this shift that Angélique truly began to blossom.
PEACE Angélique is like a peaceful melody in life's constant hustle.
This perfume is crafted for those on a journey to embracing life's imperfections, letting go of the past, finding peace with their flaws, and choosing to rise above and soar higher.

input:
Sentence A: TO BE PEACEFUL
OUR INSPIRATION
Crafting Angélique was an adventure of making peace with failures. Our first idea was to use angelic seed essential oil, thinking it would perfectly embody the fragrance’s name. Yet, as art often dictates, it wasn’t quite right for the scent we dreamed of. That’s when we experimented with carrot seed essential oil—a less celebrated choice, the sidekick of many hero ingredients in perfumery, that doesn’t have the immediate charm of angelic seed essential oil but is rich with potential. It’s in this shift that Angélique truly began to blossom.
PEACE Angélique is like a peaceful melody in life's constant hustle.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Bois de Santal is an artful composition where sandalwood's rich and woody depth meets the subtle spice of cardamom and the warm sweetness of vanilla.This central note of sandalwood is a golden thread seamlessly interwoven with the sensual allure of cardamom, creating a lightly spiced composition that whispers luxury.The heart of the fragrance continues with supple cashmere woods lending a soft, velvety quality, while violet and orris emphasize the powdery edge of sandalwood. As the fragrance settles on the skin, notes of olibanum and vanilla envelop the wearer to produce a subtle warmth, a serene endnote to a fragrance that is both tranquil and tantalizing. Bois de Santal is an experience of understated luxury, an homage to the refined and the sophisticated. (info from the brand)

input:
With its geometric shape in a light pink tone with small glitter particles as a highlight, the Kiss Me bottle immediately stands out from the crowd. The women's fragrance by the well-known YouTuber Naomi Jon, released in 2022, immediately puts you in a good mood with its floral and fresh accents - just the right choice for the next date!
The Eau de Parfum Spray Kiss Me impresses with its many fresh accents. Even the top note starts with orange and tangarine, citrusy and sparkling and makes you want to start the day as soon as you spray it on. With orange blossom, the orange can also be found in the heart note. Arabian jasmine provides a floral accent here. Orris root and musk dominate the sweetish, sensual base note. Make yourself happy with the lively feel-good fragrance or give the Eau de Parfum Spray to a friend of yours. This light everyday fragrance with its sweet and girly bottle is also very suitable for young fragrance fans.
output: Kiss Me by Naomi Jon is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Kiss Me was launched in 2023. Top notes are Orange and Tangerine; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Orris and Musk.

Dansant avec la fumée, la rose révèle ses secrets les plus sombres. Elle est audacieuse et subversive. Assombrie par les notes fumées du thé noir, la rose révèle ses facettes sombres aux côtés d'un bois de gaïac intense et masculin. Son côté sombre est inattendu et audacieux.

La vision du Maître-Parfumeur, Frank Voekl:
"Quand les volutes fumées et envoûtantes du thé noir rencontrent la fraîcheur délicate de la rose. Un parfum résolument contrasté, oscillant entre des nuances sombres et profondes et des tonalités plus lumineuses et colorées."
LE DOMAINE DE LA ROSE : LA CULTURE D'UNE ROSE INIMITABLE, SUR LA TERRE OÙ LA NATURE VIT À L'ÉTAT SAUVAGE
Découvrez Absolue Les Parfums, la première collection de haute-parfumerie dédiée à la rose cultivée au cœur de notre domaine : la Rose Centifolia. Composée de 11 jus d'exception, elle dévoile une rose exclusive comme vous ne l'avez jamais sentie auparavant.

LA RÉINVENTION DE L'INGRÉDIENT EMBLÉMATIQUE DE LA PARFUMERIE
Nos Maîtres-Parfumeurs se sont affranchis de la pyramide olfactive classique et ont inventé une nouvelle façon de construire un parfum avec la construction en halo. La rose devient le cœur d'une symphonie olfactive. Chaque parfum de la collection Absolue Les Parfums naît de la fusion de la rose exclusive Lancôme et d'un élément de la nature emblématique du domaine de la rose.
output: Absolue Rose Or Die by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Rose Or Die was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Frank Voelkl.

input: 7 Minutes by Kheir opens with the decadence of a nostalgic local diner's Caramel Milkshake. The top notes are fluffy, sticky, and delectably sweet, with caramel being the star of the show. As it evolves, the vanilla becomes more antique, with enhancements from a light rose and violet note kicking into the middle notes. The romantic floral notes are mellowed by cloudy marshmallows, which then settle into a musky, warm, amber base highlighted by creamy woody notes and a hint of ambergris.
output: 7 Minutes by Kheir Fragrance House is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. 7 Minutes was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Shadi Samra. Top notes are Caramel and Milkshake; middle notes are Vanilla, Rose, Violet and Marshmallow; base notes are Musk, Amber, Woody Notes and Ambergris.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Viridarium was the name given to the gardens of patrician villas in Ancient Rome, inspired by the gardeners’ creative urge to experiment in that period. Unusual juxtapositions from worlds apart such as silver fir and the Date palm nestle close to shrubs, trees and flowers.
The Viridarium of Livia from 1 B.C., the stunningly preserved alfresco in the National Roman Museum, provided the inspiration for Maria Candida’s latest olfactory creation. A contemplation of the work led to the compilation of a list with all its botanical elements and which Maria Candida then used to create her eponymous homage to the original, amalgamating seemingly disparate olfactory notes and culminating in a liminal space suspended between our ancestral past and her divergent current style.
output: Viridarium by Maria Candida Gentile is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Viridarium was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Maria Candida Gentile. Top notes are Green Accord, Clary Sage, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Herbal Notes, Chamomile, Dates, Beeswax, Poppy and Carnation; base notes are Cypress, Frankincense, Fir, Exotic Woods and Elm.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The House of Guerlain invites you to its holiday rendezvous in a numbered edition: Imagine Guerlain, in collaboration with the Turkish jewelry designer Begüm Khan. To celebrate a joyful and festive holiday season with splendor and imagination, Begüm Khan has chosen a fantasy in keeping with Guerlain’s world, which is also rich in animal iconography. For the 2023 Millésime, the iconic Bee Bottle is adorned with a unique jewel, an imperial bee at the heart of a radiant golden flower, immortalizing the magic of suspended time. This exceptional piece holds a precious amber-colored nectar for a festive trail. Exclusively available on Guerlain.com and in Guerlain boutiques.
Begüm Khan has imagined an enchanting bee-flower duo. At the heart of an asymmetric eminently poetic design, the bee is majestically showcased by 37 sparkling hand-set pavé gems. She has crafted this decoration in 24-carat gold-plated bronze. Each adornment is hand-crafted in the artist’s Istanbul ateliers. Meticulous artistic craftsmanship that makes each piece unique.
This precious rendezvous is the result of a shared inspiration drawn from the perfect beauty of nature. This year, the two Houses explore together the sublimation of bestiary. Symbol of the House since 1853, the bee is an exceptional pollinator, particularly offering the world the finest flowers that give perfumers the richest of palettes to compose extraordinary fragrances. The iconic Bee Bottle is adorned in an imperial bee set at the heart of a voluptuous and sparkling flower.
“I choose the bee because the iconic animal of Guerlain, the real queen, is the bee.”
BEGÜM KHAN
This limited and numbered edition of 4,515 pieces of 125mL is presented with a 30mL travel spray and a funnel to pour the fragrance into the spray.
output: Imagine Guerlain by Begüm Khan by Guerlain is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imagine Guerlain by Begüm Khan was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Wasser. Top note is Orange Blossom; middle note is Benzoin; base note is Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Created by Christine Nagel for the girls of Hermès, the Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum is a tribute to their free spirit, characterized by audacity and lightness, and their versatility. The name of the Twilly d'Hermès perfume family refers to Hermès' silk scarves: the twilly, a cheerful, colorful scarf that can be worn in many ways, is based on Hermès' square scarves made of silk twill.
A floral and fruity fragrance with a generous character, acquired with sweet ginger flowers, soft lychee, and enveloping musk.
The emblematic lantern bottle, designed by Florence Manlik, has a square shape and is decorated with an inverted lychee-red gradient. The white cap is adorned with a silk ribbon designed by Carine Brancowitz. Each silk ribbon is hand-knotted and unique.
Available as a 15, 30, 50 and 85 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès by Hermès is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Tutti Twilly d'Hermès was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel. Top note is Litchi; middle note is Ginger flower; base note is Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Fashion designer Gabriela Hearst teamed up with Fueguia's founder and perfumer to launch two fragrances called New York and Paysandú. Paysandou and New York each have their own aromatic signatures, shaped and inspired by Gabriela Hirst's two geographical regions and stages of life. They were created to be read individually and as a progression.
"Working with Julian on this project of 2 years has been thrilling. It combines my life so far, half with my roots in Paysandú and half in New York. Childhood memories and landscapes (for Paysandú) and the strength of womanhood (for New York) are combined with the alchemy of science and the pheromone potion that Julian crafted. Julian is hungry for knowledge." - Gabriela Hearst.
"New York draws its inspiration from the movement from South to North, weaving floral and notas dulces with typical North American woods. It’s a smokier, heavier, and more aged version of the spirit of the rural and herbal Paysandú.
Based on the research of two Nobel prizes, Leopold Ruzicka – who during the mid-1920’s studied the molecular structure of musk— and Linda B. Buck – awarded in 2004 alongside Richard Axel, for their discoveries in scent as a code and a subtle form of communication through volatile molecules— Julian Bedel developed this idea of musk as a language, an amplifier of one’s scent. This compound of pheromone messengers helps volatilize the aroma of skin. As a result, each individual’s aromatic identity gets amplified and gives a distinctive character to each perfume. Ultimately, each person will have a different version of the scent. An exclusive formula of Fueguia’s musk of plant origin was developed both for Paysandú and New York.
True to Fueguia’s mission of botanical research and scientific innovation, the ingredients that compose Paysandú were produced in Fueguia Botany in Manantiales, Uruguay. Marcela and Carqueja, ingredients that had never been used in perfumery, were extracted through Super Critical CO2 at Fueguia’s unique high-end facilities and are what gives a significant part of the unique character of the scent. Marcela, traditionally used by the Charrúas people as a medicinal plant, is still a symbol of this cultural heritage in Brazil, Paraguay, Uruguay, and Argentina."
String
Tonic: Balsam Fir
Main Note: Tobacco
Sub-vocal: Jacaranda wood
Melody
Maple Resin, Virginia Cedar, Vanilla, Rose Original, Cherry Blossom, Black Pepper, Palo Santo, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Nutmeg
Available as a 100ml Perfume.
output: New York (Gabriela Hearst) by Fueguia 1833 is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. New York (Gabriela Hearst) was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julian Bedel. Top notes are Nutmeg, Balsam Fir and Black Pepper; middle notes are Cherry Blossom, Tobacco and Rose; base notes are Woody Notes, Virginian Cedar, Palo Santo, Musk, Maple, Jacaranda, Patchouli, Vanilla and Tonka.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A realm cloaked in Divine Light, where winged guardians watch over humanity. This is the domain of the Archangels.
A place where the essence of the great leaders Michael and Gabriel dance in an eternal ballet of protection and revelation.
This is the world that awaits you! A fragrance that is more than just a mere blend – it’s a portal to the celestial, a secret passage that will lead you to a place of strength, wisdom, and enlightenment.
Now, you might be thinking, “How can a perfume transport me to such a mystical plane?”
The answer lies in the power of the Archangels themselves.
Gabriel, “God’s Strength,” is the divine messenger who unveils profound truths and heralds messages of hope.
His presence is like a gentle hand guiding you through life’s labyrinth, a soft melody playing on the strings of your soul.
But Gabriel is not alone in this fragrant alliance.
Michael, the celestial warrior lends his power to this blend.
His fiery courage blazes against the darkness, and his strength courses through every note of this elixir.
When you wear it, you’ll feel as if you’re standing shielded by Michael’s unwavering resolve, enveloped in an invisible armor against fear and temptation.
Together, these Archangels create an inspiring alliance, a scented veil of protection and wisdom that will leave you feeling empowered and enlightened.
This is more than just a scent. It’s not just a daily ritual; it’s a transformative experience that connects you to Heaven.
Are you ready to embark on this olfactory odyssey? To step into a world where Heaven meets Earth, and where the very essence of the Divine is captured in a bottle?
Start your journey into the celestial!
output: Archangels by Caeleste Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Archangels was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Cristiano Canali.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"The beauty of bold Virginia nuts ensconced in sandy soils and fields of crumbling shells.
America’s favorite nut (I know - legume), peanut is rarely used in perfume. But all parts of the plant are interesting to me. The soft dirty shells, the fatty earthy nut, the dark skins, the leaves in the field. I took an accord of peanut, expanded it with soft strokes of gourmand notes, earthy tones, toasty woods, a grassy vetyver. It’s a drive through fields of dried plants and soft shells, but really it’s all about the nut!"
Available as a 50ml EDP.
output: Peanut by DS&Durga is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Peanut was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is David Seth Moltz. Top note is Peanut; middle notes are Peanut and Gourmand Accord; base notes are Woody Notes, Earthy Notes, Vetiver and Grass.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
It is reported in the sound narrations from the final messenger of God about Paradise that "its soil is musk" and "its soil is saffron." Those two marvelous ingredients are presented in this floriental gourmand composition.
Top notes: Azerbaijan rose from 1972, jasmine grandiflorum, ylang, and vintage deer musk pods (grains and skins)

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity – the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Aqua Regia evokes all that is noble in the alchemic world. Conjuring up the dazzle of gold and the resilience of platinum, it casts a powerful spell over everything it touches. Dignified and masterful, this unique scent blends distinctive eucalyptus with fresh bergamot, vetiver and rose. Kemi is a collection of perfumes created from natural raw elements using innovative distillation techniques.
OLFACTORY NOTES
output: Aqua Regia by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aqua Regia was launched in 2023. Top notes are Leather, Black Currant and Calabrian bergamot; middle notes are Violet, Orris Root, Singapore Patchouli and Caramel; base notes are Cedar, Musk and Madagascar Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Nearly a decade later, the legendary scent by Karl Lagerfeld makes a comeback under the new form "Rouge," a nod to one of the designer's most cherished colors.
Crafted by perfumer Romain Almairac of Robertet, the fragrance is described as "distinct, contemporary, and enthralling." Almairac drew inspiration from Karl Lagerfeld's multifaceted creative world, where varying realms merge to form intriguing contrasts. This theme of duality is woven into the essence of the new Eau de Parfum, marrying traditional influences with a modern, cutting-edge flair.
At its outset, Rouge captivates with a radiant blend of jasmine, orange blossom, and patchouli. This initial freshness evolves into a rich medley of peach, pear, and blackcurrant notes. The scent's foundation is a luxurious mix of cashmere wood and ambroxan, enriched with smooth vanilla and caramel for a cozy, gentle conclusion. The fragrance achieves a harmonious balance, offering a surprising yet cohesive aromatic experience.
Top notes: blackcurrant, pear, peach
Middle notes: jasmine, orange blossom, patchouli
Base notes: ambroxan, vanilla, cashmere wood, caramel
The fragrance's vessel retains the iconic, timeless architecture of the original Karl Lagerfeld Pour Femme Eau de Parfum bottle: a sleek glass structure topped with a clear lid, accented by a spiked metal ring. The bottle undergoes a striking transformation with the addition of a mesmerizing red hue, adorned with the renowned Karl Lagerfeld emblem and the "rouge" inscription in a contemporary, graffiti-inspired typeface.
Available as 45ml and 85ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Karl Lagerfeld Rouge by Karl Lagerfeld is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Karl Lagerfeld Rouge was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Romain Almairac. Top notes are Black Currant, Pear and Peach; middle notes are Patchouli, Jasmine and Orange Blossom; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Ambroxan, Vanilla and Caramel.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Calm Bliss gently manifests tranquillity and serenity, illuminated by the sparkling, precious neroli oil that provides a fresh and floral facet to the fragrance.
The peacefulness is embodied by the scent of natural lavandin which gives it a distinctive floral and aromatic character. It evokes a beautiful, tranquil aroma which perfectly combines with the weightlessness of the watery accord. Orris concrete has flowery facets, with very powdery notes, and a dry woody-root nuance that, combined with the softness of white musks, creates the innocence in Calm Bliss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: For this formula, I had fun doing my job as an illusionist, building a jasmine accord from scratch, then dressing it up with spices and accentuating the celery facet of the cis-jamone. Like curry and immortelle, celery essence reminds me of the warm, sensual scent of skin. And at certain times of the day, jasmine exudes animalic, even visceral facets that are heady and intoxicating. I wanted to highlight these, as well as the tobacco and cold, slightly metallic ashes of jasmine Grandiflorum. I created a jasmine hybrid that has the fruity, animalic aspects of Sambac and the green, tobacco-like qualities of Grandiflorum. The accord is soft ened and warmed by Peruvian balsam supported by green vanilla. Cardamom adds a fresh, creamy top note. Osmanthus flower provides natural support for the leathery and stable notes of paracresol, while adding the velvety smoothness of apricot skin.
output: Bangla Yasaman by Isabelle Larignon is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bangla Yasaman was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Isabelle Larignon. Top notes are Buchu or Agathosma, Cardamom, Lemon, Bitter Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Osmanthus, Celery Seeds, Clary Sage and Saffron; base notes are Indole, Tobacco, Fir, Peru Balsam and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Golden. Glowing. Glistening.

Bathed in brilliance, Solar Power is a golden floral musk composition that exudes the sensuality of salty, sun-kissed skin. Opening with a sparkling burst of bold citrus notes of Bergamot and Red Mandarin, Solar Power is illuminated by a warm solar floral accord of Neroli, Jasmine, and Orange Flower and wrapped in a comforting blend of Musk, Driftwood, and Sea Salt.
"Solar Power is the epitome of sensual luminosity in a bottle…it is inspired by the diffusive glow of sunlight."
Greg Husar, Solar Power Perfumer.
output: Solar Power by Phlur is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Solar Power was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Greg Husar. Top notes are Blood Mandarin, Bergamot and Jasmine; middle notes are Neroli and Orange Blossom; base notes are Solar Notes, Sea Salt, Musk and Driftwood.

Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Hidden in the winter mist, she is not your rose. Cold and mysterious, she cannot be possessed. Almost impossible to reach, it belongs to nature. Surviving the winter frost, enveloped in soft musk, it exudes aquatic freshness.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Caroline Dumur:
"Hidden in the winter mist, the rose is both fresh, almost cold and sensual, tinged with mystery. [...] an enigmatic accord that takes us back to that ephemeral moment, just after the rain, [...] highlighted by musk, gently iridescent."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.
output: Absolue Not Your Rose by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Not Your Rose was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Caroline Dumur.

Opening with top notes of oud, smoke, and the sweet embrace of maple syrup, it sets the stage for a journey into luxury. As the scent evolves into its heart, a rich blend of sandalwood, guaiac wood, cedarwood, vanilla, and a hint of cotton candy creates a luxurious and comforting symphony.
Finally, it gracefully settles into a base of amber, labdanum, vanilla, and musk, leaving you with a super-warm and enduring closure that lingers for long hours.

input:
An ode to life itself.
The essence of life's fleeting beauty intertwines with the enigmatic allure of shadows, akin to a
delicate whisper of freshness hinting at an infinite inner journey.
As citruses and blooming florals dance with dark, creamy woods, this fragrance becomes a timeless
ode—a fragrant celebration of life's brilliance, reminiscent of the profound dance of existence.
Much like a beckoning sea nourishing fantasies of total freedom, LUMINOIR encapsulates a fragrant
tale, inviting hearts to open wide, like wings deployed for flight, towards the mysterious harmony of
light and darkness.
Top:
Italian Bergamot, Japanese Green Tea, Lemon Verveine
Heart:
Fig Nectar, Night Blooming Jasmine, Black Cardamom, Tunisian Neroli
Base:
Ginger CO₂, Tree-Moss, Hawaiian Sandalwood, Tiaré Flower

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
We are in the Valley of the Moon, a ghostly, mystical and unusual landscape in northern Chile.
The warmth of the red earth blends with the alcoholic reminiscence of the Pisco sour (a typical South American cocktail) and the bitter notes of coca leaves (a plant that is legally and habitually used by the native populations to
make up for the lack of energy due to the high altitude of the Andean plateau).
Numerous paranormal phenomena of the most disparate nature occur here. WEON, an ancient word coming from the Indian language, and widely used throughout Chile: its primary meaning is that of "friendship". A bit like saying
"compà" in southern Italy.

Weon is a hymn to the spiritual mysteries of a memorable place that can generate very strong internal shocks.
The subsoil of the Atacama desert is rich in lithium, a mineral used in drugs that stabilize mood. In the sky of this red desert, it is common to observe lights and strange shapes moving quickly in space. A specific area of this desert has been used to listen to the "sounds of the universe" through numerous receptive phono dishes, the purpose of which is to go in search of the primordial sound of the bigbang, or perhaps, who knows what other unknown mysteries.
output: Weon by Spiritica is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Weon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Pisco Sour cocktal and Coca; middle notes are Ice cream, Mint, Milk, Vanilla and Copahu Balm; base notes are Ozonic notes, Sea Salt, Metallic notes and Earthy Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The olfactory identity of BORDERLINE NEROLI takes inspiration by the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
THE FIGHT BETWEEN TWO OPPOSITE WHITE FLOWERS: the clean kindness of NATURAL NEROLI against the violence of NATURAL TUBEROSE essential oils.
The first is supported by a COMFORTABLE SOAPY CLEAN SMELL of NATURAL BERGAMOT CALABRIA OIL, while the second is sharpened by a GREEN FRUITY note of FIG.

We have taken inspiration from an aspect of the Borderline Personality Disorder which is the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
output: Borderline Neroli by La Serra is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Borderline Neroli was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Neroli, Calabrian bergamot and Fig; middle notes are Tuberose and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In the realm where harmony reigns, Principalities weave mystical enchantment.
Over earth and fire, through the air’s embrace, they guide nature’s dance with celestial grace.
Born from Heaven’s decree, the fragrance captures divine alchemy’s essence.
The wind’s whisper, the Sun’s warmth, and the Earth’s heartbeat, all guided by unseen hands.
Custodians of the natural order, the Principalities orchestrate life’s symphony with divine precision.
Each drop of this cosmic dance offers wearers a profound connection to these forces.
Capturing the world’s beauty, the scent harmonizes melodies of the Earth, resonating with nature’s rhythm.
A connection to the primal, the profound, the eternal.
Journey through emerald forests echoing with forgotten wisdom, across sapphire stars brimming with untold tales – and into the fiery heart of creation where light and power connect.
A bridge between the tangible and ethereal, this elixir connects you to the primal forces shaping our existence.
Embrace the dance of elements.
output: Principalities by Caeleste Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Principalities was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"An olfactive postcard from an island vacation, Isola Sol is a sublime new art-piece from the vision of Roja Dove. Capturing a snapshot of a blissful day spent on a golden beach, Isola Sol embraces that magical moment the sun is at its highest in the sky, turning the scenery into a watercolour of orange and blues. Tempting you to a land where the sun always shines, surrounding yourself with the scent of Isola Sol means you don’t have to long for a summer holiday."
Key Notes: Citrus, Apricot, Peach, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Coconut, Sandal Wood, Salt
Top Notes: Lemon, Bergamot, Mandarin, Petitgrain, Apricot, Peach
Heart Notes: Neroli, Jasmine Sambac, Ylang Ylang, Coconut
Base Notes: Pink Pepper, Cedar Wood, Sandal Wood, Amyris Wood, Salty Accord, Musks, Ambroxan
“A scorching sun in a cloudless sky, a radiant glow of Mandarin, Apricot and Peach open onto rays of Oriental which shine throughout the day. With its ability to evoke the sensation of warm skin, a base of Sandalwood becomes silken by a note of creamy Coconut, as a touch of Pink Pepper adds the rosy heat of sun-kissed cheeks. Caressing the shoreline, a breeze of Salt air carries upon it the heady fragrance of succulent fruits and tropical flowers.” - Roja Dove.
Available as 50 ml Parfum.
output: Isola Sol by Roja Dove is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Isola Sol was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Apricot, Mandarin Orange, Petitgrain, Lemon, Bergamot and Peach; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine Sambac, Coconut and Neroli; base notes are Salt, Musk, Sandalwood, Ambroxan, Cedar, Amyris and Pink Pepper.

instruction: Answer which of the given scents is the strongest.
Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Shihab, the latest addition to Spirit of Kings' Gold Collection, takes its name from the Arabic word for "shooting star," symbolizing the fleeting beauty and wonder of this celestial phenomenon. This fragrance embodies the serene elegance of a summer evening in a royal garden, where the air is filled with the intoxicating aroma of ripe fruits as the day gently fades into night.
The composition begins with a bright, invigorating blend of raspberries, pink pepper, peach, apple, and bergamot, creating an uplifting and vibrant introduction. As the scent evolves, the heart unveils an opulent mix of Turkish rose, jasmine, patchouli, and cedarwood, adding depth and floral sophistication. The fragrance concludes with warm, sensual base notes of sandalwood, musk, amber, tonka, and vanilla, leaving a long-lasting, comforting impression reminiscent of a golden summer sunset.
In the heart of a majestic kingdom, as the king strolls through his lavish garden at twilight, the sweet scent of ripening raspberries fills the air. In this tranquil moment, he gazes upon the sky and witnesses the magic of a shooting star—Shihab—gracing the evening horizon. Though brief, the moment is one of peace and wonder, forever etched in his memory.
Shihab encapsulates this enchanting experience through its intricate blend of fruity and floral notes. The lush raspberry opening is elevated by a hint of pink pepper's spice, while the floral heart of Turkish rose and jasmine evokes the refined beauty of a twilight garden. The warmth of amber, musk, and patchouli in the base lingers like the fading light of a summer day, creating a fragrance that is both timeless and regal.
The vibrant hue of orange, symbolizing creativity, joy, and energy, is an ideal reflection of Shihab’s essence. As the morning sun gently warms the woods, Seekwood effortlessly guides you into a brand-new day. Skillfully crafted by perfumer Spyros Drosopolous, Seekwood embodies the essence of carefree living. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Crema Limone is a gourmand citrus fragrance that tells stories of sweetness and freshness. An olfactory cuddle that envelops you thanks to its soft and creamy notes that bring back old childhood memories. Lemon and orange zest evoke an explosion of freshness, enriched by the softness of vanilla and almond milk. The delicious notes of brown sugar and caramel leave an indelible memory on the skin.
When telling the stories of a place we come across distant flavors that our grandparents tell. So it was with that charming dessert that once accompanied the "Special Coffee" in Polignano, a delicacy of the village since 1920. An extraordinary ice cream, a delight for adults and children, made by enriching the flavor of the cream with delicate Polignano a Mare lemons.
output: Crema Limone by Profumi Di Polignano is a Citrus Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Crema Limone was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Arturetto Landi. Top notes are Lemon, Orange Peel and Black Currant; middle notes are Vanilla and Almond Milk; base notes are Vanilla, Caramel and Brown sugar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Each year, Kilian launches a limited edition of one of its most popular and emblematic fragrances, Love, Don't Be Shy. The Special Blend edition of 2023 captures the essence of home and heritage with the legend of the inspiring Middle East, oud resonating with a vibrant amber accord.
Love, Don't Be Shy AMBER & OUD Special Blend 2023 highlights the rich and diverse facets of oud oil. This year's blend begins with bright Bulgarian rose oil and orange blossom absolute from Morocco, blooming with refinement and sensuality into the unforgettably delicious marshmallowy accord. In this heart begins the opening notes of a rich ambery accord, boldly with intensified spices and resins. Oriental and oud are the core resonance with a touch of akigalawood. The composition is signed by perfumer Calice Becker.
 
Notes: Accord of Oud, Accord of Oriental, Rose essence, Akigalawood.
The fragrance is available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 by By Kilian is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Tunisian Orange Blossom, Marshmallow and Bulgarian Rose; middle notes are Amber, Resins and Spices; base notes are Amber, Agarwood (Oud) and Akigalawood.
